xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Professor Lupin and Sirius Black with the trio, before forcing <a href="/wiki/Pettigrew_family" title="Pettigrew family">Pettigrew</a> into human form</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>On the day of Buckbeak's execution, the trio ventured down to console Hagrid. While in his cabin, Hermione discovered <a href="/wiki/Peter_Pettigrew" title="Peter Pettigrew">Scabbers</a>, Ron's lost rat. Hagrid urged them to leave and they witnessed from a distance what they believed to be Buckbeak's execution. Before they could return to their dormitory, Scabbers bit Ron and fled. While chasing after the rat, they were attacked by a <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black" title="Sirius Black">black dog</a>, which pulled Ron by the leg into a tunnel beneath the <a href="/wiki/Whomping_Willow" title="Whomping Willow">Whomping Willow</a>, which then attacked them.
</p><p>Afterward, Hermione and Harry hurried after them eventually arriving in the <a href="/wiki/Shrieking_Shack" title="Shrieking Shack">Shrieking Shack</a>, where Sirius Black, whose <a href="/wiki/Animagus" title="Animagus">Animagus</a> form was the black dog, confronted them. They were soon joined by Professor Lupin who was acting strangely, and Hermione told Harry and Ron of her belief that he was a werewolf, which he then confirmed. It was revealed that Sirius had been framed for the betrayal of <a href="/wiki/James_Potter_(I)" title="James Potter (I)">James</a> and <a href="/wiki/Lily_Potter_(I)" title="Lily Potter (I)">Lily Potter</a>, and that the true traitor was Peter Pettigrew, who had been hiding from the world as Ron's pet rat. Hermione also cast <i><a href="/wiki/Disarming_Charm" title="Disarming Charm">Expelliarmus</a></i> on Snape when he discovered them, knocking him out, at which she was horrified.
</p>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c4/B3C20M2_Lake_surrounded_by_Dementors.png/revision/latest?cb=20241130183709" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B3C20M2 Lake surrounded by Dementors" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="90" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B3C20M2 Lake surrounded by Dementors.png" data-image-key="B3C20M2_Lake_surrounded_by_Dementors.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c4/B3C20M2_Lake_surrounded_by_Dementors.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20241130183709" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c4/B3C20M2_Lake_surrounded_by_Dementors.png/revision/latest?cb=20241130183709" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B3C20M2 Lake surrounded by Dementors" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c4/B3C20M2_Lake_surrounded_by_Dementors.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20241130183709" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="90" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B3C20M2 Lake surrounded by Dementors.png" data-image-key="B3C20M2_Lake_surrounded_by_Dementors.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c4/B3C20M2_Lake_surrounded_by_Dementors.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20241130183709" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B3C20M2_Lake_surrounded_by_Dementors.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry, Hermione, and Sirius being attacked by Dementors at the Black Lake</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Once it had been decided that Pettigrew would be turned over to the authorities rather than murdered, the motley group left the Shrieking Shack. When the full moon appeared, chaos ensued as Lupin transformed into a werewolf as, due to the chaotic turn of events, he hadn't taken the <a href="/wiki/Wolfsbane_Potion" title="Wolfsbane Potion">Wolfsbane Potion</a> that Professor Snape produced for him monthly in order for him to retain his humanity. In the chaos, Pettigrew attacked Ron and escaped, and Sirius had to transform into his dog form in order to protect Harry, Ron, and Hermione from the werewolf. After Lupin was eventually distracted by a howl from the <a href="/wiki/Forbidden_Forest" title="Forbidden Forest">Forbidden Forest</a>, Hermione and Harry rushed to Sirius' aid when they heard him moaning, but hundreds of <a href="/wiki/Dementor" title="Dementor">Dementors</a> descended on them, come to recapture Sirius who quickly fainted, and Harry told Hermione to think of something happy and attempt to cast a <a href="/wiki/Patronus_Charm" title="Patronus Charm">Patronus</a> as he was trying to himself, but she was unable to cast one.
</p><p>As Harry conjured an incorporeal Patronus, Hermione passed out, leaving Harry to fight the Dementors alone. Harry held them off for a while but was eventually overwhelmed. The Dementors were about to perform the <a href="/wiki/Dementor%27s_Kiss" title="Dementor's Kiss">Dementor's Kiss</a> on Harry, Hermione, and Sirius when a mysterious figure in the distance cast a very powerful Patronus Charm to repel the Dementors. Unable to see properly in the resulting blinding light, Harry thought he glimpsed his father just before he, too, lost consciousness.
</p>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 245px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/79/Turning_time.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140717051907" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Turning time" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="245" height="125" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Turning time.gif" data-image-key="Turning_time.gif" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/79/Turning_time.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140717051907" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/79/Turning_time.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140717051907" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Turning time" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/79/Turning_time.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140717051907" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="245" height="125" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Turning time.gif" data-image-key="Turning_time.gif" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/79/Turning_time.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140717051907" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Turning_time.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry and Hermione using the Time-Turner</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry and Hermione awoke in the <a href="/wiki/Hospital_Wing" title="Hospital Wing">Hospital Wing</a> after being rescued by Severus Snape, who conjured stretchers for Hermione, Harry and Sirius. After realising that Sirius' soul was to be destroyed by the Dementor's Kiss and receiving vague, though instructive and useful, instructions from Dumbledore, Hermione used her <a href="/wiki/Time-Turner" title="Time-Turner">Time-Turner</a> to return herself and Harry to a time earlier in the evening. It was a very difficult task and Harry had to be constantly reminded by Hermione to stay concealed as being seen could cause irreparable damage to their timelines. Hermione agreed with Harry that it was difficult to watch their problems again, but she strictly said that they could do nothing about it, as bad things happened to wizards who tried to meddle with their past and future lives.
</p>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4b/B3C21M4_Sirius_flying_off_on_Buckbeak.png/revision/latest?cb=20241205181520" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B3C21M4 Sirius flying off on Buckbeak" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="91" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B3C21M4 Sirius flying off on Buckbeak.png" data-image-key="B3C21M4_Sirius_flying_off_on_Buckbeak.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4b/B3C21M4_Sirius_flying_off_on_Buckbeak.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20241205181520" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4b/B3C21M4_Sirius_flying_off_on_Buckbeak.png/revision/latest?cb=20241205181520" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B3C21M4 Sirius flying off on Buckbeak" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4b/B3C21M4_Sirius_flying_off_on_Buckbeak.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20241205181520" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="91" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B3C21M4 Sirius flying off on Buckbeak.png" data-image-key="B3C21M4_Sirius_flying_off_on_Buckbeak.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4b/B3C21M4_Sirius_flying_off_on_Buckbeak.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20241205181520" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B3C21M4_Sirius_flying_off_on_Buckbeak.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry and Hermione setting Sirius Black and <a href="/wiki/Buckbeak" title="Buckbeak">Buckbeak</a> free</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>The two did, however, successfully use the opportunity to <a href="/wiki/Rescue_of_Sirius_Black_and_Buckbeak" title="Rescue of Sirius Black and Buckbeak">rescue</a> Sirius and also Buckbeak, as it was hinted by Dumbledore that more than one innocent life could be spared that night.<sup id="cite_ref-POA_34-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-POA-34"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>34<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Whilst waiting, she discussed their saviour with Harry, and when Harry realised that it was not his father he saw but himself having travelled back in time, she claimed that none but a powerful wizard could have conjured a Patronus to drive away that many Dementors. As evidenced by her assertion that time-travelling was extremely dangerous, Hermione took great personal risk to save Sirius and Buckbeak. At the end of the year Hermione returned her Time-Turner, claiming it caused too much trouble and that she would drop a few subjects instead, which was a very big surprise to everyone.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Fourth_year">Fourth year</span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">"<i>You know, house-elves get a very raw deal! It's slavery, that's what it is! That <a href="/wiki/Bartemius_Crouch_Senior" title="Bartemius Crouch Senior">Mr Crouch</a> made her go up to the top of the stadium, and she was terrified, and he's got her bewitched so she can't even run when they start trampling tents! Why doesn't anyone do something about it?</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Hermione beginning her <a href="/wiki/Society_for_the_Promotion_of_Elfish_Welfare" title="Society for the Promotion of Elfish Welfare">campaign</a> for the better treatment of house-elves<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Goblet_of_Fire" title="Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fe/B4C9M1_the_trio_seeing_the_Dark_Mark.png/revision/latest?cb=20241204193358" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B4C9M1 the trio seeing the Dark Mark" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="118" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B4C9M1 the trio seeing the Dark Mark.png" data-image-key="B4C9M1_the_trio_seeing_the_Dark_Mark.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fe/B4C9M1_the_trio_seeing_the_Dark_Mark.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20241204193358" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fe/B4C9M1_the_trio_seeing_the_Dark_Mark.png/revision/latest?cb=20241204193358" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B4C9M1 the trio seeing the Dark Mark" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fe/B4C9M1_the_trio_seeing_the_Dark_Mark.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20241204193358" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="118" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B4C9M1 the trio seeing the Dark Mark.png" data-image-key="B4C9M1_the_trio_seeing_the_Dark_Mark.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fe/B4C9M1_the_trio_seeing_the_Dark_Mark.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20241204193358" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B4C9M1_the_trio_seeing_the_Dark_Mark.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Ron, Harry, and Hermione after the riot of the <a href="/wiki/1994_Quidditch_World_Cup" title="1994 Quidditch World Cup">1994 Quidditch World Cup</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Before her fourth year at Hogwarts, Hermione spent much of the summer holidays at <a href="/wiki/The_Burrow" title="The Burrow">The Burrow</a> with <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter" title="Harry Potter">Harry</a> and <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron</a>, sharing a room with <a href="/wiki/Ginevra_Weasley" title="Ginevra Weasley">Ginny Weasley</a>. With the other <a href="/wiki/Weasley_family" title="Weasley family">Weasleys</a> (excluding Molly Weasley), they attended the 1994 Quidditch World Cup in <a href="/wiki/August" title="August">August</a>. After the game, the communal campsite was set upon by <a href="/wiki/Death_Eaters" title="Death Eaters">Death Eaters</a>. Hermione, Harry, and Ron fled into the woods and witnessed the casting of <i><a href="/wiki/Morsmordre" title="Morsmordre">Morsmordre</a></i>. Initially caught up in the chaos surrounding the effort to catch the caster, she took exception to the accusations levelled against Harry, and the many wizards' treatment of the house-elf <a href="/wiki/Winky" title="Winky">Winky</a> who had also been at the scene.
</p><p>Once at Hogwarts, it was revealed to the students that former <a href="/wiki/Auror" title="Auror">Auror</a> <a href="/wiki/Alastor_Moody" title="Alastor Moody">Alastor Moody</a> (who was, in fact, a polyjuiced <a href="/wiki/Bartemius_Crouch_Junior" title="Bartemius Crouch Junior">Barty Crouch Jnr</a>) was to be the new <a href="/wiki/Defence_Against_the_Dark_Arts" title="Defence Against the Dark Arts">Defence Against the Dark Arts</a> professor, Lupin having left at the end of the previous year due to Snape outing his werewolf status. Moody was a hands-on professor who believed in a practical approach when it came to defence. One of his earliest lessons was on the <a href="/wiki/Unforgivable_Curses" title="Unforgivable Curses">Unforgivable Curses</a>. Hermione and her fellow classmates witnessed the curse's effects on a spider. 
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Society_for_the_Promotion_of_Elfish_Welfare">Society for the Promotion of Elfish Welfare</span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire"><b>Ron Weasley</b>: "<i>Never heard of it.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Hermione</b>: "<i>Well, of course you haven't. I've only just started it.</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Ron Weasley</b>: "<i>And how many members do you have?</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Hermione</b>: "<i>Well, if you two join, three.</i>"</dd>
<dd>— The beginning of S.P.E.W.<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Goblet_of_Fire" title="Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/91/B4C14M2_Hedwig%27s_Gryffindor_Common_Room_delivery.png/revision/latest?cb=20161219021932" class="mw-file-description image"><img /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B4C14M2_Hedwig%27s_Gryffindor_Common_Room_delivery.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The first 'meeting' of the <a href="/wiki/Society_for_the_Promotion_of_Elfish_Welfare" title="Society for the Promotion of Elfish Welfare">Society for the Promotion of Elfish Welfare</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Hermione began a crusade for the liberation of <a href="/wiki/House-elf" title="House-elf">house-elves</a> by beginning the Society for the Promotion of Elfish Welfare, or what she and the group called S.P.E.W, (or, as <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ronald Weasley</a> called it, 'spew') having been appalled by <a href="/wiki/Bartemius_Crouch_Senior" title="Bartemius Crouch Senior">Bartemius Crouch</a>'s abusive treatment of his house-elf <a href="/wiki/Winky" title="Winky">Winky</a>. This did not earn her any popularity, as most believed that house-elves enjoy their work; indeed, even the house-elves did not like her campaigning. 
</p><p>Harry, Ron, and Neville only reluctantly joined S.P.E.W., mostly in order to prevent Hermione from nagging them about it. Hagrid as well as <a href="/wiki/Fred_Weasley" title="Fred Weasley">Fred</a> and <a href="/wiki/George_Weasley" title="George Weasley">George Weasley</a> refused to join on the grounds that it would upset the house-elves. Despite this, Fred did tell Hermione how to get into the Hogwarts kitchens. One morning she (along with Harry and Ron) visited the kitchens, where she spoke to <a href="/wiki/Dobby" title="Dobby">Dobby</a> and Winky. Dobby was pleased to see Harry and his friends and proceeded to tell them his struggles as a freed elf.
</p>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/8c/B4C21M2_DobbyAndWinkyOtherHouseElvesInHogwartsKitchen_Moment.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180423212945" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B4C21M2 DobbyAndWinkyOtherHouseElvesInHogwartsKitchen Moment" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async"
