/></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B4C21M2_DobbyAndWinkyOtherHouseElvesInHogwartsKitchen_Moment.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The trio visiting the house-elves in the Hogwarts kitchen</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>While the trio were within the kitchen it was revealed that Winky was so saddened by the lose of her previous job that she had taken to drinking <a href="/wiki/Butterbeer" title="Butterbeer">Butterbeer</a>, as a means to get drunk and numb her pain. Hermione considered Dobby to be a good example of a free elf and tried to comfort Winky about being sacked by Crouch. This did little good, however, as Winky soon became upset by Hermione's claims that house-elves deserved to have holidays and wages. Winky was not the only elf bothered by this, as the other elves stated that proper house-elves would never need such things and to want them is considered very shameful.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Viktor_Krum">Viktor Krum</span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the goblet of Fire">"<i>How did she know Viktor asked me to visit him over the summer?</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Viktor invited Hermione to spend the summer with him<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_goblet_of_Fire" class="mw-redirect" title="Harry Potter and the goblet of Fire">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/27/Harry_%26_Hermione_talking.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170706031156" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry & Hermione talking" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="107" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry & Hermione talking.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_%26_Hermione_talking.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/27/Harry_%26_Hermione_talking.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170706031156" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/27/Harry_%26_Hermione_talking.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170706031156" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry & Hermione talking" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/27/Harry_%26_Hermione_talking.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170706031156" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="107" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry & Hermione talking.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_%26_Hermione_talking.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/27/Harry_%26_Hermione_talking.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170706031156" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_%26_Hermione_talking.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Hermione believed Harry without question when he said he did not enter his name in the Triwizard Tournament</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>After the events surrounding Harry's name coming out of the <a href="/wiki/Goblet_of_Fire" title="Goblet of Fire">Goblet of Fire</a>, Hermione was the only student who believed Harry's innocence. In fact, she '<i>accepted his story without question</i>'. Even Ron was suspicious that Harry had cheated in order to gain more glory, creating a rift between the two for some time. Hermione helped Harry prepare for the first task of the Triwizard Tournament by helping him learn useful spells. Some of the spells were <i><a href="/wiki/Stunning_Spell" title="Stunning Spell">Stupefy</a></i>, <i><a href="/wiki/Impediment_Jinx" title="Impediment Jinx">Impedimenta</a></i>, <i><a href="/wiki/Summoning_Charm" title="Summoning Charm">Accio</a></i>, the <a href="/wiki/Shield_Charm" title="Shield Charm">Shield Charm</a>, and the <a href="/wiki/Four-Point_Spell" title="Four-Point Spell">Four-Point Spell</a>. She also tried to get Harry and Ron to talk to one another multiple times.
</p><p>Hermione unknowingly attracted the interest of <a href="/wiki/Durmstrang_Institute" title="Durmstrang Institute">Durmstrang</a> Triwizard Champion and Bulgarian International <a href="/wiki/Seeker" title="Seeker">Seeker</a>, <a href="/wiki/Viktor_Krum" title="Viktor Krum">Viktor Krum</a>. He was attracted to her due to her intelligence, unconventional beauty, and the manner in which she declined to hound him for autographs, unlike other girls. Krum began following Hermione to the library and other places around Hogwarts, including the library. This was something that Hermione found very irritating, as she couldn't work when surrounded by giggling girls, who had taken it upon themselves to follow Krum throughout the castle and the school grounds. Krum even bizarrely asked Harry if it was all right for him to pursue Hermione. He eventually asked her to attend the <a href="/wiki/Yule_Ball" title="Yule Ball">Yule Ball</a> with him, and she accepted, not telling anyone but <a href="/wiki/Ginevra_Weasley" title="Ginevra Weasley">Ginny Weasley</a> that she was his date.
</p>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 245px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b3/Yule_ball7.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140818144828" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Yule ball7" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="245" height="120" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Yule ball7.gif" data-image-key="Yule_ball7.gif" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b3/Yule_ball7.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140818144828" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b3/Yule_ball7.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140818144828" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Yule ball7" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b3/Yule_ball7.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140818144828" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="245" height="120" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Yule ball7.gif" data-image-key="Yule_ball7.gif" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b3/Yule_ball7.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140818144828" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Yule_ball7.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Hermione dancing with her date, Viktor Krum at the Yule Ball</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Thus, when the pair arrived, many were stunned and jealous. Hermione wore robes of a '<i>floaty, periwinkle-blue material</i>', and her hair in an '<i>elegant knot at the back of her head</i>'.<sup id="cite_ref-GOF_35-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-GOF-35"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>35<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> The attention to her appearance was unusual, and she received many positive remarks on it. Even Draco Malfoy and <a href="/wiki/Pansy_Parkinson" title="Pansy Parkinson">Pansy Parkinson</a> had nothing negative to say. Hermione commented that she had used <a href="/wiki/Sleekeazy%27s_Hair_Potion" title="Sleekeazy's Hair Potion">Sleekeazy's Hair Potion</a>, but that it was too much work to use it every day. 
</p>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4b/Hermioneaftertheball.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161202170256" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Hermioneaftertheball" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Hermioneaftertheball.jpg" data-image-key="Hermioneaftertheball.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4b/Hermioneaftertheball.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161202170256" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4b/Hermioneaftertheball.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161202170256" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Hermioneaftertheball" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4b/Hermioneaftertheball.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161202170256" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Hermioneaftertheball.jpg" data-image-key="Hermioneaftertheball.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4b/Hermioneaftertheball.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161202170256" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Hermioneaftertheball.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Hermione upset after getting into a row with Ron at the Yule Ball</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Upon seeing Hermione with Krum, Ron was overcome with jealousy. Hermione had hoped for Ron to ask her, but his invitation was insensitive and at the last minute due to him not being able to find anyone else. The two rowed about it in the common room after the ball, in which she revealed that he should have asked her properly and not '<i>as a last resort</i>', but Ron misunderstood the point. After that, the two were seemingly more polite to each other, although more distant for a time and Ron continued to show dislike and distrust towards Krum.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Imprisoned_by_sea_creatures">Imprisoned by sea creatures</span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">"<i>Ron was tied between Hermione and Cho Chang. There was also a girl who looked no older than eight, whose clouds of silvery hair made Harry feel sure that she was Fleur Delacour's sister. All four of them appeared to be in a very deep sleep. Their heads were lolling onto their shoulders, and fine streams of bubbles kept issuing from their mouths.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Hermione is Viktor Krum's 'hostage' during the Second Task<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Goblet_of_Fire" title="Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/ce/HP-GOF-second_task.gif/revision/latest?cb=20180611185500" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="HP-GOF-second task" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="102" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="HP-GOF-second task.gif" data-image-key="HP-GOF-second_task.gif" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/ce/HP-GOF-second_task.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180611185500" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/ce/HP-GOF-second_task.gif/revision/latest?cb=20180611185500" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="HP-GOF-second task" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/ce/HP-GOF-second_task.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180611185500" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="102" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="HP-GOF-second task.gif" data-image-key="HP-GOF-second_task.gif" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/ce/HP-GOF-second_task.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180611185500" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:HP-GOF-second_task.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Hermione inside the <a href="/wiki/Great_Lake" title="Great Lake">Black Lake</a> during the second task</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Hermione was chosen as a '<i>kidnap victim</i>' for Krum during the Tournament's second task, something that she subsequently endured teasing over. She was taken to the bottom of the Black Lake to await rescue from Krum, who donned a half-shark <a href="/wiki/Transfiguration" title="Transfiguration">Transfiguration</a>. While in the Black Lake Harry was conflicted and wanted to retrieve her as much as he wanted to retrieve Ron. He stated that '<i>she was his friend too</i>'. Krum managed to rescue her and carried her to the surface, where he revealed to her later that he '<i>never felt this way about any other girl</i>' and asked her to visit him in <a href="/wiki/Bulgaria" title="Bulgaria">Bulgaria</a> over the summer.<sup id="cite_ref-GOF_35-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-GOF-35"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>35<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> 
</p><p>Krum was jealous of Hermione's relationship with Harry Potter, thinking that there may have been something romantic between them that went beyond just plain friendship. The jealousy was founded based on the lies in the <i><a href="/wiki/Daily_Prophet" title="Daily Prophet">Daily Prophet</a> and </i>Harry was quick to inform Krum of these lies.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Rita_Skeeter">Rita Skeeter</span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">"<i>No, you see... Rita Skeeter — is an unregistered Animagus. She can turn — into a beetle.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Hermione Granger exposing Rita's abilities as an Animagus<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Goblet_of_Fire" title="Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f6/B4C28M1_Hermione_opening_hate_mails.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180424053809" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B4C28M1 Hermione opening hate mails" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="98" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B4C28M1 Hermione opening hate mails.jpg" data-image-key="B4C28M1_Hermione_opening_hate_mails.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f6/B4C28M1_Hermione_opening_hate_mails.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180424053809" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f6/B4C28M1_Hermione_opening_hate_mails.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180424053809" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B4C28M1 Hermione opening hate mails" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f6/B4C28M1_Hermione_opening_hate_mails.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180424053809" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="98" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B4C28M1 Hermione opening hate mails.jpg" data-image-key="B4C28M1_Hermione_opening_hate_mails.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f6/B4C28M1_Hermione_opening_hate_mails.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180424053809" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B4C28M1_Hermione_opening_hate_mails.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Hermione receiving hate mail from the readers of <i><a href="/wiki/Witch_Weekly" title="Witch Weekly">Witch Weekly</a></i> in response to Skeeter's article</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p><a href="/wiki/Rita_Skeeter" title="Rita Skeeter">Rita Skeeter</a>, a journalist for the <i>Daily Prophet</i> and unregistered <a href="/wiki/Animagus" title="Animagus">Animagus</a>, was hiding in beetle form in Hermione's hair during her conversation with Viktor. Hermione had previously reprimanded Skeeter for printing horrible lies about Harry and <a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid" title="Rubeus Hagrid">Rubeus Hagrid</a>. This angered the journalist, who wrote a scathing article on '<i>the devious Miss Granger</i>', claiming that she was toying with both Harry and Krum's affections and that she had developed a taste for famous wizards.
</p><p>Skeeter even went so far to claim that Hermione was possibly brewing <a href="/wiki/Love_Potion" class="mw-redirect" title="Love Potion">love potions</a>. In the words of Ron, Skeeter was making Hermione out to be a '<i>Scarlet Woman</i>', a phrase which made Hermione laugh. She called Hermione '<i>plain</i>' in the article, in spite of previously reporting Hermione as Harry's '<i>stunningly pretty... girlfriend</i>' by likely twisting and sensationalising the words of <a href="/wiki/Colin_Creevey" title="Colin Creevey">Colin Creevey</a> and thus using this as the basis for the article. 
</p><p>Although Hermione found the lies ridiculous, some people believed them and started sending Hermione hate mail, including one filled with <a href="/wiki/Bubotuber_Pus" class="mw-redirect" title="Bubotuber Pus">Bubotuber Pus</a>, and even <a href="/wiki/Molly_Weasley" title="Molly Weasley">Molly Weasley</a> treated her coldly until Harry corrected her. Hermione vowed to get revenge on Skeeter for her libel, and wondered how she was getting her information, as several things Skeeter knew had only been discussed in private conversations. This led her to come to the realisation that Skeeter was an illegal unregistered <a href="/wiki/Animagus" title="Animagus">Animagus</a>, who took the form of a beetle to secretly witness confidential exchanges.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Return_of_Lord_Voldemort">Return of Lord Voldemort</span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">"<i>Oh, Rita hasn't written anything at all since the third task. As a matter of fact. Rita Skeeter isn't going to be writing anything at all for a while. Not unless she wants me to spill the beans on her.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Hermione discovered that Rita Skeeter was an unregistered Animagus<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Goblet_of_Fire" title="Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/78/B4C36M1_Snape_Dark_Mark_reveal.png/revision/latest?cb=20241212174609" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B4C36M1 Snape Dark Mark reveal" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="102" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B4C36M1 Snape Dark Mark reveal.png" data-image-key="B4C36M1_Snape_Dark_Mark_reveal.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/78/B4C36M1_Snape_Dark_Mark_reveal.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20241212174609" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/78/B4C36M1_Snape_Dark_Mark_reveal.png/revision/latest?cb=20241212174609" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B4C36M1 Snape Dark Mark reveal" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/78/B4C36M1_Snape_Dark_Mark_reveal.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20241212174609" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="102" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B4C36M1 Snape Dark Mark reveal.png" data-image-key="B4C36M1_Snape_Dark_Mark_reveal.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/78/B4C36M1_Snape_Dark_Mark_reveal.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20241212174609" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B4C36M1_Snape_Dark_Mark_reveal.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Hermione was present when the Minister for Magic visited Harry in the hospital wing</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>The students were shocked when Harry returned at the end of the third and final task with Cedric Diggory's dead body. Hermione was relieved to see Harry when he was brought to the infirmary by Professor Dumbledore. She was upset with <a href="/wiki/Minister_for_Magic" title="Minister for Magic">Minister for Magic</a> <a href="/wiki/Cornelius_Fudge" title="Cornelius Fudge">Cornelius Fudge</a> when he refused to believe Harry and Dumbledore about the truth of Voldemort's return. During her time with Harry in the Hospital Wing, she noticed Skeeter on a windowsill, attempting to eavesdrop, and captured her in the process. Hermione did not go against Harry's story when she finally heard it, sticking by her best friend.
</p><p>On the ride home on the <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_Express" title="Hogwarts Express">Hogwarts Express</a>, Hermione happily revealed to Harry and Ron that she uncovered Skeeter's status as an unregistered Animagus and had trapped her in a jar. She as an unregistered beetle Animagus that used her tiny size to come onto school grounds and listen to private conversations. She was not allowed onto school grounds and Hermione caught her on a windowsill in the hospital wing. Hermione also noticed the markings around Rita's antennae were exactly like the foul glasses she wore. She kept Skeeter from writing for a year by threatening to expose her to the authorities. 
</p><p>She single-handed drove Skeeter into poverty, gaining revenge for the pain caused to Harry and her other friends. However, with the <a href="/wiki/Return_of_Lord_Voldemort" title="Return of Lord Voldemort">return</a> of <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Lord Voldemort</a> and the murder of <a href="/wiki/Cedric_Diggory" title="Cedric Diggory">Cedric Diggory</a> at the end of the school year,<sup id="cite_ref-GOF_35-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-GOF-35"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>35<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> there were much more serious challenges ahead for Hermione and her friends. Hermione along with her friends and school mates attended the Memorial Feast for Cedric. 
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Fifth_year">Fifth year</span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix"><b>Harry Potter</b>: "<i>Been having a nice little chat with <a href="/wiki/Lavender_Brown" title="Lavender Brown">her</a> about whether or not I'm a lying, attention-seeking prat, have you?</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Hermione</b>: "<i>No, I told her to keep her big fat mouth shut about you, actually. And it would be quite nice if you stopped jumping down Ron and my throats, Harry, because if you haven't noticed, we're on your side.</i>"</dd>
<dd>— An argument over people's differing opinions on Harry Potter<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4c/B5C6M1_Doxycide_Grimmauld_Place.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180420213240" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B5C6M1 Doxycide Grimmauld Place" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="98" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B5C6M1 Doxycide Grimmauld Place.jpg" data-image-key="B5C6M1_Doxycide_Grimmauld_Place.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4c/B5C6M1_Doxycide_Grimmauld_Place.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180420213240" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4c/B5C6M1_Doxycide_Grimmauld_Place.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180420213240" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B5C6M1 Doxycide Grimmauld Place" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4c/B5C6M1_Doxycide_Grimmauld_Place.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180420213240" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="98" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B5C6M1 Doxycide Grimmauld Place.jpg" data-image-key="B5C6M1_Doxycide_Grimmauld_Place.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4c/B5C6M1_Doxycide_Grimmauld_Place.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180420213240" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B5C6M1_Doxycide_Grimmauld_Place.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Hermione with others in 12 Grimmauld Place preparing to clean</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Following the death of <a href="/wiki/Cedric_Diggory" title="Cedric Diggory">Cedric Diggory</a>, the <a href="/wiki/British_Ministry_of_Magic" title="British Ministry of Magic">Ministry of Magic</a> refused to accept Harry and <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Dumbledore</a>'s claims that <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Lord Voldemort</a> had returned, and the <i><a href="/wiki/Daily_Prophet" title="Daily Prophet">Daily Prophet</a></i> labelled them either liars or nutters. However, Hermione and Ron believed Harry and defended him against the criticism of doubtful classmates. Though occasionally Harry vented his frustration at them, the two stuck by him. The trio also wanted to become members of the reconvened <a href="/wiki/Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Order of the Phoenix">Order of the Phoenix</a> but were not allowed to because they were underage. Hermione helped exterminate <a href="/wiki/12_Grimmauld_Place" title="12 Grimmauld Place">12 Grimmauld Place</a>, which served as headquarters for the Order, and was immensely relieved when Harry was acquitted of the charge of having used underage magic in the presence of a muggle, after him and <a href="/wiki/Dudley_Dursley" title="Dudley Dursley">Dudley Dursley</a> were attacked by a Dementor in <a href="/wiki/Little_Whinging" title="Little Whinging">Little Whinging</a>.
</p><p>Before returning to Hogwarts, she and Ron learned that they had been appointed prefects for <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor" title="Gryffindor">Gryffindor</a> house, to the secret consternation of Harry, who couldn't believe Ron had been chosen over him. She took her position very seriously. Once the school year began, Hermione resumed some of her activism on behalf of house-elves, though she was not as intense about <a href="/wiki/Society_for_the_Promotion_of_Elfish_Welfare" title="Society for the Promotion of Elfish Welfare">S.P.E.W.</a> as she had been the previous year. 
</p>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fa/Fifth_year_Hogwarts_carriage.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20150810143902" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Fifth year Hogwarts carriage" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="113" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Fifth year Hogwarts carriage.jpg" data-image-key="Fifth_year_Hogwarts_carriage.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fa/Fifth_year_Hogwarts_carriage.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20150810143902" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fa/Fifth_year_Hogwarts_carriage.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20150810143902" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Fifth year Hogwarts carriage" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fa/Fifth_year_Hogwarts_carriage.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20150810143902" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="113" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Fifth year Hogwarts carriage.jpg" data-image-key="Fifth_year_Hogwarts_carriage.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fa/Fifth_year_Hogwarts_carriage.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20150810143902" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Fifth_year_Hogwarts_carriage.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The trio and Neville meet Luna Lovegood for the first time</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>She learned how to knit socks and hats for the house-elves and hid them in Gryffindor Tower, disguising them with crumpled rubbish in an attempt to trick the house-elves into accidentally freeing themselves. The elves found this attempt insulting, and they stopped cleaning the Tower at all. <a href="/wiki/Dobby" title="Dobby">Dobby</a> was the only one who enjoyed the gifts, took everything Hermione had made, and cleaned the Tower by himself, a fact which Hermione didn't know. 
</p><p>Hermione was challenged in more ways than one that year when she met <a href="/wiki/Luna_Lovegood" title="Luna Lovegood">Luna Lovegood</a>, whose belief in many things without logical grounds baffled Hermione. However, the two became friends after accepting one another's differences.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP_32-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP-32"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>32<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h5><span id="Dumbledore.27s_Army"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Dumbledore's_Army">Dumbledore's Army</span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix">"<i>Harry, don't you see? This... this is exactly why we need you... We need to know what it's really like... facing him... facing V-Voldemort. Well... think about it. Please?</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Hermione persuading Harry Potter to teach practical defence<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 245px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/88/Dumbledore%27s_Army_learning_Expelliarmus.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140609152402" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Dumbledore's Army learning Expelliarmus" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="245" height="120" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Dumbledore's Army learning Expelliarmus.gif" data-image-key="Dumbledore%27s_Army_learning_Expelliarmus.gif" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/88/Dumbledore%27s_Army_learning_Expelliarmus.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140609152402" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/88/Dumbledore%27s_Army_learning_Expelliarmus.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140609152402" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Dumbledore's Army learning Expelliarmus" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/88/Dumbledore%27s_Army_learning_Expelliarmus.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140609152402" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="245" height="120" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Dumbledore's Army learning Expelliarmus.gif" data-image-key="Dumbledore%27s_Army_learning_Expelliarmus.gif" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/88/Dumbledore%27s_Army_learning_Expelliarmus.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140609152402" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Dumbledore%27s_Army_learning_Expelliarmus.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Hermione practising with Dumbledore's Army in the Room of Requirement</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Meanwhile, it was not long before Hermione realised that the Ministry of Magic had decided to interfere at Hogwarts. <a href="/wiki/Dolores_Umbridge" title="Dolores Umbridge">Dolores Umbridge</a>, a cruel, falsely sweet Ministry employee with a personality like '<i>poisoned honey</i>', was appointed as the new professor of <a href="/wiki/Defence_Against_the_Dark_Arts" title="Defence Against the Dark Arts">Defence Against the Dark Arts</a> and Hermione, like Harry and Ron, disliked Umbridge for many reasons, one of which being that she refused to teach students practical defence, focusing only on theory, despite their <a href="/wiki/Ordinary_Wizarding_Level" title="Ordinary Wizarding Level">OWLs</a> being later that year. 
</p><p>With this being the case, Hermione decided that Hogwarts needed a competent teacher and, together with Harry and Ron, founded <a href="/wiki/Dumbledore%27s_Army" title="Dumbledore's Army">Dumbledore's Army</a>, a secret organisation in which students would gather after classes and be taught practical defensive spells. She suggested that Harry be the teacher; though he originally thought the idea ridiculous, he consented to teach the class. The name was suggested by Ginny, who recalled the conversation they'd had about Fudge's greatest fear being that Dumbledore would form an army of students if the Ministry did not intervene at Hogwarts.
</p>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c6/Hermione_casting_her_otter_Patronus.gif/revision/latest?cb=20250925013202" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Hermione casting her otter Patronus" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="100" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Hermione casting her otter Patronus.gif" data-image-key="Hermione_casting_her_otter_Patronus.gif" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c6/Hermione_casting_her_otter_Patronus.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20250925013202" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c6/Hermione_casting_her_otter_Patronus.gif/revision/latest?cb=20250925013202" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Hermione casting her otter Patronus" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c6/Hermione_casting_her_otter_Patronus.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20250925013202" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="100" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Hermione casting her otter Patronus.gif" data-image-key="Hermione_casting_her_otter_Patronus.gif" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c6/Hermione_casting_her_otter_Patronus.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20250925013202" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Hermione_casting_her_otter_Patronus.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Hermione conjuring her <a href="/wiki/Otter" title="Otter">otter</a> <a href="/wiki/Patronus_Charm" title="Patronus Charm">Patronus</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>One of the many advanced spells Hermione learned was the <a href="/wiki/Patronus_Charm" title="Patronus Charm">Patronus Charm</a>; hers took the corporeal form of an <a href="/wiki/Otter" title="Otter">otter</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP27_23-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP27-23"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>23<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Hermione became one of the few people brave enough to call <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Voldemort</a> by his actual name. However, Hermione made the mistake of arranging the first meeting to take place in the <a href="/wiki/Hog%27s_Head_Inn" title="Hog's Head Inn">Hog's Head</a>, as opposed to the Three Broomsticks, which Sirius, appearing in the Gryffindor Common Room fire, said would have made it a lot harder for anyone to overhear. <a href="/wiki/Willy_Widdershins" title="Willy Widdershins">Willy Widdershins</a>, who was in the Hog's Head, went to Umbridge, who instituted <a href="/wiki/Educational_Decree_Number_Twenty-Four" title="Educational Decree Number Twenty-Four">Educational Decree Number Twenty-Four</a> to forbid any type of students groups from being formed under her watchful eye.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Christmas_on_the_Closed_Ward">Christmas on the Closed Ward</span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix"><b>Harry Potter</b>: "<i>What are you doing here? I thought you were skiing with your mum and dad?</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Hermione</b>: "<i>Well, to tell the truth, skiing's not really my thing. So, I've come here for Christmas.</i>"</dd>
<dd>— Hermione stays at <a href="/wiki/Grimmauld_Place" title="Grimmauld Place">Grimmauld Place</a> during Charistmas<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/2f/B5C23M1_Christmas_at_St_Mungo%27s.png/revision/latest?cb=20151217020301" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B5C23M1 Christmas at St Mungo's" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="102" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B5C23M1 Christmas at St Mungo's.png" data-image-key="B5C23M1_Christmas_at_St_Mungo%27s.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/2f/B5C23M1_Christmas_at_St_Mungo%27s.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20151217020301" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/2f/B5C23M1_Christmas_at_St_Mungo%27s.png/revision/latest?cb=20151217020301" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B5C23M1 Christmas at St Mungo's" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/2f/B5C23M1_Christmas_at_St_Mungo%27s.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20151217020301" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="102" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B5C23M1 Christmas at St Mungo's.png" data-image-key="B5C23M1_Christmas_at_St_Mungo%27s.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/2f/B5C23M1_Christmas_at_St_Mungo%27s.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20151217020301" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B5C23M1_Christmas_at_St_Mungo%27s.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The trio and Ginny in St Mungo's after visiting Arthur Weasley</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Halfway through the year at Hogwarts, Harry had a vision of Voldemort's snake, <a href="/wiki/Nagini" title="Nagini">Nagini</a>, biting Mr Weasley during his task for the Order of the Phoenix. Mr Weasley was carried into <a href="/wiki/St_Mungo%27s_Hospital_for_Magical_Maladies_and_Injuries" title="St Mungo's Hospital for Magical Maladies and Injuries">St Mungo's Hospital</a>, where Mrs Weasley screamed at him for trying to stitch his wound instead of healing it with magic. 
</p><p>Hermione was one of the few who visited him and stayed at Number Twelve, Grimmauld Place for a couple of weeks until Mr Weasley was nursed back to health. Hermione had managed to convince her parents by telling them that skiing wasn't <i>really</i> her thing and that people who were serious about their exams stayed at <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry" title="Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry">Hogwarts</a> and studied.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Impressive_spell_work">Impressive spell work</span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix"><b>Terry Boot</b>: "<i>You can do a <a href="/wiki/Protean_Charm" title="Protean Charm">Protean Charm</a>?</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Hermione</b>: "<i>Yes.</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Terry Boot</b>: "<i>But that's... that's N.E.W.T. standard, that is.</i>"</dd>
<dd>— Hermione's ability to perform N.E.W.T.-level magic<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e9/Trio_study.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180310041552" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Trio study" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="130" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Trio study.jpg" data-image-key="Trio_study.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e9/Trio_study.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180310041552" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e9/Trio_study.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180310041552" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Trio study" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e9/Trio_study.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180310041552" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="130" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Trio study.jpg" data-image-key="Trio_study.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e9/Trio_study.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180310041552" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Trio_study.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The trio in the Gryffindor common room having a discussion about recent events</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>The D.A. brought Harry into greater contact with <a href="/wiki/Cho_Chang" title="Cho Chang">Cho Chang</a>. After a meeting, Harry kissed Cho, and when he returned to the Gryffindor Common Room Hermione immediately guessed, asking if Cho had cornered him after the meeting. When Harry told them that Cho has been crying, she explained to Harry and Ron that Cho was having a hard time since <a href="/wiki/Cedric_Diggory" title="Cedric Diggory">Cedric Diggory</a>, who she used to go out with, was killed by Lord Voldemort. Hermione later gave Harry advice on Cho and girls in general. 
</p><p>In an effort to combat the lies being told about Harry, Hermione arranged for an interview during a <a href="/wiki/Hogsmeade" title="Hogsmeade">Hogsmeade</a> <a href="/wiki/Hogsmeade_weekend_trips" title="Hogsmeade weekend trips">visit</a> with <a href="/wiki/Rita_Skeeter" title="Rita Skeeter">Rita Skeeter</a> to be printed in <i><a href="/wiki/The_Quibbler" title="The Quibbler">The Quibbler</a></i> telling his side of the story, blackmailing Skeeter into penning it in a sympathetic tone. Despite being banned — or maybe because it was banned — it became the magazine's best-selling issue of all time.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP_32-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP-32"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>32<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>It was Hermione's brilliant spell-work that ensured the security of Dumbledore's Army. She created <a href="/wiki/Dumbledore%27s_Army_coin" title="Dumbledore's Army coin">coins</a> enchanted with the <a href="/wiki/Protean_Charm" title="Protean Charm">Protean Charm</a>, an advanced spell, as a method of communication, and <a href="/wiki/Dumbledore%27s_Army_parchment_jinx" title="Dumbledore's Army parchment jinx">jinxed</a> the club's attendance sheet to give any tattler a horrendous rash on the face, which would spell out '<i>SNEAK'</i> in painful boils. This is exactly what happened to <a href="/wiki/Marietta_Edgecombe" title="Marietta Edgecombe">Marietta Edgecombe</a>, a reluctant member of the D.A., having been brought to the meetings by Cho. Shortly before Easter, Marietta finally caved under the pressure from her ministry mother who worked in the the <a href="/wiki/Floo_Regulation_Panel" title="Floo Regulation Panel">Floo Network Office</a> and betrayed the D.A. to Umbridge. When Harry learned that they could not find a <a href="/wiki/Counter-curse" title="Counter-curse">counter-curse</a> to heal her face, he swelled with pride at Hermione's jinxing ability.
</p>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/93/InquistorialSquadOffice.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161216060209" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="InquistorialSquadOffice" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="167" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="InquistorialSquadOffice.jpg" data-image-key="InquistorialSquadOffice.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/93/InquistorialSquadOffice.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161216060209" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/93/InquistorialSquadOffice.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161216060209" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="InquistorialSquadOffice" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/93/InquistorialSquadOffice.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161216060209" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="167" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="InquistorialSquadOffice.jpg" data-image-key="InquistorialSquadOffice.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/93/InquistorialSquadOffice.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161216060209" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:InquistorialSquadOffice.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Hermione and <a href="/wiki/Neville_Longbottom" title="Neville Longbottom">Neville Longbottom</a> being held against their will by the Inquisitorial Squad</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Dobby the house-elf learned of this turn of events and rushed to the <a href="/wiki/Room_of_Requirement" title="Room of Requirement">Room of Requirement</a> to warn Harry and the D.A. They immediately scattered, and most members escaped, but Harry was caught by Umbridge and several Slytherin students who were members of the <a href="/wiki/Inquisitorial_Squad" title="Inquisitorial Squad">Inquisitorial Squad</a>. A search of the room uncovered the parchment that each member of the D.A. had signed, headed <i>Dumbledore's Army</i>. Finally having 'proof' that Dumbledore was building an army to challenge the Ministry, Umbridge immediately contacted Cornelius Fudge. Dumbledore fled the school and Umbridge became Headmistress. Hermione was not exposed at that time, but later she was brought to Umbridge's office by the some members of the <a href="/wiki/Inquisitorial_Squad" title="Inquisitorial Squad">Inquisitorial Squad</a>.
</p><p>Late in the fall of that year, <a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid" title="Rubeus Hagrid">Hagrid</a>, who had been missing for the entirety of the school year, returned to Hogwarts. Hermione, Harry, and Ron ventured down to see him immediately even though it was after curfew. Hermione was aghast at the injuries Hagrid had sustained and greatly curious as to his story. Hagrid told the trio about his mission with <a href="/wiki/Olympe_Maxime" title="Olympe Maxime">Madame Maxime</a> to try and recruit the giants in the fight against Voldemort. They were almost caught when Umbridge called on Hagrid that night, but hid under the Invisibilty Cloak. 
</p>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3c/Grawp_Hermione.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160314195015" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Grawp Hermione" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="111" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Grawp Hermione.jpg" data-image-key="Grawp_Hermione.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3c/Grawp_Hermione.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160314195015" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3c/Grawp_Hermione.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160314195015" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Grawp Hermione" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3c/Grawp_Hermione.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160314195015" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="111" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Grawp Hermione.jpg" data-image-key="Grawp_Hermione.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3c/Grawp_Hermione.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160314195015" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Grawp_Hermione.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Hermione forcefully telling Grawp to put her down</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Months later, Hermione and Harry learned why Hagrid was perpetually bruised and cut; he had brought his giant half-brother <a href="/wiki/Grawp" title="Grawp">Grawp</a> back to Hogwarts, as he was getting severely bullied, and was trying to teach him human ways. After Grawp, who had the mental age of a human toddler, picked her up, Hermione forcefully told him to put him down. He subsequently became enamoured with Hermione, calling her 'Hermy'. It was one of the few words he could pronounce. 
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="O.W.L.s">O.W.L.s</span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix">"<i>Harry agreed to test Hermione after lunch on Sunday, but regretted it almost at once; she was very agitated and kept snatching the book back from him to check that she had got the answer completely right, finally hitting him hard on the nose with the sharp edge of Achievements in Charming.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Hermione enthusiastically studding for her O.W.L.s<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<p>Just after their class took their <a href="/wiki/Ordinary_Wizarding_Level" title="Ordinary Wizarding Level">O.W.L.s</a>, Harry had a vision of his godfather being tortured by Voldemort in the <a href="/wiki/Department_of_Mysteries" title="Department of Mysteries">Department of Mysteries</a>. Hermione was worried that it was a trap and convinced Harry to try to contact Sirius before doing anything rash. To that end, she accompanied Harry in an act of solidarity as he sneaked into Umbridge's office to use the <a href="/wiki/Floo_Network" title="Floo Network">Floo Network</a>, with the assistance of Ron, Ginny, and <a href="/wiki/Luna_Lovegood" title="Luna Lovegood">Luna Lovegood</a>, but they were ultimately caught. When Umbridge threatened to use the <a href="/wiki/Cruciatus_Curse" title="Cruciatus Curse">Cruciatus Curse</a> on Harry during questioning, Hermione interceded. She came up with a lie that she and her fellow D.A. members had been building a weapon for Dumbledore, thus stopping Umbridge's sadistic interrogation and attempted torture of Harry.
</p>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/12/Umbridge%2C_Harry_and_Hermione_in_the_Forbidden_Forest.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161002050941" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Umbridge, Harry and Hermione in the Forbidden Forest" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="116" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Umbridge, Harry and Hermione in the Forbidden Forest.jpg" data-image-key="Umbridge%2C_Harry_and_Hermione_in_the_Forbidden_Forest.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/12/Umbridge%2C_Harry_and_Hermione_in_the_Forbidden_Forest.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161002050941" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/12/Umbridge%2C_Harry_and_Hermione_in_the_Forbidden_Forest.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161002050941" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Umbridge, Harry and Hermione in the Forbidden Forest" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/12/Umbridge%2C_Harry_and_Hermione_in_the_Forbidden_Forest.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161002050941" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="116" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Umbridge, Harry and Hermione in the Forbidden Forest.jpg" data-image-key="Umbridge%2C_Harry_and_Hermione_in_the_Forbidden_Forest.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/12/Umbridge%2C_Harry_and_Hermione_in_the_Forbidden_Forest.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161002050941" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Umbridge,_Harry_and_Hermione_in_the_Forbidden_Forest.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Hermione and Harry lured Umbridge into the <a href="/wiki/Forbidden_Forest" title="Forbidden Forest">Forbidden Forest</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Hermione successfully lured Umbridge into the Forbidden Forest by saying that's where the weapon was hidden, where Umbridge was carried away by a herd of <a href="/wiki/Centaur" title="Centaur">centaurs</a>. She had predicted that the centaurs would let her and Harry go, since they did not insult the centaurs and were young enough to be considered 'foals'. However, the centaurs were already enraged by Umbridge and were further angered when Hermione admitted that she had hoped that they would drive Umbridge off, being insulted that they were thought of to do the bidding of humans. The centaurs were about to carry the two students off as well, but <a href="/wiki/Grawp" title="Grawp">Grawp</a> stumbled onto the scene and a <a href="/wiki/Skirmish_in_the_Forbidden_Forest" title="Skirmish in the Forbidden Forest">fight broke out</a> between the giant and the herd. This allowed Hermione and Harry to escape and meet up with Ron, Ginny, Luna, and Neville, who had escaped from the <a href="/wiki/Inquisitorial_Squad" title="Inquisitorial Squad">Inquisitorial Squad</a>.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Battle_of_the_Department_of_Mysteries">Battle of the Department of Mysteries</span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix"><b>Hermione Granger</b>: "<i>Voldemort knows you, Harry! He took <a href="/wiki/Ginevra_Weasley" title="Ginevra Weasley">Ginny</a> down into the <a href="/wiki/Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Chamber of Secrets">Chamber of Secrets</a> to lure you there, it's the kind of thing he does, he knows you're the — the sort of person who'd go to Sirius's aid! What if he's just trying to get </i>you<i> into the Department of Myst —?</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Harry Potter</b>: "<i>Hermione, it doesn't matter if he's done it to get me there or not — they've taken <a href="/wiki/Minerva_McGonagall" title="Minerva McGonagall">McGonagall</a> to <a href="/wiki/St_Mungo%27s_Hospital_for_Magical_Maladies_and_Injuries" title="St Mungo's Hospital for Magical Maladies and Injuries">St Mungo's</a>, there isn't anyone from the <a href="/wiki/Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Order of the Phoenix">Order</a> left at Hogwarts who we can tell, and if we don't go, Sirius is dead!</i>"</dd>
<dd>— After Harry had a vision of Sirius being tortured<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<p>After a brief argument between Harry and Neville over whether or not the others were going to travel with Harry to London, an understanding was reached. The six students <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_the_Department_of_Mysteries" title="Battle of the Department of Mysteries">flew</a> on <a href="/wiki/Thestral" title="Thestral">Thestrals</a> (which the majority, Hermione included, could not even see) to the <a href="/wiki/British_Ministry_of_Magic_headquarters" title="British Ministry of Magic headquarters">Ministry of Magic</a> to try to save Sirius from Voldemort and his Death Eaters.
</p>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 245px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/98/OOTP_Death_Chamber_trio_Ginny_Neville_Luna.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140912125022" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="OOTP Death Chamber trio Ginny Neville Luna" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="245" height="120" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="OOTP Death Chamber trio Ginny Neville Luna.gif" data-image-key="OOTP_Death_Chamber_trio_Ginny_Neville_Luna.gif" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/98/OOTP_Death_Chamber_trio_Ginny_Neville_Luna.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140912125022" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/98/OOTP_Death_Chamber_trio_Ginny_Neville_Luna.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140912125022" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="OOTP Death Chamber trio Ginny Neville Luna" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/98/OOTP_Death_Chamber_trio_Ginny_Neville_Luna.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140912125022" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="245" height="120" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="OOTP Death Chamber trio Ginny Neville Luna.gif" data-image-key="OOTP_Death_Chamber_trio_Ginny_Neville_Luna.gif" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/98/OOTP_Death_Chamber_trio_Ginny_Neville_Luna.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140912125022" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:OOTP_Death_Chamber_trio_Ginny_Neville_Luna.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The six D.A. members battling Death Eaters for possession of the prophecy</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Hermione's fear turned out to be justified, as Harry's vision was a ruse planted in his brain by Voldemort designed to lure him to the Ministry to obtain <a href="/wiki/Sybill_Trelawney%27s_prophecy_(1980)" title="Sybill Trelawney's prophecy (1980)">a prophecy</a> Voldemort sought. As soon as Harry did this, the six D.A. members were surrounded by <a href="/wiki/Death_Eaters" title="Death Eaters">Death Eaters</a>, and a battle ensued. Hermione <a href="/wiki/Stunning_Spell" title="Stunning Spell">stunned</a> <a href="/wiki/Nott" title="Nott">Nott</a> when he grabbed Harry, thus freeing him and causing Nott to be injured by the <a href="/wiki/Reductor_Curse" title="Reductor Curse">collapsing</a> shelves of prophecies. She later stunned another Death Eater and <a href="/wiki/Silencing_Charm" title="Silencing Charm">Silenced</a> <a href="/wiki/Antonin_Dolohov" title="Antonin Dolohov">Antonin Dolohov</a> before he could alert the other Death Eaters to the group's location. She was critically injured by the <a href="/wiki/Antonin_Dolohov%27s_curse" title="Antonin Dolohov's curse">curse</a> Dolohov subsequently struck her with, but made a full recovery.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP_32-3" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP-32"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>32<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Sixth_year">Sixth year</span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince"><b>Hermione</b>: "<i>It's <a href="/wiki/Amortentia" title="Amortentia">Amortentia</a>!</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Professor Slughorn</b>: "<i>It is indeed. It seems almost foolish to ask, but I assume you know what it does?</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Hermione</b>: "<i>It's the most powerful love potion in the world... and it's supposed to smell differently to each of us according to what attracts us, and I can smell freshly mown <a href="/wiki/Grass" title="Grass">grass</a> and new parchment and —</i>"</dd>
<dd>— Hermione possibly realising her feelings towards Ron<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-Blood_Prince" title="Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a Wheezes</a> for the first time</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Hermione achieved high academic prestige when she obtained ten <a href="/wiki/Ordinary_Wizarding_Level" title="Ordinary Wizarding Level">O.W.L.s</a>, in <a href="/wiki/Charms_(class)" title="Charms (class)">Charms</a>, <a href="/wiki/Defence_Against_the_Dark_Arts" title="Defence Against the Dark Arts">Defence Against the Dark Arts</a>, <a href="/wiki/Transfiguration_(class)" title="Transfiguration (class)">Transfiguration</a>, <a href="/wiki/Care_of_Magical_Creatures" title="Care of Magical Creatures">Care of Magical Creatures</a>, <a href="/wiki/Arithmancy" title="Arithmancy">Arithmancy</a>, <a href="/wiki/History_of_Magic" title="History of Magic">History of Magic</a>, <a href="/wiki/Herbology_(class)" title="Herbology (class)">Herbology</a>, <a href="/wiki/Astronomy_(class)" title="Astronomy (class)">Astronomy</a>, <a href="/wiki/Potions_(class)" title="Potions (class)">Potions</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Study_of_Ancient_Runes" title="Study of Ancient Runes">Ancient Runes</a>. She received '<a href="/wiki/Outstanding" title="Outstanding">Outstanding</a>' marks on each of them, except Defence Against the Dark Arts in which she received an '<a href="/wiki/Exceeds_Expectations" title="Exceeds Expectations">Exceeds Expectations</a>'. In total she achieved 10 O.W.L.s. Ron found it amusing that she actually seemed disappointed by this.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_36-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-36"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>36<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="N.E.W.T._classes">N.E.W.T. classes</span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Half-blood Prince">"<i>Oh, come off it. Yep — nine 'Outstandings' and one 'Exceeds Expectations' at Defence Against the Dark Arts. You're actually disappointed, aren't you?</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Hermione's O.W.L. results<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-blood_Prince" class="mw-redirect" title="Harry Potter and the Half-blood Prince">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/44/Hermione_brewing_Draught_of_Living_Death_HBP.gif/revision/latest?cb=20230808035925" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Hermione
