Death</a> in a N.E.W.T.-level Potions lesson</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>By the time they arrived in Hogwarts, Hermione's romantic feelings for Ron had become obvious. According to Harry the two seemed on their way to a romantic relationship. Hermione and <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron</a>'s relationship suffered greatly in their sixth year, when Ron became envious of both Hermione and <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter" title="Harry Potter">Harry</a>, who were invited to be members of the <a href="/wiki/Slug_Club" title="Slug Club">Slug Club</a>, a group of students favoured by <a href="/wiki/Potions_(class)" title="Potions (class)">Potions</a> professor <a href="/wiki/Horace_Slughorn" title="Horace Slughorn">Horace Slughorn</a>, while he was ignored. Hermione strongly disapproved of Harry using the textbook of the '<a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Half-Blood Prince</a>' to get ahead in <a href="/wiki/Potions_(class)" title="Potions (class)">Potions</a> unfairly, though she did not turn him in and indirectly found a <a href="/wiki/Eileen_Prince" title="Eileen Prince">clue</a> about the book owner. She was particularly alarmed by the increasingly Dark nature of the magic in the book, such as the spell <i><a href="/wiki/Laceration_Curse" title="Laceration Curse">Sectumsempra</a></i>.
</p>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/31/Harry-potter-half-blood-harry_hermione.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180305162549" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry-potter-half-blood-harry hermione" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="134" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry-potter-half-blood-harry hermione.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter-half-blood-harry_hermione.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/31/Harry-potter-half-blood-harry_hermione.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180305162549" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/31/Harry-potter-half-blood-harry_hermione.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180305162549" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry-potter-half-blood-harry hermione" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/31/Harry-potter-half-blood-harry_hermione.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180305162549" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="134" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry-potter-half-blood-harry hermione.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter-half-blood-harry_hermione.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/31/Harry-potter-half-blood-harry_hermione.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180305162549" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry-potter-half-blood-harry_hermione.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry comforting an upset Hermione after she witnessed Ron snogging Lavender</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>However, during an argument with his sister, Ginny mocked Ron about his inexperience with the opposite gender and told him that Hermione had kissed <a href="/wiki/Viktor_Krum" title="Viktor Krum">Viktor Krum</a> during their earlier romance. Ron subsequently began treating Hermione coldly, much to her bewilderment. She was upset when he and Lavender started flirting. When she found out about Ron's relationship with Lavender, she <a href="/wiki/Bird-Conjuring_Charm" title="Bird-Conjuring Charm">conjured a flock of wild birds</a> to <a href="/wiki/Oppugno_Jinx" title="Oppugno Jinx">attack</a> Ron for his insensitivity regarding her feelings. He became even angrier with her when she believed that Harry slipped Ron <a href="/wiki/Felix_Felicis" title="Felix Felicis">Felix Felicis</a> to assist in his <a href="/wiki/Quidditch" title="Quidditch">Quidditch</a>-playing abilities; despite having believed it initially himself, he accused her of having no faith in him when it was discovered that he had not been slipped the potion at all. 
</p><p>After this, Hermione attended Slughorn's <a href="/wiki/Slug_Club_Christmas_party" title="Slug Club Christmas party">Christmas party</a> with <a href="/wiki/Cormac_McLaggen" title="Cormac McLaggen">Cormac McLaggen</a> to get back at Ron, but it did not go well due to the former's impoliteness. Afterwards, Ron (who was relieved that Hermione and McLaggen's date did not go well) attempted to speak to Hermione, but she ignored him, still upset and angry over his previous treatment of her.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_36-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-36"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>36<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> This behaviour persisted for quite sometime.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Reconciliation_with_Ron">Reconciliation with Ron</span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Half-blood Prince">"<i>Hermione gave an almost inaudible sniff. She had been exceptionally quiet all day. Having hurtled, white-faced, up to Harry outside the hospital wing and demanded to know what had happened, she had taken almost no part in Harry and <a href="/wiki/Ginevra_Weasley" title="Ginevra Weasley">Ginny</a>'s obsessive discussion about how Ron had been poisoned, but merely stood beside them, clench-jawed and frightened-looking, until at last they had been allowed in to see him.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Hermione visiting Ron in the hospital after he was poisoned<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-blood_Prince" class="mw-redirect" title="Harry Potter and the Half-blood Prince">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3d/Poppy_Pomfrey_-_Ron_Weasley.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160830010138" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Poppy Pomfrey - Ron Weasley" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="117" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Poppy Pomfrey - Ron Weasley.jpg" data-image-key="Poppy_Pomfrey_-_Ron_Weasley.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3d/Poppy_Pomfrey_-_Ron_Weasley.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160830010138" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3d/Poppy_Pomfrey_-_Ron_Weasley.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160830010138" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Poppy Pomfrey - Ron Weasley" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3d/Poppy_Pomfrey_-_Ron_Weasley.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160830010138" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="117" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Poppy Pomfrey - Ron Weasley.jpg" data-image-key="Poppy_Pomfrey_-_Ron_Weasley.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3d/Poppy_Pomfrey_-_Ron_Weasley.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160830010138" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Poppy_Pomfrey_-_Ron_Weasley.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Poppy_Pomfrey" title="Poppy Pomfrey">Madam Pomfrey</a> checking on a poisoned Ron, while Hermione, Harry, and Ginny are sitting by his bedside</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>The two reconciled after Ron was hospitalised due to consuming poisoned mead, an event that left Hermione shaken and frightened. After the incident she remained unusually quiet and subdued. Whilst sitting at Ron's bedside, Ron subconsciously muttered Hermione's name. By this time, Ron was visibly disillusioned with his relationship with <a href="/wiki/Lavender_Brown" title="Lavender Brown">Lavender</a>, who had become possessive of him and called him by the annoying nickname '<i>Won-Won</i>'. He was also pleased whenever Hermione visited him in the hospital wing. 
</p><p>He began avoiding Lavender, who soon became suspicious of his relationship with Hermione, ultimately leading to an argument about her. After Lavender saw Ron and Hermione come down alone from the boys' dormitories (Harry was present also, but under the <a href="/wiki/Cloak_of_Invisibility" title="Cloak of Invisibility">invisibility cloak</a>), she had a fight with Ron and broke up with him. When Ron told Harry and Hermione about breaking up with Lavender, Harry could have sworn he saw Hermione smirk.
</p>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/30/Harry-potter-half-blood-textbook.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180320204539" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry-potter-half-blood-textbook" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry-potter-half-blood-textbook.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter-half-blood-textbook.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/30/Harry-potter-half-blood-textbook.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180320204539" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/30/Harry-potter-half-blood-textbook.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180320204539" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry-potter-half-blood-textbook" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/30/Harry-potter-half-blood-textbook.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180320204539" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry-potter-half-blood-textbook.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter-half-blood-textbook.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/30/Harry-potter-half-blood-textbook.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180320204539" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry-potter-half-blood-textbook.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Hermione and Ron discussing the Half-Blood Prince</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Afterwards, Hermione and Ron were more comfortable together, and their relationship improved considerably, although a romantic relationship remained out of their reach. Hermione comforted Ron after he failed his <a href="/wiki/Apparition_(class)" title="Apparition (class)">Apparition</a> test because he <a href="/wiki/Splinching" title="Splinching">Splinched</a> half an eyebrow, while he teased her about the <a href="/wiki/Wilkie_Twycross" title="Wilkie Twycross">instructor</a>'s praise for her flawless performance. That year, Hermione also quickly mastered <a href="/wiki/Nonverbal_spell" title="Nonverbal spell">nonverbal magic</a>, the first in her class to do so. 
</p><p>Throughout the year, Hermione and Ron were both sceptical of Harry's theory that <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy" title="Draco Malfoy">Draco Malfoy</a> had been branded with the <a href="/wiki/Dark_Mark" title="Dark Mark">Dark Mark</a> and was up to something. Moreover, she was confident that Malfoy couldn't have brought any Dark objects into Hogwarts without alerting <a href="/wiki/Argus_Filch" title="Argus Filch">Filch</a>. These claims were heard by Draco himself, who used these details and Hermione's previous plan of communication to accomplish his own.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Battle_of_the_Astronomy_Tower">Battle of the Astronomy Tower</span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Half-blood Prince">"<i>Outside Snape's office, yes, with Luna. We hung around for ages outside it and nothing happened... We didn't know what was going on upstairs, Ron had taken the map... It was nearly midnight when Professor Flitwick came sprinting down into the dungeons. He was shouting about Death Eaters in the castle, I don't think he really registered that Luna and I were there at all, he just burst his way into Snape's office and we heard him saying that Snape had to go back with him and help and then we heard a loud thump and Snape came hurtling out of his room and he saw us and — I was so stupid, Harry! He said Professor Flitwick had collapsed and that we should go and take care of him while he — while he went to help fight the Death Eaters —</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Hermione's participation in the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_the_Astronomy_Tower" title="Battle of the Astronomy Tower">Battle of the Astronomy Tower</a><sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-blood_Prince" class="mw-redirect" title="Harry Potter and the Half-blood Prince">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d9/Hermione_mourning_Dumbledore.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180528011647" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Hermione mourning Dumbledore" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Hermione mourning Dumbledore.jpg" data-image-key="Hermione_mourning_Dumbledore.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d9/Hermione_mourning_Dumbledore.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180528011647" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d9/Hermione_mourning_Dumbledore.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180528011647" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Hermione mourning Dumbledore" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d9/Hermione_mourning_Dumbledore.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180528011647" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Hermione mourning Dumbledore.jpg" data-image-key="Hermione_mourning_Dumbledore.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d9/Hermione_mourning_Dumbledore.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180528011647" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Hermione_mourning_Dumbledore.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">A tearful Hermione standing at the base of the <a href="/wiki/Astronomy_Tower" title="Astronomy Tower">Astronomy Tower</a> after Dumbledore's death</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Near the end of the school year, Harry's suspicions would be proven right. Malfoy let Death Eaters into the school by means of a pair of vanishing cabinets. One cabinet resided in <a href="/wiki/Borgin_and_Burkes" title="Borgin and Burkes">Borgin and Burkes</a> and the other in the Room of Hidden Things (as it had been presumed broken, but Malfoy managed to fix it). This infiltration of <a href="/wiki/Death_Eaters" title="Death Eaters">Death Eaters</a> resulted in the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_the_Astronomy_Tower" title="Battle of the Astronomy Tower">Battle of the Astronomy Tower</a>. Hermione fought in the battle and remained unscathed thanks to some <a href="/wiki/Felix_Felicis" title="Felix Felicis">Felix Felicis</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_36-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-36"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>36<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> This was a gift from Harry, who had won it in a Potions competition and had a preconceived notion of what was going to happen. He told Hermione, Ron, and Ginny to drink it beforehand in case his worries proved true.
</p>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/06/B6C30M1_funeral_of_Albus_Dumbledore.png/revision/latest?cb=20161209004341" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B6C30M1 funeral of Albus Dumbledore" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="98" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B6C30M1 funeral of Albus Dumbledore.png" data-image-key="B6C30M1_funeral_of_Albus_Dumbledore.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/06/B6C30M1_funeral_of_Albus_Dumbledore.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161209004341" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/06/B6C30M1_funeral_of_Albus_Dumbledore.png/revision/latest?cb=20161209004341" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B6C30M1 funeral of Albus Dumbledore" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/06/B6C30M1_funeral_of_Albus_Dumbledore.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161209004341" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="98" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B6C30M1 funeral of Albus Dumbledore.png" data-image-key="B6C30M1_funeral_of_Albus_Dumbledore.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/06/B6C30M1_funeral_of_Albus_Dumbledore.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161209004341" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B6C30M1_funeral_of_Albus_Dumbledore.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The funeral of Albus Dumbledore</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Throughout the school year, Hermione and Ron had been informed of the content of Harry's private lessons with Dumbledore. Through these lessons Harry, and in turn Hermione and Ron, learned about the existence of Lord Voldemort's <a href="/wiki/Horcrux" title="Horcrux">Horcruxes</a>. During the <a href="/wiki/Funeral_of_Albus_Dumbledore" title="Funeral of Albus Dumbledore">funeral</a> of <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Albus Dumbledore</a>, who had been killed by Snape in the Battle of the Astronomy Tower, Hermione was comforted by Ron and cried on his shoulder. Afterwards, Harry told them about his desire to drop out of Hogwarts to hunt Horcruxes, which were the key to defeating <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Lord Voldemort</a>. Despite his protests, Hermione and Ron promised to forgo their seventh year at Hogwarts in order to assist Harry. Before leaving the school, Hermione was able to <a href="/wiki/Summoning_Charm" title="Summoning Charm">Summon</a> books about Horcruxes so as to learn how to destroy the items. She found them in Dumbledore's office, where the late headmaster had kept them after the subject had been banned at Hogwarts.
</p>
<h3><span id="Horcrux_hunt_.281997.E2.80.931998.29"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Horcrux_hunt_(1997–1998)">Horcrux hunt <span class="template-c">(1997–1998)</span></span></h3>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source:  Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows"><b>Harry Potter</b>: "<i>Listen!</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Hermione</b>: "<i>No, Harry, </i>you<i> listen. We're coming with you. That was decided months ago — years, really.</i>"</dd>
<dd>— Hermione sticking by her vow to accompany Harry on his hunt<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/df/Harry-potter-deathly-hallows1-memory_charm.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160714024300" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry-potter-deathly-hallows1-memory charm" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="107" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry-potter-deathly-hallows1-memory charm.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter-deathly-hallows1-memory_charm.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/df/Harry-potter-deathly-hallows1-memory_charm.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160714024300" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/df/Harry-potter-deathly-hallows1-memory_charm.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160714024300" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry-potter-deathly-hallows1-memory charm" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/df/Harry-potter-deathly-hallows1-memory_charm.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160714024300" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="107" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry-potter-deathly-hallows1-memory charm.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter-deathly-hallows1-memory_charm.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/df/Harry-potter-deathly-hallows1-memory_charm.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160714024300" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry-potter-deathly-hallows1-memory_charm.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Hermione modifying her parents' memories</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Hermione began planning for her journey with <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter" title="Harry Potter">Harry</a> and <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron</a> immediately. Concerned for the safety of her family, she <a href="/wiki/False_memory_spell" title="False memory spell">altered</a> her parents' memories to make them think they were Wendell and Monica Wilkins and sent them to hide in <a href="/wiki/Australia" title="Australia">Australia</a>, no longer aware of their original identities, the existence of their daughter, or anything she had told them about Harry. She also withdrew all of her savings at her <a href="/wiki/Building_society" title="Building society">building society</a> account, in event of a need for Muggle money.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_10-3" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-10"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>10<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>. 
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Battle_of_the_Seven_Potters">Battle of the Seven Potters</span></h4>
<dl><dd><div class="noprint"><i>Main article: <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_the_Seven_Potters" title="Battle of the Seven Potters">Battle of the Seven Potters</a></i></div></dd></dl>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">"<i>And then, out of nowhere, out of nothing, they were surrounded. At least thirty <a href="/wiki/Death_Eaters" title="Death Eaters">hooded figures</a>, suspended in midair, formed a vast circle in the midst of which the Order members had risen, oblivious —</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Opening stage of the sky battle<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/bc/B7C4M1_Seven_Potters_depart.png/revision/latest?cb=20170106051900" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B7C4M1 Seven Potters depart" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="98" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B7C4M1 Seven Potters depart.png" data-image-key="B7C4M1_Seven_Potters_depart.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/bc/B7C4M1_Seven_Potters_depart.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170106051900" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/bc/B7C4M1_Seven_Potters_depart.png/revision/latest?cb=20170106051900" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B7C4M1 Seven Potters depart" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/bc/B7C4M1_Seven_Potters_depart.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170106051900" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="98" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B7C4M1 Seven Potters depart.png" data-image-key="B7C4M1_Seven_Potters_depart.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/bc/B7C4M1_Seven_Potters_depart.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170106051900" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B7C4M1_Seven_Potters_depart.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The seven Potters and their protectors right before the sky battle</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Hermione then joined the <a href="/wiki/Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Order of the Phoenix">Order of the Phoenix</a> in the operation to remove Harry from 4 Privet Drive before his 17th birthday, taking Polyjuice Potion to become one of the 'seven Potters'. Hermione flew on a <a href="/wiki/Thestral" title="Thestral">Thestral</a> with <a href="/wiki/Kingsley_Shacklebolt" title="Kingsley Shacklebolt">Kingsley Shacklebolt</a>. The two fought off at least five <a href="/wiki/Death_Eaters" title="Death Eaters">Death Eaters</a>, possibly killing one, injuring two, and were pursued by Lord Voldemort himself at one point. In time, they arrived safely at <a href="/wiki/The_Burrow" title="The Burrow">The Burrow</a>, where Hermione was immensely relieved to see Harry alive and ran to him and hugged him tight, but she was greatly worried when Ron did not show up on time. When he landed, she ran and nuzzled him in relief. She was saddened by the news of <a href="/wiki/Alastor_Moody" title="Alastor Moody">Alastor Moody</a> and <a href="/wiki/Hedwig" title="Hedwig">Hedwig</a>'s murders and disturbed by Harry's vision of <a href="/wiki/Garrick_Ollivander" title="Garrick Ollivander">Garrick Ollivander</a> being <a href="/wiki/Cruciatus_Curse" title="Cruciatus Curse">tortured</a>.
</p>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7a/DH1_HQ_still_Scrimgeour_Trio.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20190128225544" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="DH1 HQ still Scrimgeour Trio" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="167" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="DH1 HQ still Scrimgeour Trio.jpg" data-image-key="DH1_HQ_still_Scrimgeour_Trio.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7a/DH1_HQ_still_Scrimgeour_Trio.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190128225544" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7a/DH1_HQ_still_Scrimgeour_Trio.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20190128225544" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="DH1 HQ still Scrimgeour Trio" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7a/DH1_HQ_still_Scrimgeour_Trio.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190128225544" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="167" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="DH1 HQ still Scrimgeour Trio.jpg" data-image-key="DH1_HQ_still_Scrimgeour_Trio.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7a/DH1_HQ_still_Scrimgeour_Trio.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190128225544" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:DH1_HQ_still_Scrimgeour_Trio.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Scrimgeour giving the trio the items left for them in Albus Dumbledore's will</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Later on, the <a href="/wiki/Minister_for_Magic" title="Minister for Magic">Minister for Magic</a>, <a href="/wiki/Rufus_Scrimgeour" title="Rufus Scrimgeour">Rufus Scrimgeour</a>, interrupted Harry's birthday celebrations to execute <a href="/wiki/The_Last_Will_and_Testament_of_Albus_Percival_Wulfric_Brian_Dumbledore" title="The Last Will and Testament of Albus Percival Wulfric Brian Dumbledore">Albus Dumbledore's will</a> and bequeath some of his belongings to the three friends. Hermione received <i><a href="/wiki/The_Tales_of_Beedle_the_Bard" title="The Tales of Beedle the Bard">The Tales of Beedle the Bard</a></i>, a book of children's stories written in runes. Even before Hermione understood the priceless quality of the gift, she was moved to tears by Dumbledore's great act of friendship. During the reading of Dumbledore's will, she also displayed her incredible store of general knowledge when she mentioned that '<i>Snitches have flesh memories</i>', surprising both Ron and Harry, who had both believed her to know little to nothing of <a href="/wiki/Quidditch" title="Quidditch">Quidditch</a>.
</p><p>At Bill Weasley and Fleur Delacour's <a href="/wiki/Wedding_of_William_Weasley_and_Fleur_Delacour" title="Wedding of William Weasley and Fleur Delacour">wedding</a> on 1 August 1997, Hermione wore a '<i>floaty, lilac-coloured dress with matching high heels</i>' and made her hair '<i>sleek and shiny</i>'. She was amused by <a href="/wiki/Fred_Weasley" title="Fred Weasley">Fred</a> and <a href="/wiki/George_Weasley" title="George Weasley">George</a>'s stories about their late uncle <a href="/wiki/Bilius" title="Bilius">Bilius</a> and shared a friendly exchange with <a href="/wiki/Viktor_Krum" title="Viktor Krum">Viktor Krum</a>, to the frustration of Ron. She was happily surprised when Ron quickly asked her to dance, and when Krum asked a disguised Harry whether the two were together, Harry replied '<i>Er... sort of.</i>'<sup id="cite_ref-DH_10-4" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-10"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>10<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Time_at_The_Burrow">Time at The Burrow</span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">"<i>Undetectable Extension Charm. Tricky, but I think I've done it okay; anyway, I managed to fit everything we need in here... I told you at The Burrow, I've had the essentials packed for days, you know, in case we needed to make a quick getaway.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Hermione having the foresight to have supplies packed in advance<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c4/Harry-potter-and-the-deathly-hallows-part-i-20100922043334092.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180310235219" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry-potter-and-the-deathly-hallows-part-i-20100922043334092" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="121" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry-potter-and-the-deathly-hallows-part-i-20100922043334092.jpg" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry-potter-and-the-deathly-hallows-part-i-20100922043334092.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use Ministry's fall</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>The wedding was interrupted by Kingsley Shacklebolt's Patronus who told the guests of the fall of the <a href="/wiki/British_Ministry_of_Magic" title="British Ministry of Magic">Ministry of Magic</a>. Hermione was prepared to make a quick escape, immediately Disapparating herself, Harry, and Ron away from the danger. Hermione also showed great foresight and magical talent when she revealed a small beaded purse on which she had placed an <a href="/wiki/Extension_Charm" title="Extension Charm">Undetectable Extension Charm</a>. Within it she had packed, amongst other things, clothing, a tent, healing supplies, Harry's <a href="/wiki/Cloak_of_Invisibility" title="Cloak of Invisibility">Invisibility Cloak</a>, and several useful books. They arrived on the Muggle street, <a href="/wiki/Tottenham_Court_Road" title="Tottenham Court Road">Tottenham Court Road</a>, where Hermione suggested they enter a café, as a means to get out of the open.
</p>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 245px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/01/Hermione_duelling_Dolohov.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140907215707" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Hermione duelling Dolohov" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="245" height="130" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Hermione duelling Dolohov.gif" data-image-key="Hermione_duelling_Dolohov.gif" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/01/Hermione_duelling_Dolohov.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140907215707" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/01/Hermione_duelling_Dolohov.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140907215707" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Hermione duelling Dolohov" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/01/Hermione_duelling_Dolohov.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140907215707" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="245" height="130" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Hermione duelling Dolohov.gif" data-image-key="Hermione_duelling_Dolohov.gif" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/01/Hermione_duelling_Dolohov.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140907215707" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Hermione_duelling_Dolohov.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Hermione casting <i>Petrificus Totalus</i> on Antonin Dolohov</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>However, minutes later Hermione unknowingly triggered the <a href="/wiki/Taboo" title="Taboo">Taboo</a> jinx that was placed on Voldemort's name, and the trio were thus tracked down by <a href="/wiki/Antonin_Dolohov" title="Antonin Dolohov">Antonin Dolohov</a> and <a href="/wiki/Thorfinn_Rowle" title="Thorfinn Rowle">Thorfinn Rowle</a>. After a brief but violent <a href="/wiki/Luchino_Caffe_Duel" title="Luchino Caffe Duel">skirmish</a>, the Death Eaters were subdued, and Hermione modified their memories to throw them off the scent and to maintain Ron's cover story that he was sick with <a href="/wiki/Spattergroit" title="Spattergroit">spattergroit</a> and bedridden at home. At Harry's suggestion the three then made their way safely to 12 Grimmauld Place, as they could not hide anywhere within the wizarding world.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_10-5" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-10"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>10<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Infiltrating_the_Ministry_of_Magic">Infiltrating the Ministry of Magic</span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows"><b>Harry Potter</b>: "<i>This is mental.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Hermione</b>: "<i>Completely mental.</i>"</dd>
<dd>— The trio's mutual feelings on the infiltration plan<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<p>After learning from <a href="/wiki/Mundungus_Fletcher" title="Mundungus Fletcher">Mundungus Fletcher</a> that Dolores Umbridge had Tom Riddle's mother's locket - one of the seven Horcruxes - in her possession, the trio formed a plan to infiltrate the Ministry and reclaim the locket. Hermione imbibed Polyjuice Potion and transformed to look like <a href="/wiki/Mafalda_Hopkirk" title="Mafalda Hopkirk">Mafalda Hopkirk</a>, a prominent Ministry official. She was forced to sit through the trials of <a href="/wiki/Alderton" title="Alderton">Alderton</a> and <a href="/wiki/Mary_Cattermole" title="Mary Cattermole">Mary Cattermole</a>, innocent Muggle-borns, right alongside Umbridge and Death Eater <a href="/wiki/Corban_Yaxley" title="Corban Yaxley">Yaxley</a>. Hermione tricked Umbridge into telling her about the locket, which she claimed was a Selwyn family heirloom.
</p>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/12/B7C13M1_Harry_Potter%27s_Patronus_saving_Marry_Cattermole.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180424032414" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B7C13M1 Harry Potter's Patronus saving Marry Cattermole" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry casting his Patronus at <a href="/wiki/Dementor" title="Dementor">Dementors</a> while in the trial courtroom, before capturing the locket</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>When Harry attacked Umbridge in a rage, their cover was blown, but she and Harry managed to free the Muggle-born prisoners and encouraged them to flee the country while Voldemort was in power. Hermione took the locket from Umbridge, replacing it with a copy using the <a href="/wiki/Doubling_Charm" title="Doubling Charm">Geminio</a> spell. They met up with Ron again and fled the Ministry, but Yaxley grabbed onto Hermione's arm while they were Disapparating. This meant that he was unwittingly brought inside the enchantment making Grimmauld Place undetectable, and forced Hermione to use a <a href="/wiki/Revulsion_Jinx" title="Revulsion Jinx">Revulsion Jinx</a> to free herself from him, and then to take the trio away from Grimmauld Place.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_10-6" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-10"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>10<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h4><span id="Ron.27s_departure_and_Godric.27s_Hollow"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Ron's_departure_and_Godric's_Hollow">Ron's departure and Godric's Hollow</span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows"><b>Ron Weasley</b>: "<i>What are you doing? Are you staying, or what?</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Hermione</b>: "<i>I... Yes — yes, I'm staying. Ron, we said we'd go with Harry, we said we'd help —</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Ron Weasley</b>: "<i>I get it. You choose him.</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Hermione</b>: "<i>Ron, no — please — come back, come back!</i>"</dd>
<dd>— Hermione keeping her promise to Harry shortly before Ron's departure<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 245px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/75/Harry_ron_fight.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140905115741" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry ron fight" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="245" height="120" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry ron fight.gif" data-image-key="Harry_ron_fight.gif" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/75/Harry_ron_fight.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140905115741" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/75/Harry_ron_fight.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140905115741" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry ron fight" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/75/Harry_ron_fight.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140905115741" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="245" height="120" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry ron fight.gif" data-image-key="Harry_ron_fight.gif" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/75/Harry_ron_fight.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140905115741" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_ron_fight.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry and Ron rowing before Ron abandoned the hunt</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>The locket caused great pain among the three friends due to the negative energy within. They began arguing over petty issues such as cooking, and growing moodier. The negative energy from the locket caused Ron to accuse Harry of poor leadership. They fought physically, resulting in Hermione having to stop them before they could start casting spells by casting a <a href="/wiki/Shield_Charm" title="Shield Charm">Shield Charm</a> between them. Ron also accused Hermione of choosing Harry over him, causing him to be jealous and feel left out by his two friends' growing friendship. He declared he was leaving and stormed out of the tent.
</p><p>By the time she got rid of the shield charm, all Hermione could do was scream for him to come back, without success. Hermione then cried over Ron for more than a week after his departure, although she tried to hide it from Harry. Both were deeply saddened and hurt by their friend's departure, Hermione more than Harry, as she cried over Ron's departure for weeks. With Ron gone, Hermione and Harry's evenings were spent in mostly silence, while they contemplated Ron's abandonment and the places Voldemort's remaining Horcruxes might be hidden.
</p>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d2/Hermione_godric%27s_hollow.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180310232353" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Hermione godric's hollow" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="107" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Hermione godric's hollow.jpg" data-image-key="Hermione_godric%27s_hollow.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d2/Hermione_godric%27s_hollow.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180310232353" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d2/Hermione_godric%27s_hollow.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180310232353" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Hermione godric's hollow" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d2/Hermione_godric%27s_hollow.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180310232353" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="107" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Hermione godric's hollow.jpg" data-image-key="Hermione_godric%27s_hollow.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d2/Hermione_godric%27s_hollow.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180310232353" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Hermione_godric%27s_hollow.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Hermione in Bathilda Bagshot's cottage, holding the <i><a href="/wiki/The_Life_and_Lies_of_Albus_Dumbledore" title="The Life and Lies of Albus Dumbledore">The Life and Lies of Albus Dumbledore</a></i></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Hermione and Harry soon decided to go to <a href="/wiki/Godric%27s_Hollow" title="Godric's Hollow">Godric's Hollow</a>, to see the graves of Harry's parents and to speak to historian <a href="/wiki/Bathilda_Bagshot" title="Bathilda Bagshot">Bathilda Bagshot</a>. They believed Bathilda might be holding onto <a href="/wiki/Sword_of_Gryffindor" title="Sword of Gryffindor">Godric Gryffindor's Sword</a> for Harry, as they thought Dumbledore might have left it with her as an old family friend, knowing it was the only method the trio knew for destroying a Horcrux. Hermione comforted Harry in the graveyard when they found the <a href="/wiki/James_and_Lily_Potter%27s_grave" title="James and Lily Potter's grave">Potters' graves</a>; she nuzzled her head in to the crook between his head and shoulders and conjured roses for the graves. On their way out of the graveyard they came into contact with what appeared to be Bathilda. 
</p><p>The pair then went to Bathilda's house; whilst in the house they were separated. Harry witnessed a giant snake pouring from the neck of Bathilda's body and was attacked by <a href="/wiki/Nagini" title="Nagini">Nagini</a> upstairs. Nagini had been waiting for them in the guise of the old woman, whose corpse had been animated like an <a href="/wiki/Inferius" title="Inferius">Inferius</a> by Voldemort. Hermione rushed to Harry's aid and proceeded to save his life by casting a Blasting Cure, which ricocheted around the room. The two of them barely escaped before Lord Voldemort himself arrived at the cabin in an attempt to capture Harry.
</p>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b8/Harry_and_Hermione_in_the_Forest_of_Dean_DHF1.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160303145232" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry and Hermione in the Forest of Dean DHF1" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="112" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b8/Harry_and_Hermione_in_the_Forest_of_Dean_DHF1.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160303145232" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_and_Hermione_in_the_Forest_of_Dean_DHF1.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry and Hermione talking about Albus Dumbledore in the forest of Dean</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Hermione <a href="/wiki/Apparition" title="Apparition">Apparated</a> to the <a href="/wiki/Forest_of_Dean" title="Forest of Dean">Forest of Dean</a>, while Harry was overcome with pain and visions of Voldemort's attack on his parents and him in 1981. She used a <a href="/wiki/Severing_Charm" title="Severing Charm">Severing Charm</a> to remove the locket from Harry and healed the bite Nagini had given him with dittany. Harry's wand had also been broken in the foray, most likely by the <a href="/wiki/Blasting_Curse" title="Blasting Curse">Blasting Curse</a> Hermione cast at Nagini. Hermione was very upset a the thought that it was her curse that broke Harry's wand. Harry was heartbroken, but not angry with her, knowing that it was an accident and that Hermione had saved his life and therefore could not hold it against her.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_10-7" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-10"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>10<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h4><span id="Ron.27s_return_and_visit_to_the_Lovegood_House"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Ron's_return_and_visit_to_the_Lovegood_House">Ron's return and visit to the Lovegood House</span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows"><b>Hermione</b>: "<i>Hand over Harry?</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Ron Weasley </b>: "<i>No deal, get out of the way, we're leaving.</i>"</dd>
<dd>— Hermione and Ron refusing to hand Harry over to Voldemort<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
