src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/6f/Hermione_Granger_in_the_Forest_of_Dean_after_Ron%27s_return_DHF1.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20110425152029" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Hermione Granger in the Forest of Dean after Ron's return DHF1.jpg" data-image-key="Hermione_Granger_in_the_Forest_of_Dean_after_Ron%27s_return_DHF1.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/6f/Hermione_Granger_in_the_Forest_of_Dean_after_Ron%27s_return_DHF1.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20110425152029" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Hermione_Granger_in_the_Forest_of_Dean_after_Ron%27s_return_DHF1.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Hermione still upset with Ron even after his return</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Ron reunited with Harry and Hermione in the Forest of Dean, after Ron heard them talking through the <a href="/wiki/Deluminator" title="Deluminator">Deluminator</a> Dumbledore had left him. Ron destroyed the locket Horcrux with Godric Gryffindor's Sword, which had been left by an unknown assistant in a pool in the Forest, saving Harry's life and thus receiving forgiveness from Harry for leaving. Before he destroyed it, however, the locket revealed some of Ron's deepest fears, including that Hermione preferred Harry to him. Hermione, however, was unaware of this, as she had been in the tent while this occurred.
</p><p>Upon seeing Ron, she screamed at Ron despite Harry trying to tell her that Ron just saved his life, and punched him until Harry cast a shield charm between them with Hermione's wand. She was furious with Ron for days for his abandonment, but gradually warmed up to him again.
</p>
<dl><dd><div class="noprint"><i>Main article: <a href="/wiki/Ambush_at_the_Lovegood_House" title="Ambush at the Lovegood House">Ambush at the Lovegood House</a></i></div></dd></dl>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/80/Xenophilius-Lovegood.png/revision/latest?cb=20141031144607" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Xenophilius-Lovegood" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="113" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Xenophilius-Lovegood.png" data-image-key="Xenophilius-Lovegood.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/80/Xenophilius-Lovegood.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20141031144607" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/80/Xenophilius-Lovegood.png/revision/latest?cb=20141031144607" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Xenophilius-Lovegood" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/80/Xenophilius-Lovegood.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20141031144607" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="113" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Xenophilius-Lovegood.png" data-image-key="Xenophilius-Lovegood.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/80/Xenophilius-Lovegood.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20141031144607" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Xenophilius-Lovegood.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The trio speaking with Xenophilius Lovegood at his home, near the village of <a href="/wiki/Ottery_St_Catchpole" title="Ottery St Catchpole">Ottery St Catchpole</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>The trio then travelled together to <a href="/wiki/Xenophilius_Lovegood" title="Xenophilius Lovegood">Xenophilius Lovegood</a>'s home to ask him about the strange symbol in <i>The Tales of Beedle the Bard</i>, which Xenophilius had worn on a chain around his neck at Bill and Fleur's wedding. They had thought it to be the sign of the <a href="/wiki/Dark_wizard" title="Dark wizard">Dark wizard</a> <a href="/wiki/Gellert_Grindelwald" title="Gellert Grindelwald">Gellert Grindelwald</a> after Krum recognised it at the wedding (Grindelwald being a former Durmstrang student), but Xenophilius informed them it was the symbol of the <a href="/wiki/Deathly_Hallows" title="Deathly Hallows">Deathly Hallows</a>. Shortly after making this discovery, Harry realised that Luna wasn't at home, despite it being the Christmas holidays, and had been away for a long time. Xenophilius revealed to them that Luna had been taken prisoner by Death Eaters and that he planned to betray them in order to get her back.
</p>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/da/Ambush_at_Lovegood_house1.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160601024538" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Ambush at Lovegood house1" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="109" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Ambush at Lovegood house1.jpg" data-image-key="Ambush_at_Lovegood_house1.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/da/Ambush_at_Lovegood_house1.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160601024538" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/da/Ambush_at_Lovegood_house1.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160601024538" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Ambush at Lovegood house1" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/da/Ambush_at_Lovegood_house1.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160601024538" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="109" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Ambush at Lovegood house1.jpg" data-image-key="Ambush_at_Lovegood_house1.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/da/Ambush_at_Lovegood_house1.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160601024538" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Ambush_at_Lovegood_house1.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Death Eaters ambushing the trio while they were inside the Lovegood home</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>However, in attempting to capture them, Xenophilius made the <a href="/wiki/Erumpent" title="Erumpent">Erumpent</a> horn in his living room (which he had insisted was a Snorkack horn, much to Hermione's annoyance) explode, giving the trio the chance to hide just as Death Eaters <a href="/wiki/Selwyn" title="Selwyn">Selwyn</a> and <a href="/wiki/Travers" title="Travers">Travers</a> arrived. They threatened to kill Luna if they found that Xenophilius had lied about Harry Potter's presence in his home. In a remarkable show of mental and magical dexterity, Hermione concocted the trio's escape while safeguarding Ron's feigned illness and allowing the Death Eaters to glimpse Harry, so that they would not carry out their threat to kill Luna.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_10-8" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-10"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>10<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Skirmish_at_Malfoy_Manor">Skirmish at Malfoy Manor</span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">"<i>You're lying, filthy Mudblood, and I know it! You have been inside my vault at Gringotts!... What else did you take? Tell me the truth or, I swear, I shall run you through with this knife! What else did you take, what else? ANSWER ME! </i>CRUCIO<i>! How did you get into my vault? Did that dirty little <a href="/wiki/Goblin" title="Goblin">goblin</a> in the cellar help you?</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Overheard parts of Hermione's brutal interrogation<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<p>In the spring of 1998, Harry accidentally triggered the Taboo jinx and Hermione, Harry, and Ron were tracked down and captured by a group of <a href="/wiki/Snatchers" title="Snatchers">Snatchers</a>, which included the <a href="/wiki/Werewolf" title="Werewolf">werewolf</a> <a href="/wiki/Fenrir_Greyback" title="Fenrir Greyback">Fenrir Greyback</a>. Greyback had developed cannibalistic tendencies when out of werewolf form and was eager to bite Hermione. After a brief and violent interrogation by the Snatchers, the captives were brought to Malfoy Manor and turned over to <a href="/wiki/Bellatrix_Lestrange" title="Bellatrix Lestrange">Bellatrix Lestrange</a>. Bellatrix immediately panicked at the sight of Godric Gryffindor's Sword and incapacitated the Snatchers with ease, as she was too quick for them. She then ordered them moved to the courtyard where she would deal with them later.
</p>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c5/Harry-potter-deathly-hallows1-movie-screencaps.com-14694.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170717220831" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry-potter-deathly-hallows1-movie-screencaps.com-14694" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="105" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry-potter-deathly-hallows1-movie-screencaps.com-14694.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter-deathly-hallows1-movie-screencaps.com-14694.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c5/Harry-potter-deathly-hallows1-movie-screencaps.com-14694.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170717220831" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c5/Harry-potter-deathly-hallows1-movie-screencaps.com-14694.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170717220831" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry-potter-deathly-hallows1-movie-screencaps.com-14694" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c5/Harry-potter-deathly-hallows1-movie-screencaps.com-14694.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170717220831" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="105" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry-potter-deathly-hallows1-movie-screencaps.com-14694.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter-deathly-hallows1-movie-screencaps.com-14694.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c5/Harry-potter-deathly-hallows1-movie-screencaps.com-14694.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170717220831" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry-potter-deathly-hallows1-movie-screencaps.com-14694.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Bellatrix Lestrange torturing Hermione in Malfoy Manor</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Bellatrix gave away that what she believed to be the sword and another Horcrux were hidden in her vault at <a href="/wiki/Gringotts_Wizarding_Bank" title="Gringotts Wizarding Bank">Gringotts</a> in her panic. She proceeded to isolate Hermione and then brutally torture her with the <a href="/wiki/Cruciatus_Curse" title="Cruciatus Curse">Cruciatus Curse</a> repeatedly along with taking a dagger and cutting the word Mudblood into her arm as interrogation methods. Ron (who had tried to take her place unsuccessfully) was reduced to sobs from hearing Hermione scream in pain. However, Hermione came up with a fake story that the sword was merely a copy of the real thing; a lie that Harry persuaded the imprisoned goblin <a href="/wiki/Griphook" title="Griphook">Griphook</a> to go along with.
</p><p>Hermione was soon tortured into unconsciousness. With Hermione's moans and screams of pain echoing throughout the manor, Harry and Ron saw no possible hope left. Suddenly, <a href="/wiki/Dobby" title="Dobby">Dobby</a> came to the rescue of the prisoners in the dungeon, with audible crack as he apparated. Harry and Ron fought off <a href="/wiki/Peter_Pettigrew" title="Peter Pettigrew">Peter Pettigrew</a>, who had been sent to investigate the noise. Harry snarled at him that Pettigrew owed him for Harry's sparing of his life with Lupin and Sirius, and the momentary relaxing of Pettigrew as a result caused him to be choked to death by his own silver hand (created by Voldemort) for showing Harry mercy. 
</p>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/bf/Bellatrix_holding_Hermione_at_knifepoint.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180811153316" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Bellatrix holding Hermione at knifepoint" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Bellatrix holding Hermione at knifepoint.jpg" data-image-key="Bellatrix_holding_Hermione_at_knifepoint.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/bf/Bellatrix_holding_Hermione_at_knifepoint.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180811153316" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/bf/Bellatrix_holding_Hermione_at_knifepoint.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180811153316" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Bellatrix holding Hermione at knifepoint" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/bf/Bellatrix_holding_Hermione_at_knifepoint.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180811153316" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Bellatrix holding Hermione at knifepoint.jpg" data-image-key="Bellatrix_holding_Hermione_at_knifepoint.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/bf/Bellatrix_holding_Hermione_at_knifepoint.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180811153316" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Bellatrix_holding_Hermione_at_knifepoint.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Bellatrix holding her silver knife to Hermione's throat</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>They raced upstairs and were forced to drop their wands when Bellatrix held a silver knife to Hermione's throat. Bellatrix cut through some skin, leaving a thin cut on the front of Hermione's neck. Right when Bellatrix was about to slit her throat, <a href="/wiki/Dobby" title="Dobby">Dobby</a> returned and sent the chandelier crashing to the floor, knocking Bellatrix over and enabling Harry to grab their wands from Draco and <a href="/wiki/Apparition" title="Apparition">Disapparate</a> with Hermione, Ron, Griphook, and Dobby to <a href="/wiki/Shell_Cottage" title="Shell Cottage">Shell Cottage</a>, where Bill and Fleur Weasley took up residence after their marriage. Unfortunately, Dobby was killed during this escape, by a knife Bellatrix threw.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Shell_Cottage_and_Gringotts_break-in">Shell Cottage and Gringotts break-in</span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows"><b>Griphook</b>: "<i>As the Dark Lord becomes ever more powerful, your race is set still more firmly above mine! <a href="/wiki/Gringotts_Wizarding_Bank" title="Gringotts Wizarding Bank">Gringotts</a> falls under wizarding rule, house-elves are slaughtered, and who amongst the wand-carriers protests?</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Hermione</b>: "<i>We do! We protest!</i>"</dd>
<dd>— Hermione showing her willingness to stand up for others<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/16/Harry-potter7-shell_cottage.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180811141202" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry-potter7-shell cottage" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry-potter7-shell cottage.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter7-shell_cottage.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/16/Harry-potter7-shell_cottage.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180811141202" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/16/Harry-potter7-shell_cottage.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180811141202" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry-potter7-shell cottage" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/16/Harry-potter7-shell_cottage.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180811141202" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry-potter7-shell cottage.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter7-shell_cottage.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/16/Harry-potter7-shell_cottage.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180811141202" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry-potter7-shell_cottage.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The trio speaking with <a href="/wiki/Griphook" title="Griphook">Griphook</a> about what lay within the Lestrange vault</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Hermione, Harry, and Ron stayed at Shell Cottage for some time, whilst Fleur helped Hermione recover from her trauma. Ron didn't leave Hermione's bedside throughout this time. The trio formed a plan to break into the <a href="/wiki/Lestrange_Vault" title="Lestrange Vault">Lestrange Vault</a> at Gringotts to retrieve the Horcrux <a href="/wiki/Hufflepuff%27s_Cup" title="Hufflepuff's Cup">Helga Hufflepuff's Cup</a>, with the reluctant assistance of Griphook. The goblin only agreed to help them in exchange for Gryffindor's Sword; although lothe to lose it, Hermione was strongly against deceiving or double-crossing Griphook, who was startled by the care she and Harry had shown for house-elves, since most wizards do not think highly of non-human beings. The trio reluctantly agreed to Griphook's terms.
</p>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/31/Break-in_1998.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180310225013" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Break-in 1998" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="112" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Break-in 1998.jpg" data-image-key="Break-in_1998.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/31/Break-in_1998.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180310225013" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/31/Break-in_1998.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180310225013" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Break-in 1998" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/31/Break-in_1998.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180310225013" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="112" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Break-in 1998.jpg" data-image-key="Break-in_1998.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/31/Break-in_1998.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180310225013" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Break-in_1998.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Ron and Hermione, disguised as Dragomir Despard and <a href="/wiki/Bellatrix_Lestrange" title="Bellatrix Lestrange">Bellatrix Lestrange</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Once more, Hermione used Polyjuice Potion, containing Bellatrix's hair. She was also forced to use <a href="/wiki/Bellatrix_Lestrange%27s_first_wand" title="Bellatrix Lestrange's first wand">Bellatrix's wand</a>, as her wand had been confiscated by <a href="/wiki/Snatchers" title="Snatchers">Snatchers</a>. She very much disliked this, as the wand in question had caused so much suffering, such as contributing to Sirius' murder. She stated that the wand felt wrong and Harry speculated that it was because Hermione had not won the wand's intelligence.
</p><p>It was determined that Hermione was 'too polite' to really impersonate Bellatrix, as she did not treat those around her like scum. Despite this, the group managed to get into the vault, mainly because of Harry's use of the <a href="/wiki/Imperius_Curse" title="Imperius Curse">Imperius Curse</a>. After many harrowing challenges, and Griphook betraying them out of a belief that they would not have kept to their agreement, Hermione, Ron, and Harry escaped on the back of the <a href="/wiki/Dragon" title="Dragon">half-blind dragon</a> that was guarding the vault, with another Horcrux in their possession.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_10-9" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-10"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>10<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Battle_of_Hogwarts"><a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Hogwarts" title="Battle of Hogwarts">Battle of Hogwarts</a></span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows"><b>Harry Potter</b>: "<i>Oi! There's a war going on here!</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Ron Weasley</b>: "<i>I know, mate, so it's now or never, isn't it?</i>"</dd>
<dd>— Hermione and Ron sharing a passionate kiss during the final battle<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/82/Harry-potter7-movie-screencaps.com-6084.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180108173526" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry-potter7-movie-screencaps.com-6084" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="107" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry-potter7-movie-screencaps.com-6084.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter7-movie-screencaps.com-6084.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/82/Harry-potter7-movie-screencaps.com-6084.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180108173526" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/82/Harry-potter7-movie-screencaps.com-6084.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180108173526" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry-potter7-movie-screencaps.com-6084" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/82/Harry-potter7-movie-screencaps.com-6084.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180108173526" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="107" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry-potter7-movie-screencaps.com-6084.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter7-movie-screencaps.com-6084.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/82/Harry-potter7-movie-screencaps.com-6084.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180108173526" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry-potter7-movie-screencaps.com-6084.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Hermione and Ron destroying the cup in the Chamber of Secrets</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>The trio finally returned to Hogwarts on 2 May 1998, with the assistance of <a href="/wiki/Aberforth_Dumbledore" title="Aberforth Dumbledore">Aberforth Dumbledore</a>, after Harry had a vision that the remaining Horcrux they had not identified (but suspected was something formerly belonging to <a href="/wiki/Rowena_Ravenclaw" title="Rowena Ravenclaw">Rowena Ravenclaw</a>) was hidden at the school. They were reunited with their friends in the reformed Dumbledore's Army, who declared their wish to fight the encroaching Death Eater army. Whilst Harry and Luna went to Ravenclaw Tower, Hermione and Ron retrieved <a href="/wiki/Serpent_of_Slytherin" title="Serpent of Slytherin">Basilisk</a> fangs from the <a href="/wiki/Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Chamber of Secrets">Chamber of Secrets</a> in order to use them to destroy Horcruxes, and Hermione destroyed <a href="/wiki/Hufflepuff%27s_Cup" title="Hufflepuff's Cup">Hufflepuff's Cup</a>.
</p><p>Soon after reuniting with Harry, Ron expressed concern for the <a href="/wiki/House-elf" title="House-elf">house-elves</a> in the Hogwarts kitchens, prompting Hermione to kiss him for the very first time. Ron responded with great enthusiasm, but they quickly broke apart when Harry reminded them of their objective.
</p>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 245px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/ff/Ron_and_Hermione_fleeing_Fiendfyre_DHF2.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140308202617" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Ron and Hermione fleeing Fiendfyre DHF2" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="245" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Ron and Hermione fleeing Fiendfyre DHF2.gif" data-image-key="Ron_and_Hermione_fleeing_Fiendfyre_DHF2.gif" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/ff/Ron_and_Hermione_fleeing_Fiendfyre_DHF2.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140308202617" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/ff/Ron_and_Hermione_fleeing_Fiendfyre_DHF2.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140308202617" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Ron and Hermione fleeing Fiendfyre DHF2" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/ff/Ron_and_Hermione_fleeing_Fiendfyre_DHF2.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140308202617" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="245" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Ron and Hermione fleeing Fiendfyre DHF2.gif" data-image-key="Ron_and_Hermione_fleeing_Fiendfyre_DHF2.gif" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/ff/Ron_and_Hermione_fleeing_Fiendfyre_DHF2.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140308202617" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Ron_and_Hermione_fleeing_Fiendfyre_DHF2.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Hermione and Ron running from the towering flames of <a href="/wiki/Fiendfyre" title="Fiendfyre">Fiendfyre</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>The trio then entered the <a href="/wiki/Room_of_Requirement" title="Room of Requirement">Room of Requirement</a> in search for Rowena Ravenclaw's <a href="/wiki/Ravenclaw%27s_Diadem" title="Ravenclaw's Diadem">Diadem</a>, but were ambushed by <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy" title="Draco Malfoy">Draco Malfoy</a>, <a href="/wiki/Gregory_Goyle" title="Gregory Goyle">Gregory Goyle</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Vincent_Crabbe" title="Vincent Crabbe">Vincent Crabbe</a>. Hermione dodged a <a href="/wiki/Killing_Curse" title="Killing Curse">Killing Curse</a> and managed to stun Goyle, and then she and Ron dragged him out of the room on a broomstick as it went up in flames due to Crabbe's cursed <a href="/wiki/Fiendfyre" title="Fiendfyre">Fiendfyre</a>, which also destroyed the Horcrux. Harry rescued Draco, but Crabbe was killed by his creation. 
</p><p>Harry, Hermione and Ron then witnessed the death of <a href="/wiki/Fred_Weasley" title="Fred Weasley">Fred Weasley</a>, which devastated them all. Despite their grief, the trio continued with the effort to track down Nagini, the last Horcrux (that they knew of). On their way, Hermione incapacitated two <a href="/wiki/Death_Eaters" title="Death Eaters">Death Eaters</a> who were pursuing her, Harry and Ron, and blasted <a href="/wiki/Fenrir_Greyback" title="Fenrir Greyback">Fenrir Greyback</a> away from an injured <a href="/wiki/Lavender_Brown" title="Lavender Brown">Lavender Brown</a>. Lavender unfortunately still tragically died afterwards from her injuries.
</p><p>The trio was swarmed by Dementors and all had difficulty summoning their Patronuses because of the horror of their recent experiences, but Luna, <a href="/wiki/Ernest_Macmillan" title="Ernest Macmillan">Ernie Macmillan</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Seamus_Finnigan" title="Seamus Finnigan">Seamus Finnigan</a> came to their assistance. Under Harry's Invisibility Cloak, the three made their way to the <a href="/wiki/Shrieking_Shack" title="Shrieking Shack">Shrieking Shack</a>, where they witnessed Voldemort have Nagini kill Severus Snape, as he had (ultimately incorrectly) assumed that the Elder Wand's loyalty lay with Snape.
</p><p>During the brief pause in fighting, when Voldemort issued an ultimatum to Harry, Hermione comforted <a href="/wiki/Ginevra_Weasley" title="Ginevra Weasley">Ginny Weasley</a> over Fred's death. When Voldemort and his army approached with a supposedly dead Harry, Hermione screamed in horror and denial.
</p>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b0/B7C36M2_Voldemort_vanquished.png/revision/latest?cb=20150904231059" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B7C36M2 Voldemort vanquished" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="97" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B7C36M2 Voldemort vanquished.png" data-image-key="B7C36M2_Voldemort_vanquished.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b0/B7C36M2_Voldemort_vanquished.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20150904231059" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b0/B7C36M2_Voldemort_vanquished.png/revision/latest?cb=20150904231059" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B7C36M2 Voldemort vanquished" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b0/B7C36M2_Voldemort_vanquished.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20150904231059" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="97" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B7C36M2 Voldemort vanquished.png" data-image-key="B7C36M2_Voldemort_vanquished.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b0/B7C36M2_Voldemort_vanquished.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20150904231059" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B7C36M2_Voldemort_vanquished.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Hermione witnessing Harry's final defeat of Lord Voldemort</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>The Battle of Hogwarts soon resumed, and Hermione fought <a href="/wiki/Bellatrix_Lestrange" title="Bellatrix Lestrange">Bellatrix Lestrange</a> alongside Ginny and Luna, despite being hindered by using Bellatrix's own wand against her. When Bellatrix nearly killed Ginny, <a href="/wiki/Molly_Weasley" title="Molly Weasley">Molly Weasley</a> took over the fight and killed Bellatrix. Hermione witnessed Harry's final defeat of Lord Voldemort, and she and Ron reached him first, overjoyed. Hermione survived the battle relatively unscathed, only suffering minor injuries and burns she received from entering the Lestranges' Vault shortly before the battle.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_10-10" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-10"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>10<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h3><span id="After_Hogwarts_.281998.E2.80.932018.29"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="After_Hogwarts_(1998–2018)">After Hogwarts <span class="template-c">(1998–2018)</span></span></h3>
<p>At some point, Hermione found her parents in Australia and restored their memories. In <a href="/wiki/1998" title="1998">1998</a>, Hermione went back to Hogwarts to attain her <a href="/wiki/Nastily_Exhausting_Wizarding_Test" title="Nastily Exhausting Wizarding Test">N.E.W.T.s</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-37" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-37"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>37<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> 
</p><p>During the <a href="/wiki/Trial_of_Dolores_Umbridge" title="Trial of Dolores Umbridge">trial</a> of <a href="/wiki/Dolores_Umbridge" title="Dolores Umbridge">Dolores Umbridge</a> shortly after the war, Umbridge managed to escape and ally with some <a href="/wiki/Death_Eaters" title="Death Eaters">Death Eaters</a> (<a href="/wiki/Corban_Yaxley" title="Corban Yaxley">Corban Yaxley</a>, the <a href="/wiki/Carrow_family" title="Carrow family">Carrows</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Walden_Macnair" title="Walden Macnair">Walden Macnair</a>). Together, they planned a plot involving <a href="/wiki/Time-Turner" title="Time-Turner">Time-Turners</a> to bring back the <a href="/wiki/Fall_of_the_British_Ministry_of_Magic" title="Fall of the British Ministry of Magic">dictatorship</a> that had existed in the <a href="/wiki/British_Ministry_of_Magic" title="British Ministry of Magic">British Ministry of Magic</a> from <a href="/wiki/1997" title="1997">1997</a>–<a href="/wiki/1998" title="1998">1998</a>. They were stopped, however, by Hermione, <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter" title="Harry Potter">Harry Potter</a> and <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ronald Weasley</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-WWHP_38-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-WWHP-38"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>38<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>At some point between <a href="/wiki/2010" title="2010">2010</a> and <a href="/wiki/2011" title="2011">2011</a>, Hermione travelled to <a href="/wiki/Diagon_Alley" title="Diagon Alley">Diagon Alley</a>, where she accidentally bumped into a <a href="/wiki/Tiburon_Merriweather%27s_great-grandchild" title="Tiburon Merriweather's great-grandchild">Hogwarts student</a>, causing both of them to drop their belongings. After the two apologised to each other, Hermione noticed that the spine on one of the student's books was broken, watching as they used the <a href="/wiki/Mending_Charm" title="Mending Charm">Mending Charm</a> to fix it. Hermione asked if the student was enjoying their time at Hogwarts, which the student confirmed, although they admitted feeling somewhat overwhelmed on account of being <a href="/wiki/Muggle-born" title="Muggle-born">Muggle-born</a>. Hermione, herself a Muggle-born witch, reassured the student that they didn't have to learn everything in their first year, before asking them what their favourite class was.
</p><p>Upon hearing their answer, she explained that <a href="/wiki/Study_of_Ancient_Runes" title="Study of Ancient Runes">Study of Ancient Runes</a> was one of her favourite classes, to which the student, who hadn't previously recognised Hermione, revealed that they had just purchased a copy of <i><a href="/wiki/The_Tales_of_Beedle_the_Bard" title="The Tales of Beedle the Bard">The Tales of Beedle the Bard</a></i> newly translated from Ancient Runes by Hermione Granger, noting that the picture of the author looked just like her. Hermione explained that she was indeed the author of the book and thanked them for buying a copy, asking them to send her an owl when they had finished in order to hear their thoughts on it. Hermione then wished the student luck in their studies, asking them to say hello to <a href="/wiki/Neville_Longbottom" title="Neville Longbottom">Neville Longbottom</a> and <a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid" title="Rubeus Hagrid">Rubeus Hagrid</a> for her as well.<sup id="cite_ref-CPHG_33-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-CPHG-33"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>33<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/9b/Player_meeting_Hermione_MA.png/revision/latest?cb=20220919082517" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Player meeting Hermione MA" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="121" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Player meeting Hermione MA.png" data-image-key="Player_meeting_Hermione_MA.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/9b/Player_meeting_Hermione_MA.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20220919082517" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/9b/Player_meeting_Hermione_MA.png/revision/latest?cb=20220919082517" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Player meeting Hermione MA" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/9b/Player_meeting_Hermione_MA.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20220919082517" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="121" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Player meeting Hermione MA.png" data-image-key="Player_meeting_Hermione_MA.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/9b/Player_meeting_Hermione_MA.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20220919082517" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Player_meeting_Hermione_MA.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Hermione encountering the student at Hogwarts</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>On <a href="/wiki/19_September" title="19 September">19 September</a>, her birthday of a certain year, Hermione went back to Hogwarts in reminiscence. While at Hogwarts she visited the <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_Library" title="Hogwarts Library">Library</a>, as it was one of her favourite locations within the school. During her school days she spent extensive amounts of time within its walls. While in the library she encountered the same student. She noticed the book they were holding and told her story that involved it.<sup id="cite_ref-MA_Birthday_39-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-MA_Birthday-39"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>39<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>

href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e4/Wizards_and_witches_at_the_end_of_the_Siege_of_Hogwarts_MA.png/revision/latest?cb=20221119092214" class="mw-file-description image"><img /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Wizards_and_witches_at_the_end_of_the_Siege_of_Hogwarts_MA.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Hermione with others at the end of the battle</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Hermione also came to Hogwarts's aid when the school fell under attack by <a href="/wiki/Dementor" title="Dementor">Dementors</a> and other <a href="/wiki/Dark_Arts" title="Dark Arts">Dark</a> creatures, and joined the <a href="/wiki/Siege_of_Hogwarts" title="Siege of Hogwarts">big battle</a> at the end. When it was over, she discussed the possible cause of the attacks with Harry, Ron and the Hogwarts staff, noting that the other creatures couldn't have been swayed by the Dementors to join the attacks, since they were not easily affected by them as humans would be.<sup id="cite_ref-MA_Dawn_40-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-MA_Dawn-40"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>40<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3d/Hermione%2C_Harry_and_player_at_Zonko%27s_MA.png/revision/latest?cb=20230422080037" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Hermione, Harry and player at Zonko's MA" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="122" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Hermione, Harry and player at Zonko's MA.png" data-image-key="Hermione%2C_Harry_and_player_at_Zonko%27s_MA.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3d/Hermione%2C_Harry_and_player_at_Zonko%27s_MA.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20230422080037" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3d/Hermione%2C_Harry_and_player_at_Zonko%27s_MA.png/revision/latest?cb=20230422080037" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Hermione, Harry and player at Zonko's MA" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3d/Hermione%2C_Harry_and_player_at_Zonko%27s_MA.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20230422080037" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="122" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Hermione, Harry and player at Zonko's MA.png" data-image-key="Hermione%2C_Harry_and_player_at_Zonko%27s_MA.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3d/Hermione%2C_Harry_and_player_at_Zonko%27s_MA.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20230422080037" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Hermione,_Harry_and_player_at_Zonko%27s_MA.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Hermione and Harry meeting the student at Zonko's</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>When <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron Weasley</a> asked Hermione to help him sell joke products and compete against his brother <a href="/wiki/George_Weasley" title="George Weasley">George</a>, who had already invited Harry, she couldn't say no, and so she came to <a href="/wiki/Zonko%27s_Joke_Shop" title="Zonko's Joke Shop">Zonko's Joke Shop</a> when they were having a sale there, though she didn't really care for pranks and found that she was not good at promoting the products with passion. She was having a conversation with Harry in the shop when they met the Muggle-born student, who was surprised to see Hermione was the important guest that Ron claimed to have invited, seeing as she didn't seem to be the kind of person that was interested in joke products. Hermione agreed and talked about her feelings with them, and gave them some tokens to buy products with to save herself from doing her promotion speech.<sup id="cite_ref-MA_Joke_41-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-MA_Joke-41"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>41<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/2b/Granger-Weasley_family_on_Platform_9%C2%BE_DH2.gif/revision/latest?cb=20230801004501" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Granger-Weasley family on Platform 9¾ DH2" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Granger-Weasley family on Platform 9¾ DH2.gif" data-image-key="Granger-Weasley_family_on_Platform_9%C2%BE_DH2.gif" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/2b/Granger-Weasley_family_on_Platform_9%C2%BE_DH2.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20230801004501" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/2b/Granger-Weasley_family_on_Platform_9%C2%BE_DH2.gif/revision/latest?cb=20230801004501" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Granger-Weasley family on Platform 9¾ DH2" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/2b/Granger-Weasley_family_on_Platform_9%C2%BE_DH2.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20230801004501" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Granger-Weasley family on Platform 9¾ DH2.gif" data-image-key="Granger-Weasley_family_on_Platform_9%C2%BE_DH2.gif" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/2b/Granger-Weasley_family_on_Platform_9%C2%BE_DH2.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20230801004501" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Granger-Weasley_family_on_Platform_9%C2%BE_DH2.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Hermione with her husband and two children</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>By <a href="/wiki/2017" title="2017">2017</a>, Hermione and Ron were married with two children: <a href="/wiki/Rose_Granger-Weasley" title="Rose Granger-Weasley">Rose</a> and <a href="/wiki/Hugo_Granger-Weasley" title="Hugo Granger-Weasley">Hugo Granger-Weasley</a>. She had several nieces and nephews through her marriage to Ron. Hermione was also the godmother of <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter" title="Harry Potter">Harry</a> and <a href="/wiki/Ginevra_Weasley" title="Ginevra Weasley">Ginny Potter</a>'s eldest child, <a href="/wiki/James_Potter_(II)" title="James Potter (II)">James Sirius</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-42" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-42"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>42<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> 
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Ministry_of_Magic_employee">Ministry of Magic employee</span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Bloomsbury Live Chat">"<i>Hermione began her post-Hogwarts career at the Department for the Regulation and Control of Magical Creatures where she was instrumental in greatly improving life for house-elves and their ilk. She then moved (despite her jibe to Scrimgeour) to the <a href="/wiki/Department_of_Magical_Law_Enforcement" title="Department of Magical Law Enforcement">Department of Magical Law Enforcement</a> where she was a progressive voice who ensured the eradication of oppressive, pro-pureblood laws.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— <a href="/wiki/J._K._Rowling" title="J. K. Rowling">J. K. Rowling</a> regarding Hermione's future<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Bloomsbury_Live_Chat" title="Bloomsbury Live Chat">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 200px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/5d/HogwartsHeroesJoinMinistry.png/revision/latest?cb=20190610210829" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="HogwartsHeroesJoinMinistry" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="200" height="269" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="HogwartsHeroesJoinMinistry.png" data-image-key="HogwartsHeroesJoinMinistry.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/5d/HogwartsHeroesJoinMinistry.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/200?cb=20190610210829" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/5d/HogwartsHeroesJoinMinistry.png/revision/latest?cb=20190610210829" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="HogwartsHeroesJoinMinistry" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/5d/HogwartsHeroesJoinMinistry.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/200?cb=20190610210829" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="200" height="269" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="HogwartsHeroesJoinMinistry.png" data-image-key="HogwartsHeroesJoinMinistry.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/5d/HogwartsHeroesJoinMinistry.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/200?cb=20190610210829" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:HogwartsHeroesJoinMinistry.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Newspaper report on the trio joining the Ministry</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Hermione attained a high position in the Ministry of Magic, first through the <a href="/wiki/Department_for_the_Regulation_and_Control_of_Magical_Creatures" title="Department for the Regulation and Control of Magical Creatures">Department for the Regulation and Control of Magical Creatures</a>. There, she continued her work with <a href="/wiki/Society_for_the_Promotion_of_Elfish_Welfare" title="Society for the Promotion of Elfish Welfare">S.P.E.W.</a>, working for the rights of underprivileged non-humans such as house-elves. She tried to get his house elf Gaby to take temporary possession of the Bewildering Bloom after Yubert Thorne was imprisoned, and to send scarves and other items to house elves at Hogwarts through a student friend of hers.<sup id="cite_ref-43" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-43"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>43<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>She then went on to become Deputy Head<sup id="cite_ref-dumbledores-army-reunites_12-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-dumbledores-army-reunites-12"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>12<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> of the Department of Magical Law Enforcement, and assisted the <a href="/wiki/Minister_for_Magic" title="Minister for Magic">Minister for Magic</a> <a href="/wiki/Kingsley_Shacklebolt" title="Kingsley Shacklebolt">Kingsley Shacklebolt</a> in eradicating the old laws biased in favour of <a href="/wiki/Pure-blood" title="Pure-blood">pure-bloods</a>. Along with Harry and Ron, she helped to revolutionise the Ministry and reform the wizarding world. At some point, Hermione, Harry, and Ron were all featured on <a href="/wiki/Chocolate_Frog_Card" title="Chocolate Frog Card">Chocolate Frog Cards</a> for their accomplishments.<sup id="cite_ref-44" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-44"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>44<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>Hermione also eventually translated <i>The Tales of Beedle the Bard</i> from the original, which had been written in runes and which <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Albus Dumbledore</a> bequeathed to her in his will in 1997. Her new translation was published in 2008 and included notes on each tale written by Dumbledore before his death; these notes were lent to Hermione by her former professor, Hogwarts Headmistress <a href="/wiki/Minerva_McGonagall" title="Minerva McGonagall">Minerva McGonagall</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-45" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-45"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>45<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>Both Hermione and Ron attended the <a href="/wiki/2014_Quidditch_World_Cup" title="2014 Quidditch World Cup">2014 Quidditch World Cup</a> and sat in VIP Box Two. Rita Skeeter noted that Ron had become catatonic at the appearance of the Bulgarian Veela and Hermione had to elbow him in the ribs.
</p><p>On <a href="/wiki/1_September" title="1 September">1 September</a> <a href="/wiki/2017" title="2017">2017</a>, Hermione and Ron brought their children to <a href="/wiki/King%27s_Cross_Station" title="King's Cross Station">King's Cross Station</a> to see Rose off for her first year at <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry" title="Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry">Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry</a>, and met Harry, Ginny, and their three children there.
</p>
<h3><span id="Minister_for_Magic_.282019.E2.80.93.29"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Minister_for_Magic_(2019–)">Minister for Magic <span class="template-c">(2019–)</span></span></h3>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Cursed Child">"<i>What can I say? My parents were dentists, I was bound to rebel at some point. Forty is leaving it a little late, but... You've just done a brilliant thing. You're certainly not being told off — I just need you to look at your paperwork every now and again, that's all. Consider this a gentle — nudge — from the Minister for Magic.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Minister Granger reminding Harry to do his paperwork<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Cursed_Child" title="Harry Potter and the Cursed Child">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<p>At some point between <a href="/wiki/2019" title="2019">2019</a> and <a href="/wiki/2020" title="2020">2020</a>, Hermione was elected as <a href="/wiki/Minister_for_Magic" title="Minister for Magic">Minister for Magic</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-Minister_46-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-Minister-46"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>46<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> In the summer of 2020, Hermione had to visit Harry to ask him to complete his paperwork and the other tasks he was yet to do. She talked about her concerns for recent activity similar to ones which happened when Voldemort was alive. Harry reminded her that he did just find a <a href="/wiki/Time-Turner" title="Time-Turner">Time-Turner</a> and he would get round to the rest of the tasks in his own time. They agreed that the Time-Turner should be destroyed and Hermione hid it away.
</p><p>A few months later, Hermione was returning to her office when she was stopped by Ron, who was really <a href="/wiki/Albus_Potter" title="Albus Potter">Albus Potter</a> transfigured to look like Ron. Albus was trying to stall her while <a href="/wiki/Scorpius_Malfoy" title="Scorpius Malfoy">Scorpius Malfoy</a> and <a href="/wiki/Delphini" title="Delphini">Delphi</a> stole the Time-Turner. Hermione found Ron annoying although he stalled her long enough for the others to find the Time-Turner and they left.
</p><p>Hermione had found out about Harry's nightmares and how his scar was hurting again and she called a meeting. However, no one thought it was a threat.
</p>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-right show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e1/Ron_Hermione_cursed_child.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160802193002" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Ron Hermione cursed child" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="132" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Ron Hermione cursed child.jpg" data-image-key="Ron_Hermione_cursed_child.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e1/Ron_Hermione_cursed_child.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160802193002" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e1/Ron_Hermione_cursed_child.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160802193002" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Ron Hermione cursed child" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e1/Ron_Hermione_cursed_child.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160802193002" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="132" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Ron Hermione cursed child.jpg" data-image-key="Ron_Hermione_cursed_child.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e1/Ron_Hermione_cursed_child.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160802193002" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Ron_Hermione_cursed_child.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Hermione and Ron standing in her office at the <a href="/wiki/Ministry_of_Magic" title="Ministry of Magic">Ministry of Magic</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Hermione's life was changed by Albus and Scorpius when they meddled with time. In one <a href="/wiki/Alternate_reality" title="Alternate reality">alternate reality</a>, she did not marry Ron and became the <a href="/wiki/Defence_Against_the_Dark_Arts" title="Defence Against the Dark Arts">Defence Against the Dark Arts</a> teacher at <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry" title="Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry">Hogwarts</a>. In another alternate reality where Harry died, Hermione was in hiding as a member of what remained of <a href="/wiki/Dumbledore%27s_Army" title="Dumbledore's Army">Dumbledore's Army</a> with Ron and <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Severus Snape</a>. When Scorpius turned up with information about the original timeline where they won, Hermione agreed to help put time right again by time-travelling to the moment Scorpius changed time and use a <a href="/wiki/Shield_Charm" title="Shield Charm">Shield Charm</a> to stop him. Hermione was the one to use the charm first, but when they returned to the present, it was still changed. They were attacked by Dementors and Hermione and Ron professed their love for each other and sacrificed their souls to the <a href="/wiki/Dementor" title="Dementor">Dementors</a> to give Scorpius time to escape.
</p>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/2d/The-Australian-company-of-Harry-Potter-and-the-Cursed-Child.-Photo-Matt-Murphy._1537-1140x800.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20190719140007" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:The-Australian-company-of-Harry-Potter-and-the-Cursed-Child.-Photo-Matt-Murphy._1537-1140x800.jpg"
