timeline</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>When time was right again, Hermione visited Hogwarts to attend a meeting with Professor McGonagall. Hermione, along with Ron, Harry, Ginny and Draco were very forgiving of what Albus and Scorpius did, but McGonagall reminded them of great dangers that happened, and could still have been, because they meddled with time.
</p><p>When Albus and Scorpius were kidnapped by Delphi and made to travel in time again to <a href="/wiki/31_October" title="31 October">31 October</a> <a href="/wiki/1981" title="1981">1981</a>, Hermione travelled in time again with Ron, Harry, Ginny and Draco Malfoy to save them. Hermione helped transfigure Harry to look like Voldemort to trick Delphi who hopes to save him, and then later helped Harry duel Delphi. She and Draco then apprehended her and took her back to the present where she was sent to <a href="/wiki/Azkaban" title="Azkaban">Azkaban</a>.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="The_Calamity">The Calamity</span></h4>
<p>During the <a href="/wiki/Calamity" title="Calamity">Calamity</a>, Hermione acted as one of the apparent leading members of the newly-created <a href="/wiki/Statute_of_Secrecy_Task_Force" title="Statute of Secrecy Task Force">Statute of Secrecy Task Force</a> and would introduce members who had proven to be qualified to Professions after complimenting on their impressive combination of determination and ability. She would also help the members personally, instructing those who pursued a professorship on the <a href="/wiki/Proficiency_Charm" title="Proficiency Charm">Proficiency Charm</a> after returning from a sojourn overseas while giving Aurors a retrospective regarding her experiences in the Second Wizarding War to help them in fighting Death Eaters.<sup id="cite_ref-WU_13-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-WU-13"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>13<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>Hermione sent a <a href="/wiki/Calamity_Investigator" title="Calamity Investigator">Calamity Investigator</a> working for the Task Force to reverse the accidental shrinking of several tea shops in <a href="/wiki/Dagenham" title="Dagenham">Dagenham</a> by <a href="/wiki/George_Weasley" title="George Weasley">George Weasley</a> as a result of testing one of his new joke products, a <a href="/wiki/Tea_Snug" title="Tea Snug">Tea Snug</a>, a task which they quickly completed. Hermione later gave an impromptu talk about the Calamity at the <a href="/wiki/Leaky_Cauldron" title="Leaky Cauldron">Leaky Cauldron</a>, which was attended by the same Calamity Investigator. From this talk, the Calamity Investigator learned about the ineffability of the Calamity, from which they figured out a new way to improve their <a href="/wiki/Trace_Charm" title="Trace Charm">Trace Charm</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-WU_13-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-WU-13"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>13<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>Hermione later learned that the same Calamity Investigator had discovered a large number of <a href="/wiki/Fire-breathing_chicken" title="Fire-breathing chicken">fire-breathing chickens</a> beneath an inn in <a href="/wiki/Brondby" title="Brondby">Brondby</a>, <a href="/wiki/Denmark" title="Denmark">Denmark</a>, and brought them back to the Ministry, as they had recently become a noted wizarding delicacy. Hermione thanked the Calamity Investigator by securing them higher-energy meals at wizarding bed and breakfast inns. She later hosted a practical class on localised casting of the <a href="/wiki/Sunlight_Charm" title="Sunlight Charm">Sunlight Charm</a>, which was attended by the same Calamity Investigator. As part of the class, Hermione demonstrated that the volume of light produced could be modulated with specific wrist motions, which the Calamity Investigator used to improve their use of the <a href="/wiki/Greenhouse_Charm" title="Greenhouse Charm">Greenhouse Charm</a>. Hermione also presented the same Calamity Investigator with the then-newly-created <a href="/wiki/Green_Wand" title="Green Wand">Green Wand</a> award for their painstaking gathering of greenhouse ingredients every day.<sup id="cite_ref-WU_13-3" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-WU-13"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>13<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="The_Unforgivables">The Unforgivables</span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter: Wizards Unite"><b>Hermione</b>: "<i>I understand that you're trying to send The Unforgivable a message, but are you sure taking action without discussing the possible consequences first was smart? Their 'suggestion' to stop meddling with the Calamity didn't contain any specific threats, but I doubt they'll let this slide...</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Harry Potter</b>: "<i>I'm not afraid of The Unforgivable, but I am afraid of what could happen if they're allowed unfettered access to the Calamity. By the time we made a decision on what to do, who knows what they might've unleashed? There's a good chance their threat was just a bluff anyway.</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Hermione</b>: "<i>I don't know, Harry, The Unforgivable doesn't seem like the kind of group to make empty threats. I just hope we don't find that out firsthand...</i>"</dd>
<dd>— Harry and Hermione discussing the Unforgivable and the threat it posed<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter:_Wizards_Unite" title="Harry Potter: Wizards Unite">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<p>In the spring of <a href="/wiki/2021" title="2021">2021</a>, The Unforgivable threatened Harry Potter and Hermione after the two began wrenching control of Calamity surges away from the cabal. The two feared that their children would be targeted, but Harry insisted on continuing to fight against the Unforgivable. Harry redirected a Calamity surge and controlled it using memories of the <a href="/wiki/Marauders" title="Marauders">Marauders</a>. When <a href="/wiki/Minerva_McGonagall" title="Minerva McGonagall">Minerva McGonagall</a> was uncharacteristically late in reporting to the <a href="/wiki/Statute_of_Secrecy_Task_Force" title="Statute of Secrecy Task Force">SOS Task Force</a>, Constance Pickering, Harry Potter, and Hermione Granger feared she had been attacked. By <a href="/wiki/April" title="April">April</a>, it became apparent that while Minerva was unharmed, Ginny had been attacked and Ron had been abducted.<sup id="cite_ref-WU_Marauders2_47-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-WU_Marauders2-47"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>47<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>Following their attack on Harry's wife and Hermione's husband, the Unforgivable unleashed a surge of <a href="/wiki/Dragon" title="Dragon">Dragon</a> <a href="/wiki/Registry:_Adversaries_Events" title="Registry: Adversaries Events">Adversaries</a>. While this was disastrous, it allowed Harry to tap into somebody's memory of being forced to abduct Ron.<sup id="cite_ref-WU_Adversaries2_48-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-WU_Adversaries2-48"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>48<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Shortly after, the Unforgivable unleashed a surge of Foundables related to <a href="/wiki/Weasleys%27_Wizard_Wheezes" title="Weasleys' Wizard Wheezes">Weasleys' Wizard Wheezes</a> where Ron worked. While the Unforgivable succeeded in intimidating Harry and Hermione, Harry even enlisted the help of <a href="/wiki/Magical_Congress_of_the_United_States_of_America" title="Magical Congress of the United States of America">MACUSA</a> in the hopes of finding his best friend, this attack only made Hermione even more determined to bring the cabal to justice.<sup id="cite_ref-WU_Weasley2_49-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-WU_Weasley2-49"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>49<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> The Unforgivable began a campaign of harassment and manipulation to secure their position preceding negotiations for Ron's returns, including implanting false memories in <a href="/wiki/Molly_Weasley" title="Molly Weasley">Molly Weasley</a> of Ron crying and begging her to tell Harry and Hermione to listen to the Unforgivable so that he could return home. Molly instead instructed Hermione to '<i>give them Hell</i>'.<sup id="cite_ref-AWP2_50-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-AWP2-50"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>50<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>By the end of April, the Unforgivable had delivered their list of demands via notes dispatched within Foundables. In exchange for Ron's safe return, they not only wanted full command of the Calamity but for London Five victim <a href="/wiki/Kit_Gerrard" title="Kit Gerrard">Kit Gerrard</a> and the defector informant <a href="/wiki/Flavius_Flint" title="Flavius Flint">Flavius Flint</a> to be delivered to them. Hermione decided that she and Constance should use Polyjuice Potion to take the places of Gerrard and Flint as a means to infiltrate the Unforgivable, with Harry delivering them in exchange for Ron. It seemed the Unforgivable were aware of this deception, as well as where the Ministry's defences were weakest, however.
</p><p>Whilst <a href="/wiki/Duelling" title="Duelling">duelling</a> against members of the cabal, Constance was hit with a <a href="/wiki/Blasting_Curse" title="Blasting Curse">Blasting Curse</a> but luckily came away with only mild burns. While Ron was recovering, albeit unconscious, the real Flavius and Kit were taken. When Constance returned from having her injuries healed at <a href="/wiki/St_Mungo%27s_Hospital_for_Magical_Maladies_and_Injuries" title="St Mungo's Hospital for Magical Maladies and Injuries">St Mungo's</a>, she reported that Ron had woken up and his memories had been completely <a href="/wiki/Memory_Charm" title="Memory Charm">Obliviated</a>, to the point where he could not even recognise his wife.<sup id="cite_ref-WU_Adversaries2_48-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-WU_Adversaries2-48"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>48<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Hermione wondered if everything, including rescuing Ron, had been part of the cabal's plans all along. She and Harry considered the possibility of a mole in the Ministry or a <a href="/wiki/Legilimency" title="Legilimency">Legilimens</a> among the Unforgivable's ranks.<sup id="cite_ref-AWP2_50-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-AWP2-50"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>50<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>In May 2021, Calamity surges surrounding baby magical creatures created the impression that the Unforgivable were involved in illegal poaching and trading of rare beasts. Fragments of a note apparently from Grim Fawley contained co-ordinates to a location in Cape Town, to where Harry Potter led a team of Aurors in order to stop a potential auction, and to find members of the cabal. Unfortunately, no auction took place, adding weight to the theory of a mole in the Ministry. The return of <a href="/wiki/Mountain_troll" title="Mountain troll">mountain troll</a> and <a href="/wiki/Acromantula" title="Acromantula">Acromantula</a> fragments caused Ron Weasley to remember events from his past, though he still could not remember the names of people close to him.<sup id="cite_ref-51" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-51"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>51<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Following this, Hermione resorted to drugging various Ministry members with Truth Serum then erasing their memories of being interrogated by her. This method outed <a href="/wiki/Gareth_Greengrass" title="Gareth Greengrass">Gareth Greengrass</a> as not only the mole but a high ranking member of the Unforgivable.<sup id="cite_ref-52" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-52"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>52<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>Hermione hoped that the detention of Gareth Greengrass would put a stop to the appearance of Adversaries, however instead the SOS Taskforce was inundated with an unprecedented surge of all known Feared Adversaries over the course of a week (14–21 July 2021). Hermione speculated that perhaps Greengrass was capable of manipulating the Calamity without a wand, though Constance thought it might be that Greengrass was not the one responsible. Hermione also claimed that '<i>anyone who could bring Darkness like this into the world must be capable of powerful magic</i>'.<sup id="cite_ref-53" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-53"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>53<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>Following his detention, Gareth Greengrass repeatedly proclaimed innocence and his colleagues in the <a href="/wiki/Department_of_Mysteries" title="Department of Mysteries">Department of Mysteries</a> called for his release, even going so far as to accuse Harry and Hermione of using the <a href="/wiki/Imperius_Curse" title="Imperius Curse">Imperius Curse</a> to obtain a false confession. As testimony procured under <a href="/wiki/Veritaserum" title="Veritaserum">Veritaserum</a> was inadmissible and there was no paper trail or actual evidence of Greengrass's involvement with the Unforgivable, Hermione turned her attention to helping Ron recover his memories of the <a href="/wiki/1992%E2%80%931993_school_year" title="1992–1993 school year">1992–1993 school year</a>. During this time, an Auror discovered that Gareth's strange habit of delivering Interdepartmental Memos via owl was part of a ruse. Gareth's owl was a Transfigured potions cabinet containing Polyjuice Potion. When tested, those who imbibed the potions turned into Hermione and the editor-in-chief of the <i>Daily Prophet</i>, linking Gareth Greengrass to the abductions of Ginny and Ron. A complication arose, however, when it became apparent one of the Polyjuice Potions had been tampered with during the month that Gareth was detained. Hermione concluded that this was part of an escape attempt and alerted Harry.<sup id="cite_ref-54" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-54"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>54<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>Gareth Greengrass was eventually caught out and taken into custody in an official capacity, but remained tight-lipped until Harry rose the issue of Gareth's daughter. It was discovered that Cereus Greengrass suffered a blood malediction. Gareth and Harry formed an <a href="/wiki/Unbreakable_Vow" title="Unbreakable Vow">Unbreakable Vow</a>, sealed by Constance Pickering, whereby Harry would find a cure for Gareth's daughter and in turn Gareth would help Harry uncover the identities of the Unforgivable. Harry visited <a href="/wiki/St_Mungo%27s_Hospital_for_Magical_Maladies_and_Injuries" title="St Mungo's Hospital for Magical Maladies and Injuries">St Mungo's</a> and placed a large donation, securing special care for Cereus. By the time he returned, however, Gareth Greengrass was dead. During these events, Hermione contemplated the likelihood of Gareth hiding information in their conversations, and concluded that Penelope Fawley might be trapped in an image much like Kit Gerrard had been. She went to check a photograph of Grim and Penelope that was on Gareth's desk, only to find it had gone missing. A mysterious male figure was implicated but not identified.<sup id="cite_ref-prisoners_55-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-prisoners-55"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>55<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Physical_description">Physical description</span></h2>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-right show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 200px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/21/Hermione_Granger_OOTP_profile.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20211009005846" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Hermione Granger OOTP profile" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="200" height="281" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Hermione Granger OOTP profile.jpg" data-image-key="Hermione_Granger_OOTP_profile.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/21/Hermione_Granger_OOTP_profile.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/200?cb=20211009005846" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/21/Hermione_Granger_OOTP_profile.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20211009005846" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Hermione Granger OOTP profile" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/21/Hermione_Granger_OOTP_profile.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/200?cb=20211009005846" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="200" height="281" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Hermione Granger OOTP profile.jpg" data-image-key="Hermione_Granger_OOTP_profile.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/21/Hermione_Granger_OOTP_profile.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/200?cb=20211009005846" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Hermione_Granger_OOTP_profile.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Hermione in her fifth year</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Hermione had a light complexion, bright brown eyes, lots of bushy brown hair (once described as a <i>'long mane of brown hair'</i>),<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_36-3" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-36"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>36<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> and — as a child — rather large front teeth.<sup id="cite_ref-hair_15-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-hair-15"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>15<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-eyes_16-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-eyes-16"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>16<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> She possessed a 'bossy sort of voice' that would become slightly shrill when she was angry.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP_32-4" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP-32"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>32<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>Hermione generally wore plain black work robes. Otherwise, she dressed casually. She usually kept her hair long and sometimes tied it back in a plait.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_10-11" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-10"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>10<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Hermione never gave much attention to her appearance, usually hiding her potential to be considered extremely pretty under her bushy hairstyle and a large pile of books, which she kept slung on her back.<sup id="cite_ref-PS_3-10" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PS-3"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>3<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/67/Hermione_Deathly_Hallows.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20111126230313" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Hermione Deathly Hallows" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="188" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Hermione Deathly Hallows.jpg" data-image-key="Hermione_Deathly_Hallows.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/67/Hermione_Deathly_Hallows.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20111126230313" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/67/Hermione_Deathly_Hallows.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20111126230313" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Hermione Deathly Hallows" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/67/Hermione_Deathly_Hallows.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20111126230313" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="188" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Hermione Deathly Hallows.jpg" data-image-key="Hermione_Deathly_Hallows.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/67/Hermione_Deathly_Hallows.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20111126230313" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Hermione_Deathly_Hallows.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Hermione in her seventh and final year</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>In <a href="/wiki/1994" title="1994">1994</a>, after Hermione was accidentally struck with a <i><a href="/wiki/Densaugeo" title="Densaugeo">Densaugeo</a></i> spell, <a href="/wiki/Poppy_Pomfrey" title="Poppy Pomfrey">Madam Pomfrey</a> magically <a href="/wiki/Shrinking_Charm" title="Shrinking Charm">shrank</a> her front teeth and told Hermione to alert her when her teeth had returned to their original size. Hermione deviously let the spell continue a little longer, evening them out and making it unnecessary for her to receive the braces that <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger%27s_parents" class="mw-disambig" title="Hermione Granger's parents">her parents</a> — both dentists — had originally intended for her. Hermione later confessed that she had previously considered fixing her teeth with magic but resisted out of respect for her parents.
</p><p>During the <a href="/wiki/Yule_Ball" title="Yule Ball">Yule Ball</a>, Hermione revealed that when she put her mind to it, she could look quite pretty — she used <a href="/wiki/Sleekeazy%27s_Hair_Potion" title="Sleekeazy's Hair Potion">Sleekeazy's Hair Potion</a> to fix her hair, making it sleek and shiny, and twisted up into an elegant knot at the back of her head. She wore robes made of a floaty, periwinkle-blue material, and she held herself differently. Harry himself failed to recognise her initially, and was shocked when he did, for she didn't look at all like her usual self. Even Pansy Parkinson gaped at Hermione when she saw her, and Draco seemed unable to find an insult to throw at her.<sup id="cite_ref-GOF_35-3" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-GOF-35"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>35<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> A similar transformation was seen during the wedding of Bill and Fleur — her hair was again '<i>sleek and shiny</i>', and she wore a floaty, lilac-coloured dress with matching high heels.
</p>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Personality_and_traits">Personality and traits</span></h2>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: After Hermione impresses [[Horace Slughorn|Slughorn]] with her knowledge"><b>Horace Slughorn</b>: "<i>Oho! 'One of my best friends is Muggle-born, and she's the best in our year!' I'm assuming this is the very friend of whom you spoke, Harry?</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Harry Potter</b>: "<i>Yes, sir.</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Horace Slughorn</b>: "<i>Well, well, take 20 well-earned points for Gryffindor, Miss Granger.</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Hermione</b>: "<i>Did you really tell him I'm the best in the year? Oh, Harry!</i>"</dd>
<dd>— After Hermione impresses <a href="/wiki/Horace_Slughorn" title="Horace Slughorn">Slughorn</a> with her knowledge<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-Blood_Prince" title="Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-right show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1a/Hermione_reading.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180310235724" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Hermione reading" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="114" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Hermione reading.jpg" data-image-key="Hermione_reading.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1a/Hermione_reading.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180310235724" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1a/Hermione_reading.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180310235724" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Hermione reading" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1a/Hermione_reading.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180310235724" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="114" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Hermione reading.jpg" data-image-key="Hermione_reading.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1a/Hermione_reading.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180310235724" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Hermione_reading.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Hermione was known to read for recreation and for fun</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Hermione was noted for both her exceptional work ethic and insatiable curiosity, coming out on top in most of her classes and continuously aiding Harry and Ron in their adventures. She was so studious that the Ministry allowed her a <a href="/wiki/Time-Turner" title="Time-Turner">Time-Turner</a> in her third year, a device that rewinds time so that she could take extra courses.<sup id="cite_ref-POA_34-3" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-POA-34"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>34<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Because of her efficiency and compassion, Hermione often had time to do hobby work on the side, such as preparing a defence for <a href="/wiki/Buckbeak" title="Buckbeak">Buckbeak</a> to save him from execution and creating <a href="/wiki/Society_for_the_Promotion_of_Elfish_Welfare" title="Society for the Promotion of Elfish Welfare">S.P.E.W.</a>, an organisation promoting the freedom of <a href="/wiki/House-elf" title="House-elf">house-elves</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-GOF_35-4" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-GOF-35"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>35<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Such acts demonstrated her social conscience and tenacity.
</p>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets">"<i>That's what Hermione does. When in doubt, go to the library.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Ron's opinion of Hermione's personality<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 175px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/9f/Hermione_with_her_Hand_Up.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20080515230612" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Hermione with her Hand Up" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="175" height="266" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Hermione with her Hand Up.jpg" data-image-key="Hermione_with_her_Hand_Up.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/9f/Hermione_with_her_Hand_Up.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/175?cb=20080515230612" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/9f/Hermione_with_her_Hand_Up.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20080515230612" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Hermione with her Hand Up" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/9f/Hermione_with_her_Hand_Up.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/175?cb=20080515230612" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="175" height="266" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Hermione with her Hand Up.jpg" data-image-key="Hermione_with_her_Hand_Up.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/9f/Hermione_with_her_Hand_Up.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/175?cb=20080515230612" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Hermione_with_her_Hand_Up.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Hermione's enthusiasm in class</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Unlike most wizards who depended solely on their magical ability, Hermione readily relied on logic, which often helped her to cleverly deduce information that many others missed, such as <a href="/wiki/Remus_Lupin" title="Remus Lupin">Remus Lupin</a>'s <a href="/wiki/Werewolf" title="Werewolf">lycanthropy</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-POA_34-4" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-POA-34"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>34<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> However, her emphasis on logic made her sceptical about accepting anything without proof, as opposed to Harry who would come to intuitive conclusions, such as completely dismissing the idea of the <a href="/wiki/Deathly_Hallows" title="Deathly Hallows">Deathly Hallows</a>, refusing to believe in them without physical evidence.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_10-12" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-10"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>10<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Hermione's logic had limits, putting her beliefs before all else at the same time in a way that made her ignore reality when it contradicted what she believed, no matter how strong or overwhelming the evidence was. 
</p><p>An example of this was the reality of the house-elves, she insisted that they wanted to be free, have wages and only seemed happy because they were under educated and brainwashed when her friends told her that they like their lot in life even after the elves themselves told her they were happy and didn't want her help because they don't usually think the way humans do.<sup id="cite_ref-GOF_35-5" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-GOF-35"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>35<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Even though Hermione knew a lot about the <a href="/wiki/Wizarding_world" title="Wizarding world">wizarding world</a>, she was not well informed about the children's culture of the wizarding world until Albus Dumbledore gave her his <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger%27s_copy_of_The_Tales_of_Beedle_the_Bard" title="Hermione Granger's copy of The Tales of Beedle the Bard">copy of <i>The Tales of Beedle the Bard</i></a>, as she grew up in a Muggle household and did not know she was a witch until her pre-teens.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_10-13" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-10"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>10<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>Hermione was quite blunt with her opinions, sometimes to the point of being tactless. For example, her attempt to comfort <a href="/wiki/Lavender_Brown" title="Lavender Brown">Lavender Brown</a> about the death of her <a href="/wiki/Binky" title="Binky">rabbit</a> did not go over well,<sup id="cite_ref-POA_34-5" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-POA-34"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>34<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> and her honesty when dealing with <a href="/wiki/Centaur" title="Centaur">centaurs</a> in 1996 nearly landed her and Harry in serious trouble.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP_32-5" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP-32"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>32<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Despite this, Hermione was generally sensitive to others' emotions and would lie when she had to, though she wasn't a skilled liar.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP_32-6" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP-32"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>32<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> She also gave her friends advice rather often, such as in trying to make Harry understand Cho Chang's behaviour on their date,<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP_32-7" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP-32"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>32<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> and in helping Ginny deal with her crush on Harry.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_36-4" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-36"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>36<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> These actions once prompted Ron to advise her to write a book to translate all the 'mad things' girls do so that boys could understand them.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP_32-8" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP-32"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>32<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban">"<i>Hermione's immense workload finally seemed to be getting to her. Every night, without fail, Hermione was to be seen in a corner of the common room, several tables spread with books, <a href="/wiki/Arithmancy_(class)" title="Arithmancy (class)">Arithmancy</a> charts, rune dictionaries, diagrams of Muggles lifting heavy objects, and file upon file of extensive notes; she barely spoke to anybody and snapped when she was interrupted.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Hermione's intense workload starts to weight on her<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Prisoner_of_Azkaban" title="Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<p>Hermione was very responsible, a strict perfectionist and well put-together who often attempted to act as the voice of reason among her more impulsive friends, to varying levels of success. These traits led to her being made a prefect during her fifth year. Throughout her entire school career, Hermione was insistent on order and steadfastly devoted to the rules, often at the expense of her popularity. Her sense of humour was limited, frequently expressing disapproval over <a href="/wiki/Fred_Weasley" title="Fred Weasley">Fred</a> and <a href="/wiki/George_Weasley" title="George Weasley">George</a>'s practical jokes and threatened to put them in detention for selling prank items in the common room.
</p>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban">"<i>P-P-Professor McGonagall! Sh-she said I'd failed everything!</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Hermione facing her <a href="/wiki/Boggart" title="Boggart">Boggart</a>, showing her fear of failure<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Prisoner_of_Azkaban" title="Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-right show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e5/TrioCommonRoomHBP.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20081029220506" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="TrioCommonRoomHBP" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="135" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="TrioCommonRoomHBP.jpg" data-image-key="TrioCommonRoomHBP.jpg" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e5/TrioCommonRoomHBP.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20081029220506" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e5/TrioCommonRoomHBP.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20081029220506" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="TrioCommonRoomHBP" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e5/TrioCommonRoomHBP.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20081029220506" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="135" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="TrioCommonRoomHBP.jpg" data-image-key="TrioCommonRoomHBP.jpg" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e5/TrioCommonRoomHBP.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20081029220506" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:TrioCommonRoomHBP.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Hermione arguing with Harry Potter over the Half-blood Prince's copy of <i>Advanced Potion-Making</i></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Hermione was very determined and focused, in that she '<i>always [kept] her attention focused on the job that must be done</i>'.<sup id="cite_ref-56" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-56"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>56<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Her refusal to break under torture shows her strength of willpower.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_10-14" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-10"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>10<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> She wasn't afraid to stand up to her friends when she thought it was in their best interests, or when she felt they were wrong; risking to anger Harry by getting his <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter%27s_Firebolt" title="Harry Potter's Firebolt">Firebolt</a> confiscated because she feared it might be jinxed,<sup id="cite_ref-POA_34-6" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-POA-34"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>34<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> and arguing with both him and <a href="/wiki/Ginevra_Weasley" title="Ginevra Weasley">Ginny</a> over his use of the shady Half Blood Prince's textbook.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_36-5" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-36"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>36<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> 
</p><p>In spite of her strait-laced disposition, she wasn't above using coercion and threats to get what she wanted, achieve results or protect herself and those she cared about in the long run. This is evidenced by her blackmailing Rita Skeeter into writing a good article about Harry,<sup id="cite_ref-CS_4-11" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-CS-4"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>4<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> as well as slapping Draco Malfoy when he insulted Hagrid and drawing her wand on him, using a Confundus Charm on Cormac McLaggen for insulting her friends and placing a jinx on the list of DA members that would cause them to sprout boils all over their face in the word 'SNEAK' if they betrayed the organisation. Malfoy, Rita Skeeter and Marietta Edgecombe all served as examples of Hermione's ferocity. 
</p>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows"><b>Hermione</b>: "<i>I'm hunted quite as much as any <a href="/wiki/Goblin" title="Goblin">goblin</a> or elf, Griphook! I'm a Mudblood!</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Ron Weasley </b>: "<i>Don't call yourself —</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Hermione</b>: "<i>Why shouldn't I? I am a Mudblood, and proud of it!</i>"</dd>
<dd>— Hermione expressing pride at being a Muggle-born<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/72/Hermione-granger-ron-weasley-harry-potter-hp4-study-6x4.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20110714002806" class="mw-file-description image"><img height="167" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Hermione-granger-ron-weasley-harry-potter-hp4-study-6x4.jpg" data-image-key="Hermione-granger-ron-weasley-harry-potter-hp4-study-6x4.jpg" 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/72/Hermione-granger-ron-weasley-harry-potter-hp4-study-6x4.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20110714002806" class="mw-file-description /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Hermione-granger-ron-weasley-harry-potter-hp4-study-6x4.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Hermione urging Harry and Ron to take studying seriously</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Because of her opinionated, interfering nature, Hermione had the reputation for being a bossy know-it-all. Her sometimes abrasive attitude masked deep insecurities and fear of failure, as personified by her <a href="/wiki/Boggart" title="Boggart">Boggart</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-JKRHG_57-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-JKRHG-57"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>57<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> She felt the need to prove herself, perhaps partly because of how many people in wizarding society looked down on Muggle-borns. However, she didn't let anyone bully her about this and ignored bigots like Draco Malfoy. Despite her growing confidence in her abilities, Hermione wasn't arrogant or conceited, and helped her classmates with their schoolwork whenever she could. In her fifth year, she also became one of the few people to call Voldemort by name.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP_32-9" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP-32"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>32<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>Though she initially showed a tendency toward mild panic in sudden situations,<sup id="cite_ref-PS_3-11" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PS-3"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>3<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> in time she was able to overcome this trait of hers, and demonstrated her bravery and extreme loyalty to her friends many times when facing danger, risking her life frequently to help them and standing by Harry even when no one else did. Although she wasn't as short-tempered as her friends, Hermione displayed a formidable fury on several occasions, such as slapping Draco Malfoy in defence of Hagrid,<sup id="cite_ref-POA_34-7" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-POA-34"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>34<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> sabotaging Cormac McLaggen's tryout as a <a href="/wiki/Keeper" title="Keeper">Keeper</a> for the <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor_Quidditch_team" title="Gryffindor Quidditch team">Gryffindor Quidditch team</a> after he insulted Ron and Ginny, conjuring a flock of canaries to attack Ron in their sixth year<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_36-6" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-36"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>36<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> and physically attacking him when he briefly abandoned her and Harry during their hunt for Horcruxes.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_10-15" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-10"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>10<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> She also tended to be rather argumentative, a trait most evident in her interactions with Ron.
</p>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Magical_abilities_and_skills">Magical abilities and skills</span></h2>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-right show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f3/Hermione_Otter_Patronus.png/revision/latest?cb=20170109003508" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Hermione Otter Patronus" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="182" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Hermione Otter Patronus.png" data-image-key="Hermione_Otter_Patronus.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f3/Hermione_Otter_Patronus.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170109003508" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f3/Hermione_Otter_Patronus.png/revision/latest?cb=20170109003508" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Hermione Otter Patronus" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f3/Hermione_Otter_Patronus.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170109003508" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="182" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Hermione Otter Patronus.png" data-image-key="Hermione_Otter_Patronus.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/f3/Hermione_Otter_Patronus.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170109003508" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Hermione_Otter_Patronus.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Hermione's corporeal <a href="/wiki/Patronus_Charm" title="Patronus Charm">Patronus</a> (form of an otter)</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets">"<i>An' they haven't invented a spell our Hermione can' do.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— <a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid" title="Rubeus Hagrid">Rubeus Hagrid</a> praising Hermione's outstanding magical talents<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<p>Hermione proved to be an extremely powerful and talented young <a href="/wiki/Wizardkind" title="Wizardkind">witch</a>. Even before she began her education at Hogwarts, she practised some simple <a href="/wiki/Spell" title="Spell">spells</a> which all worked.<sup id="cite_ref-PS_3-12" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PS-3"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>3<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> <a href="/wiki/Remus_Lupin" title="Remus Lupin">Remus Lupin</a> claimed that Hermione was the cleverest witch of her age he had ever met.<sup id="cite_ref-POA_34-8" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-POA-34"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>34<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Her magical capability easily surpassed almost every single student in her year, challenged only by a select few.
</p>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">"<i>One of my best friends is Muggle-born, and she's the best in our year.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter" title="Harry Potter">Harry Potter</a> addressing Hermione's magical aptitude<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-Blood_Prince" title="Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone">"<i>I've tried a few simple <a href="/wiki/Spell" title="Spell">spells</a> just for practice and it's all worked for me.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Hermione addressing her own impressive magical competence and knowledge at a young age<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Philosopher%27s_Stone" title="Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<ul><li><b><a href="/wiki/Magic" title="Magic">Magical</a> aptitude</b>: At Hogwarts, Hermione was usually the first to master any spell and could use spells beyond her educational level.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP_32-10" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP-32"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>32<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Even as a fourth year, Hermione had taken multiple O.W.L. practice papers, including one in <a href="/wiki/Transfiguration" title="Transfiguration">Transfiguration</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-:0_58-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-:0-58"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>58<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> She earned ten <a href="/wiki/Ordinary_Wizarding_Level" title="Ordinary Wizarding Level">O.W.L.s</a>; nine '<a href="/wiki/Outstanding" title="Outstanding">Outstandings</a>', and one '<a href="/wiki/Exceeds_Expectations" title="Exceeds Expectations">Exceeds Expectations</a>', in <a href="/wiki/Defence_Against_the_Dark_Arts" title="Defence Against the Dark Arts">Defence Against the Dark Arts</a>. Harry Potter was the strongest student in that subject,<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_36-7" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-36"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>36<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> but even Harry acknowledged that Hermione was 'the best in our year,' and repeatedly admired her spell work. The <a href="/wiki/Patronus_Charm" title="Patronus Charm">Patronus Charm</a> is the only spell she ever struggled with,<sup id="cite_ref-59" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-59"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>59<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> further showing her exceptional magical capabilities.</li></ul>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows"><b>Harry Potter</b>: "<i>We just need to wipe their memories. It's better like that, it'll throw them off the scent. If we killed them, it'd be obvious we were here.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Ronald Weasley</b>: "<i>You're the boss. But I've never done a Memory Charm.</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Hermione Granger</b>: "<i>Nor have I, but I know the theory. Obliviate.</i>"</dd>
<dd>— Hermione's talent for advanced charms<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-right show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 245px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/cf/Levitation_Charm_PSF.gif/revision/latest?cb=20211219114721" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Levitation Charm PSF" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="245" height="106" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Levitation Charm PSF.gif" data-image-key="Levitation_Charm_PSF.gif" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/cf/Levitation_Charm_PSF.gif/revision/latest?cb=20211219114721" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/cf/Levitation_Charm_PSF.gif/revision/latest?cb=20211219114721" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Levitation Charm PSF" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/cf/Levitation_Charm_PSF.gif/revision/latest?cb=20211219114721" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="245" height="106" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Levitation Charm PSF.gif" data-image-key="Levitation_Charm_PSF.gif" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/cf/Levitation_Charm_PSF.gif/revision/latest?cb=20211219114721" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Levitation_Charm_PSF.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Hermione being the first in her class to master the <a href="/wiki/Levitation_Charm" title="Levitation Charm">Levitation Charm</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>

Granger using the Memory Charm DHF1" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/77/Hermione_Granger_using_the_Memory_Charm_DHF1.JPG/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160809012441" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Hermione Granger using the Memory Charm DHF1.JPG" data-image-key="Hermione_Granger_using_the_Memory_Charm_DHF1.JPG" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/77/Hermione_Granger_using_the_Memory_Charm_DHF1.JPG/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160809012441" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Hermione_Granger_using_the_Memory_Charm_DHF1.JPG" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Hermione erasing <a href="/wiki/Antonin_Dolohov" title="Antonin Dolohov">Antonin Dolohov</a>'s memories</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<ul><li><b><a href="/wiki/Charm" title="Charm">Charms</a></b>: Hermione was exceptionally talented with charm-work and some of her most impressive magical feats were charms. In her first year, she effortlessly mastered the <a href="/wiki/Levitation_Charm" title="Levitation Charm">Levitation Charm</a> in Charms class, and also quickly learnt how to cast other charms such as the <a href="/wiki/Unlocking_Charm" title="Unlocking Charm">Unlocking Charm</a> and <a href="/wiki/Flashing_paint_charm" title="Flashing paint charm">Flashing paint charm</a> without difficulty.<sup id="cite_ref-PS_3-13" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PS-3"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>3<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> She not only achieved an '<a href="/wiki/Outstanding" title="Outstanding">Outstanding</a>' <a href="/wiki/Ordinary_Wizarding_Level" title="Ordinary Wizarding Level">O.W.L.</a><sup id="cite_ref-HBP_36-8" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-36"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>36<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> but also received a hundred and twelve percent in her first year Charms exam.<sup id="cite_ref-PS_3-14" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PS-3"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>3<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Hermione enchanted her <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger%27s_beaded_handbag" title="Hermione Granger's beaded handbag">small handbag</a> with an <a href="/wiki/Extension_Charm" title="Extension Charm">Undetectable Extension Charm</a> to allow her to carry more items in the bag than physically possible, which allowed her, Harry and Ron to survive the months spent out in the open.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_10-16" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-10"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>10<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> She managed to cast the <a href="/wiki/Memory_Charm" title="Memory Charm">Memory Charm</a> successfully multiple times after having only read the theory behind it, affecting <a href="/wiki/Antonin_Dolohov" title="Antonin Dolohov">Antonin Dolohov</a> and <a href="/wiki/Thorfinn_Rowle" title="Thorfinn Rowle">Thorfinn Rowle</a> even when they were subjected to the <a href="/wiki/Cruciatus_Curse" title="Cruciatus Curse">Cruciatus Curse</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-DH9_60-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH9-60"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>60<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Hermione also managed to cast the <a href="/wiki/False_memory_spell" title="False memory spell">False memory spell</a> on her parents, a charm that was referred to as a 'complex bit of magic' by <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Albus Dumbledore</a> in reference to a sixteen year old <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Tom Riddle</a> casting it on <a href="/wiki/Morfin_Gaunt" title="Morfin Gaunt">Morfin Gaunt</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-61" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-61"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>61<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> During her sixth year, she successfully cast the <a href="/wiki/Confundus_Charm" title="Confundus Charm">Confundus Charm</a> on Cormac McLaggen.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP11_62-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP11-62"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>62<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Her array of <a href="/wiki/Protego_totalum" title="Protego totalum">protective charms</a> she casted outside their defended her, Harry, and Ron for almost a year while they were searching for Voldemort's Horcruxes, while several far more experienced wizards were captured within months.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_10-17" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-10"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>10<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Hermione's speciality was creating <a href="/wiki/Bluebell_Flames" title="Bluebell Flames">portable, waterproof fires</a>. In her first year, she kept these fires in a jar, used them to distract Severus Snape, whom she thought was jinxing Harry's broom during his first Quidditch match, and to attack the <a href="/wiki/Devil%27s_Snare" title="Devil's Snare">Devil's Snare</a> when she, Harry, and Ron searched for the Philosopher's Stone.<sup id="cite_ref-PS_3-15" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PS-3"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>3<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> In her second year, she used her flames in Moaning Myrtle's bathroom to light the cauldron above one of the toilets while Polyjuice Potion was brewed so that Harry and Ron could interrogate Draco Malfoy about the Heir of Slytherin.<sup id="cite_ref-CS_4-12" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-CS-4"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>4<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> During the <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore_and_Harry_Potter%27s_Horcrux_Hunt" class="mw-redirect" title="Albus Dumbledore and Harry Potter's Horcrux Hunt">Horcrux hunt</a>, she kept the flames in a jar to keep the trio warm during winter.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_10-18" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-10"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>10<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> However, the one charm she had trouble with was the Patronus Charm, something Harry noted when she tried casting it when he, she and Ron infiltrated the Ministry of Magic, perhaps indicating she lacked the self-confidence.<sup id="cite_ref-DH13_24-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH13-24"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>24<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> That said, she learned how to cast the corporeal Patronus Charm in her <a href="/wiki/1995%E2%80%931996_school_year" title="1995–1996 school year">fifth year</a> and was the first to master the advanced spell in Dumbledore's Army under Harry's tutelage, hers taking the form of an <a href="/wiki/Otter" title="Otter">otter</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP27_23-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP27-23"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>23<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-DH13_24-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH13-24"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>24<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> She mentioned in <a href="/wiki/1997" title="1997">1997</a> that she had been practising how to use her Patronus for messaging,<sup id="cite_ref-DH_10-19" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-10"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>10<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> but it is unknown if she ever actually carried this out.</li></ul>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone">"<i>Only Hermione Granger had made any difference to her match; <a href="/wiki/Minerva_McGonagall" title="Minerva McGonagall">Professor McGonagall</a> showed the class how it had gone all silver and pointy...</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Hermione's achievement during her first Transfiguration lesson<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Philosopher%27s_Stone" title="Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 245px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/76/Hermione_conjuring_flowers_GIF.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140518225611" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Hermione conjuring flowers GIF" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="245" height="138" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Hermione conjuring flowers GIF.gif" data-image-key="Hermione_conjuring_flowers_GIF.gif" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/76/Hermione_conjuring_flowers_GIF.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140518225611" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/76/Hermione_conjuring_flowers_GIF.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140518225611" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Hermione conjuring flowers GIF" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/76/Hermione_conjuring_flowers_GIF.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140518225611" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="245" height="138" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Hermione conjuring flowers GIF.gif" data-image-key="Hermione_conjuring_flowers_GIF.gif" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/76/Hermione_conjuring_flowers_GIF.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140518225611" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Hermione_conjuring_flowers_GIF.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Hermione conjuring a wreath of flowers in <a href="/wiki/Godric%27s_Hollow" title="Godric's Hollow">Godric's Hollow</a>, <a href="/wiki/Christmas" title="Christmas">Christmas</a> <a href="/wiki/1997" title="1997">1997</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<ul><li><b><a href="/wiki/Transfiguration" title="Transfiguration">Transfiguration</a></b>: Hermione was particularly talented in transfiguration. She was the first in her class to succeed at transfiguring a <a href="/wiki/Match_to_needle_spell" title="Match to needle spell">match into a needle</a> in their first lesson, long before any other student.<sup id="cite_ref-PS_3-16" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PS-3"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>3<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> In 1994, she was the only one able to transform a <a href="/wiki/Hedgehog_to_pincushion_spell" title="Hedgehog to pincushion spell">Hedgehog to a pincushion</a>, and did practice Transfiguration <a href="/wiki/Ordinary_Wizarding_Level" title="Ordinary Wizarding Level">O.W.L.</a> papers.<sup id="cite_ref-:0_58-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-:0-58"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>58<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Hermione earned an '<a href="/wiki/Outstanding" title="Outstanding">Outstanding</a>' in her <a href="/wiki/Ordinary_Wizarding_Level" title="Ordinary Wizarding Level">O.W.L.</a> exam, learning to <a href="/wiki/Vanishment" title="Vanishment">vanish</a> objects, one of its hardest spells. In 1995, she was able to <a href="/wiki/Vanishing_Spell" title="Vanishing Spell">vanish</a> Harry Potter's <a href="/wiki/Potion" title="Potion">potion</a> after believing him to be finished with it and a kitten by mid-year - the hardest vanishment challenge of all. Hermione was very skilled at <a href="/wiki/Conjuration" title="Conjuration">conjuration</a>, an advanced type of transfiguration. In her sixth year, she was able to conjure <a href="/wiki/Bird-Conjuring_Charm" title="Bird-Conjuring Charm">a flock of canaries</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_36-9" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-36"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>36<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> By the <a href="/wiki/1997" title="1997">next year</a>, she could conjure a wreath of flowers (likely with <i><a href="/wiki/Bouquet_Spell" title="Bouquet Spell">Orchideous</a></i>) and a <a href="/wiki/Flask-conjuring_spell" title="Flask-conjuring spell">flask</a> <a href="/wiki/Nonverbal_spell" title="Nonverbal spell">non-verbally</a>. Hermione could also perform <a href="/wiki/Human_Transfiguration" title="Human Transfiguration">Human Transfiguration</a>, which is noted to be very difficult and did so in <a href="/wiki/1998" title="1998">1998</a> to disguise Ron during the <a href="/wiki/Break-in_of_Gringotts_Wizarding_Bank_(1998)" title="Break-in of Gringotts Wizarding Bank (1998)">break-in at Gringotts Bank</a>. She could also cast various other transfiguration spells, such as the <a href="/wiki/Lapifors_Spell" title="Lapifors Spell">Lapifors Spell</a>, <a href="/wiki/Draconifors_Spell" title="Draconifors Spell">Draconifors Spell</a>, <a href="/wiki/Snufflifors_Spell" title="Snufflifors Spell">Snufflifors Spell</a>, <a href="/wiki/Avifors_Spell" title="Avifors Spell">Avifors Spell</a>, <i><a href="/wiki/Ducklifors" title="Ducklifors">Ducklifors</a></i>, <i><a href="/wiki/Pullus" title="Pullus">Pullus</a></i> and <i><a href="/wiki/Vermiculus" title="Vermiculus">Vermiculus</a></i>.<sup id="cite_ref-POAG_63-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-POAG-63"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>63<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-GOFG_64-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-GOFG-64"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>64<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Flight" title="Flight">Flying</a></b>: Although Hermione was not particularly confident with flying a <a href="/wiki/Broomstick" title="Broomstick">broomstick</a>, she was at least a reasonable flyer herself, as she was able to successfully fly on a broomstick in the <a href="/wiki/Underground_Chambers" title="Underground Chambers">Underground Chambers</a> in order to catch a <a href="/wiki/Winged_Keys" title="Winged Keys">Winged Key</a>, which she did without any difficulties, being able to soar through the air proficiently.<sup id="cite_ref-PS_3-17" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PS-3"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>3<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li></ul>

<dd>— Hermione Granger's belief in the defensive usage of <a href="/wiki/Jinx" title="Jinx">jinxes</a><sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix">[src]</a></sup></dd>

<ul><li><b><a href="/wiki/Defence_Against_the_Dark_Arts" title="Defence Against the Dark Arts">Defence Against the Dark Arts</a></b>: Hermione was skilled in this subject as she was able to achieve an '<a href="/wiki/Exceeds_Expectations" title="Exceeds Expectations">Exceeds Expectations</a>' in her O.W.L.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_36-10" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-36"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>36<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> In their first year, she mastered the <a href="/wiki/Full_Body-Bind_Curse" title="Full Body-Bind Curse">Full Body-Bind Curse</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-PS_3-18" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PS-3"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>3<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> In their third year when she took Professor Lupin's exam, Harry saw that she did everything perfectly except for the part of fighting the <a href="/wiki/Boggart" title="Boggart">Boggart</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-POA_34-9" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-POA-34"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>34<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Despite this aptitude, this was the one subject Harry was better than her at, something she freely acknowledged.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_36-11" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-36"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>36<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Hermione mastered all the spells taught by Harry in their fifth year in Dumbledore's Army. She mastered the <a href="/wiki/Stunning_Spell" title="Stunning Spell">Stunning Spell</a>, <a href="/wiki/Impediment_Jinx" title="Impediment Jinx">Impediment Jinx</a>, and various other offensive and defensive spells.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP_32-11" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP-32"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>32<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> She was capable of using powerful defensive and offensive spells such as the <a href="/wiki/Blasting_Curse" title="Blasting Curse">Blasting Curse</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-DH17_65-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH17-65"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>65<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> If Hermione had become an Auror she would have excelled, but she instead dedicated herself to rebuilding the wizard laws. Alongside this, in one alternative universe created by Scorpius and Albus' time-travelling experiences, she became the professor of Defence Against the Dark Arts.</li></ul>

<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone">"<i>Neville, I'm really, really sorry about this. Petrificus Totalus!</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Hermione's use of the <a href="/wiki/Full_Body-Bind_Curse" title="Full Body-Bind Curse">Full Body-Bind Curse</a> in her first year<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Philosopher%27s_Stone" title="Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>

<ul><li><b><a href="/wiki/Dark_Arts" title="Dark Arts">Dark Arts</a></b>: Hermione was not known for her ability to perform dark magic and the extent of her capacity is truly unknown, but it could be assumed given her borderline genius status that she was no slouch, as she was able to successfully cast various potent <a href="/wiki/Dark_charm" title="Dark charm">dark charms</a>. She was able to cast the <a href="/wiki/Leg-Locker_Curse" title="Leg-Locker Curse">Leg-Locker Curse</a> and <a href="/wiki/Full_Body-Bind_Curse" title="Full Body-Bind Curse">Full Body-Bind Curse</a> in her first year,<sup id="cite_ref-PS_3-19" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PS-3"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>3<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> the <a href="/wiki/Jelly-Legs_Curse" title="Jelly-Legs Curse">Jelly-Legs Jinx</a> in her sixth,<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_36-12" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-36"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>36<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> and successfully cast a <a href="/wiki/Stinging_Jinx" title="Stinging Jinx">Stinging Hex</a> at a moment's notice.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_10-20" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-10"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>10<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Hermione had enough skill to come up with a very sophisticated <a href="/wiki/Jinx" title="Jinx">jinx</a> <a href="/wiki/Dumbledore%27s_Army_parchment_jinx" title="Dumbledore's Army parchment jinx">that would deform the face of a person who betrayed the D.A</a>., which she taught to her comrades.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP_32-12" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP-32"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>32<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> She also cast the <a href="/wiki/Oppugno_Jinx" title="Oppugno Jinx">Oppugno Jinx</a> to send several conjured canaries at Ron Weasley in <a href="/wiki/1996" title="1996">1996</a>, to express her annoyance and anger at him for kissing Lavender Brown.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_36-13" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-36"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>36<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Furthermore, she was able to cast a particularly powerful and destructive <a href="/wiki/Blasting_Curse" title="Blasting Curse">Blasting Curse</a>, which she used to blast Nagini with in Godric's Hollow in <a href="/wiki/December" title="December">December</a> <a href="/wiki/1997" title="1997">1997</a>; a cast so powerful that it broke Harry's <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter%27s_wand" title="Harry Potter's wand">wand</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-DH17_65-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH17-65"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>65<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Alchemy" title="Alchemy">Alchemy</a></b>: Hermione had read a book containing information on Alchemy and the Philosopher's Stone in her first year, which she understood well.<sup id="cite_ref-PS_3-20" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PS-3"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>3<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> In her sixth year, she easily understood <a href="/wiki/Golpalott%27s_Third_Law" title="Golpalott's Third Law">Golpalott's Third Law</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_36-14" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-36"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>36<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li></ul>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">"<i>Granger? Granger? Can you possibly be related to <a href="/wiki/Hector_Dagworth-Granger" title="Hector Dagworth-Granger">Hector Dagworth-Granger</a>, who founded the <a href="/wiki/Most_Extraordinary_Society_of_Potioneers" title="Most Extraordinary Society of Potioneers">Most Extraordinary Society of Potioneers</a>?</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— <a href="/wiki/Horace_Slughorn" title="Horace Slughorn">Horace Slughorn</a> praising Hermione's encyclopedic knowledge of potions<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-Blood_Prince" title="Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d8/Hermione_potions_half_blood_prince.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160619063110" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Hermione potions half blood prince" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="131" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Hermione potions half blood prince.jpg" data-image-key="Hermione_potions_half_blood_prince.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d8/Hermione_potions_half_blood_prince.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160619063110" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d8/Hermione_potions_half_blood_prince.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160619063110" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Hermione potions half blood prince" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d8/Hermione_potions_half_blood_prince.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160619063110" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="131" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Hermione potions half blood prince.jpg" data-image-key="Hermione_potions_half_blood_prince.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d8/Hermione_potions_half_blood_prince.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160619063110" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Hermione_potions_half_blood_prince.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Hermione being one of only twelve students attending a N.E.W.T.-level <a href="/wiki/Potions_(class)" title="Potions (class)">Potions class</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<ul><li><b><a href="/wiki/Potion" title="Potion">Potions</a></b>: Hermione was exceptionally gifted in the field of potion-making. She was able to identify <a href="/wiki/Potion" title="Potion">potions</a> and their effects quickly after having only read about them.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_36-15" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-36"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>36<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> She was able to brew the very advanced and difficult Polyjuice Potion in <a href="/wiki/1992" title="1992">second year</a> for her, Harry, and Ron to find the truth about the Chamber of Secrets from Draco Malfoy by disguising themselves as his friends.<sup id="cite_ref-CS_4-13" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-CS-4"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>4<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> She achieved an 'Outstanding' on her Potions <a href="/wiki/Ordinary_Wizarding_Level" title="Ordinary Wizarding Level">O.W.L.</a> and was only one of twelve to advance to N.E.W.T.-level. Hermione was the only one in her <a href="/wiki/Sixth_year" title="Sixth year">sixth year</a> class who understood <a href="/wiki/Golpalott%27s_Third_Law" title="Golpalott's Third Law">Golpalott's Third Law</a>, without need for further explanation and was able to compose an antidote containing fifty-two ingredients, including a chunk of her own hair. The only time she was ever out-smarted in potions was in her sixth year by Harry Potter because he was using the <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape%27s_copy_of_Advanced_Potion-Making" title="Severus Snape's copy of Advanced Potion-Making">Half-Blood Prince's old copy</a> of the <a href="/wiki/Advanced_Potion-Making" title="Advanced Potion-Making">Advanced Potion-Making</a> textbook that was full of hints and scribbles that helped Harry excel. This frustrated her greatly.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_36-16" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-36"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>36<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li></ul>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone">"<i>Lucky you pay attention in Herbology, Hermione.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Harry Potter praising Hermione's Herbology knowledge in their first year<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Philosopher%27s_Stone" title="Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/38/Hermione_Granger_and_Susan_Bones_in_Herbology_COSF.png/revision/latest?cb=20211004211805" class="mw-file-description image"><img data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/38/Hermione_Granger_and_Susan_Bones_in_Herbology_COSF.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20211004211805" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/38/Hermione_Granger_and_Susan_Bones_in_Herbology_COSF.png/revision/latest?cb=20211004211805" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Hermione Granger and Susan Bones in Herbology COSF.png"
