	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Hermione_Granger_and_Susan_Bones_in_Herbology_COSF.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Hermione Granger handling a Mandrake in a second-year Herbology class</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<ul><li><b><a href="/wiki/Herbology" title="Herbology">Herbology</a></b>: Hermione earned an 'Outstanding' O.W.L. in this subject, showing great talent in this field, and even studied it at N.E.W.T. level. She was particularly skilled in spells related to handling magical plants. In her first year, she saved Harry and Ron from some <a href="/wiki/Devil%27s_Snare" title="Devil's Snare">Devil's Snare</a> in the <a href="/wiki/Underground_Chambers" title="Underground Chambers">Underground Chambers</a> by conjuring <a href="/wiki/Bluebell_Flames" title="Bluebell Flames">Bluebell Flames</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-PS_3-21" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PS-3"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>3<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> She had knowledge of various different plants; for example, she was the only one in her <a href="/wiki/Second_year" title="Second year">second year</a> class who knew what the <a href="/wiki/Mandrake" title="Mandrake">Mandrake</a> root was. She also knew of the root's potent <a href="/wiki/Healing_magic" title="Healing magic">healing</a> and restorative properties.<sup id="cite_ref-CS_4-14" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-CS-4"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>4<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> When Professor Sprout asked she stated that '<i>Mandrake, or Mandragora, is a powerful restorative. It is used to return people who have been transfigured or cursed to their original state'</i>.<i><sup id="cite_ref-CS_4-15" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-CS-4"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>4<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></i> She was also very capable of casting the <a href="/wiki/Herbivicus_Charm" title="Herbivicus Charm">Herbivicus Charm</a> by her fourth year, in order to magically growth plants at an excelled rate.<sup id="cite_ref-GOFG_64-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-GOFG-64"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>64<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li></ul>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 245px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/0c/Dittany.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140818235600" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Dittany" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="245" height="114" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Dittany.gif" data-image-key="Dittany.gif" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/0c/Dittany.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140818235600" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/0c/Dittany.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140818235600" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Dittany" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/0c/Dittany.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140818235600" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="245" height="114" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Dittany.gif" data-image-key="Dittany.gif" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/0c/Dittany.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140818235600" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Dittany.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Hermione healing a <a href="/wiki/Splinching" title="Splinching">Splinched</a> Ron with Essence of Dittany in 1997</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<ul><li><b><a href="/wiki/Healing_magic" title="Healing magic">Healing magic</a></b>: Hermione had impressive skills in and knowledge of healing magic. She had knowledge of the <a href="/wiki/Mandrake" title="Mandrake">Mandrake</a>'s healing properties in her second year,<sup id="cite_ref-CS_4-16" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-CS-4"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>4<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> and was able to skilfully take care of both Harry Potter's wound from fighting Nagini<sup id="cite_ref-DH17_65-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH17-65"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>65<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> and Ron Weasley's splinching wound in 1997,<sup id="cite_ref-DH14_66-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH14-66"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>66<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> using <a href="/wiki/Essence_of_Dittany" title="Essence of Dittany">Essence of Dittany</a>. She was also knowledgeable of <a href="/wiki/Healing_spell" title="Healing spell">healing spells</a>, but was not confident enough in using them on a Splinched Ron, as she feared causing him more damage.<sup id="cite_ref-DH14_66-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH14-66"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>66<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li></ul>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban"><b>Ron Weasley</b>: "<i>What are you doing Muggle Studies for? You're Muggle-born! Your mum and dad are Muggles! You already know all about Muggles!</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Hermione Granger</b>: "<i>But it'll be fascinating to study them from the wizarding point of view.</i>"</dd>
<dd>— Hermione's interest in Muggle studies<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Prisoner_of_Azkaban" title="Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<ul><li><b><a href="/wiki/Muggle_Studies" title="Muggle Studies">Muggle Studies</a></b>: This was one of the subjects Hermione chose to take in her third year with the aid of a <a href="/wiki/Time-Turner" title="Time-Turner">Time-Turner</a>. She was exceptionally good at it because she could bring another point of view to the classroom and the lessons, achieving a score of over 300% on her final exam in third year. However, Hermione dropped the subject after a year, as she was a Muggle-born witch and so knew a great deal about Muggles already and also needed to lighten her workload, although she did waiver on doing so due to her amusement at watching witches and wizards struggle to understand Muggle technology.<sup id="cite_ref-POA_34-10" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-POA-34"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>34<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-MAHB_67-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-MAHB-67"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>67<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Care_of_Magical_Creatures" title="Care of Magical Creatures">Care of Magical Creatures</a></b>: Hermione earned an 'Outstanding' O.W.L. in Care of Magical Creatures.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_36-17" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-36"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>36<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> She had no problem interacting with the <a href="/wiki/Hippogriff" title="Hippogriff">Hippogriff</a> <a href="/wiki/Buckbeak" title="Buckbeak">Buckbeak</a> in her third year,<sup id="cite_ref-POA_34-11" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-POA-34"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>34<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> but stated in her sixth that he scared her.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_36-18" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-36"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>36<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Her skills at interacting were demonstrated with her views on house-elves and her work on S.P.E.W.,<sup id="cite_ref-GOF_35-6" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-GOF-35"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>35<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> having a good relationship with house-elves like Dobby and Winky and encouraging Harry to treat <a href="/wiki/Kreacher" title="Kreacher">Kreacher</a> more kindly after he inherited him.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_10-21" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-10"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>10<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> These skills allowed her to join the <a href="/wiki/Department_for_the_Regulation_and_Control_of_Magical_Creatures" title="Department for the Regulation and Control of Magical Creatures">Department for the Regulation and Control of Magical Creatures</a> where she continued her work with S.P.E.W., working for the rights of both house-elves and other underprivileged non-humans.</li></ul>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban"><b>Harry Potter</b>: "<i>Arithmancy looks terrible.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Hermione Granger</b>: "<i>Oh no, it's wonderful! It's my favourite subject!</i>"</dd>
<dd>— Hermione's love of Arithmancy<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Prisoner_of_Azkaban" title="Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<ul><li><b><a href="/wiki/Arithmancy" title="Arithmancy">Arithmancy</a></b>: This was Hermione's favourite subject at Hogwarts. Considering she was one of the few people to take this subject, so she must have had considerable skill and knowledge in this field.<sup id="cite_ref-POA_34-12" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-POA-34"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>34<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> She earned an 'Outstanding' O.W.L and took the subject to <a href="/wiki/Nastily_Exhausting_Wizarding_Test" title="Nastily Exhausting Wizarding Test">N.E.W.T.</a>-level, showing to have been exceptionally gifted in this field, given how Arithmancy is considered to be immensely difficult and complicated.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_36-19" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-36"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>36<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup><figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 245px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4b/Hermione_blasting_Greyback.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140307044201" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Hermione blasting Greyback" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="245" height="165" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Hermione blasting Greyback.gif" data-image-key="Hermione_blasting_Greyback.gif" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4b/Hermione_blasting_Greyback.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140307044201" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4b/Hermione_blasting_Greyback.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140307044201" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Hermione blasting Greyback" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4b/Hermione_blasting_Greyback.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140307044201" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="245" height="165" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Hermione blasting Greyback.gif" data-image-key="Hermione_blasting_Greyback.gif" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4b/Hermione_blasting_Greyback.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140307044201" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Hermione_blasting_Greyback.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Hermione demonstrating her duelling reflexes by blasting <a href="/wiki/Fenrir_Greyback" title="Fenrir Greyback">Fenrir Greyback</a> during the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Hogwarts" title="Battle of Hogwarts">Battle of Hogwarts</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Duelling" title="Duelling">Duelling</a></b>: Hermione demonstrated her exemplary abilities in <a href="/wiki/Martial_magic" title="Martial magic">martial magic</a> on numerous occasions, showing remarkable <a href="/wiki/Duelling" title="Duelling">duelling</a> skill for her age. She had very fast reflexes when it came to wand work; for instance, she drew her wand and placed a <a href="/wiki/Shield_Charm" title="Shield Charm">Shield Charm</a> between Harry and Ron when they were quarrelling before either of them could even draw their wands in <a href="/wiki/1997" title="1997">1997</a>, and when the trio was spotted by Death Eaters during the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Hogwarts" title="Battle of Hogwarts">Battle of Hogwarts</a>, she was the first to react, sending them to safety.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_10-22" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-10"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>10<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Her duelling style was creative and unpredictable, mixing non-combat spells along with more conventional combative spells to overcome her opponents. Although she was incapacitated relatively early in the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_the_Department_of_Mysteries" title="Battle of the Department of Mysteries">Battle of the Department of Mysteries</a>, Hermione removed two <a href="/wiki/Death_Eaters" title="Death Eaters">Death Eaters</a> from the fight in that short time.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP_32-13" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP-32"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>32<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> By the time she accompanied Ron and Harry on the search for the Horcruxes, her spell-work was swifter than opponents such as <a href="/wiki/Mundungus_Fletcher" title="Mundungus Fletcher">Mundungus Fletcher</a>: Hermione defeated <a href="/wiki/Antonin_Dolohov" title="Antonin Dolohov">Antonin Dolohov</a> and <a href="/wiki/Gregory_Goyle" title="Gregory Goyle">Gregory Goyle</a>, <a href="/wiki/Blasting_Curse" title="Blasting Curse">blasted</a> <a href="/wiki/Nagini" title="Nagini">Nagini</a> to defend Harry,<sup id="cite_ref-DH17_65-3" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH17-65"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>65<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> repelled <a href="/wiki/Corban_Yaxley" title="Corban Yaxley">Yaxley</a> when he forcibly <a href="/wiki/Apparition" title="Apparition">Disapparated</a> with her, blasted <a href="/wiki/Fenrir_Greyback" title="Fenrir Greyback">Fenrir Greyback</a> away from an injured <a href="/wiki/Lavender_Brown" title="Lavender Brown">Lavender Brown</a>, and saved him and Ron from being apprehended by Death Eaters when the trio went to see <a href="/wiki/Xenophilius_Lovegood" title="Xenophilius Lovegood">Xenophilius Lovegood</a>. She defeated many Death Eaters during the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Hogwarts" title="Battle of Hogwarts">Battle of Hogwarts</a> and held her own against <a href="/wiki/Bellatrix_Lestrange" title="Bellatrix Lestrange">Bellatrix Lestrange</a> with the assistance of <a href="/wiki/Ginevra_Weasley" title="Ginevra Weasley">Ginny Weasley</a> and <a href="/wiki/Luna_Lovegood" title="Luna Lovegood">Luna Lovegood</a>. They weren't able to defeat her, but this likely because Hermione was fighting at a great disadvantage: she was forced to fight Bellatrix with Bellatrix's own wand, that was still loyal to Bellatrix. Being able to hold her own in such a disadvantageous condition against a very powerful witch like Bellatrix was an exceptional feat, further proof of her duelling ability.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_10-23" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-10"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>10<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Wandless_magic" title="Wandless magic">Wandless</a> and <a href="/wiki/Nonverbal_spell" title="Nonverbal spell">nonverbal magic</a></b>: Hermione became highly skilled at <a href="/wiki/Nonverbal_spell" title="Nonverbal spell">non-verbal magic</a> in her sixth year, being the first to succeed at it in her <a href="/wiki/Defence_Against_the_Dark_Arts" title="Defence Against the Dark Arts">Defence Against the Dark Arts</a> class and quickly becoming so good at non-verbal <a href="/wiki/Incantation" title="Incantation">incantations</a> that she did not need to say the incantations aloud for a wide variety of <a href="/wiki/Spell" title="Spell">spells</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_36-20" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-36"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>36<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> She was known to have practised <a href="/wiki/Wandless_magic" title="Wandless magic">wandless magic</a> in her years at Hogwarts. Hermione did not need the aid of a <a href="/wiki/Wand" title="Wand">wand</a> or magical instrument for a wide variety of spells.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_36-21" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-36"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>36<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Apparition" title="Apparition">Apparition</a></b>: Hermione was the first in her <a href="/wiki/Apparition_(class)" title="Apparition (class)">class</a> to <a href="/wiki/Apparition" title="Apparition">Apparate</a> successfully, achieving Apparition twice in that time and passed her test on the first attempt. According to Ron, her performance was '<i>perfect</i>' and the <a href="/wiki/Wilkie_Twycross" title="Wilkie Twycross">instructor</a> praised her talent greatly.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_36-22" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-36"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>36<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> While on the hunt for the Horcruxes with Harry and Ron, Hermione frequently Apparated and Disapparated the three of them using side-along Apparition, twice when they were falling through the air.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_10-24" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-10"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>10<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li></ul>
<ul><li><b><a href="/wiki/Study_of_Ancient_Runes" title="Study of Ancient Runes">Study of Ancient Runes</a></b>: Hermione was gifted in translating ancient runes into English. She earned an 'Outstanding' O.W.L. in the subject and took it to <a href="/wiki/Nastily_Exhausting_Wizarding_Test" title="Nastily Exhausting Wizarding Test">N.E.W.T.</a>-level.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_36-23" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-36"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>36<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> This is what later helped lead her, Harry, and Ron to the Deathly Hallows. She later translated the original copy of <i><a href="/wiki/The_Tales_of_Beedle_the_Bard" title="The Tales of Beedle the Bard">The Tales of Beedle the Bard</a></i> into English, which she published sometime before working at the <a href="/wiki/British_Ministry_of_Magic" title="British Ministry of Magic">British Ministry of Magic</a>.</li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/History_of_Magic" title="History of Magic">History of Magic</a></b>: Hermione was very interested in the history of the <a href="/wiki/Wizarding_world" title="Wizarding world">wizarding world</a> from a young age. Even before starting at Hogwarts, she bought several books and learned them by heart. She was one of very few students who payed attention to Professor Binns' lectures, being known to take excellent notes in the class. She earned an 'Outstanding' O.W.L. in the subject, which was hard to do,<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_36-24" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-36"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>36<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> considering how boring the class was said to be.</li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Astronomy" title="Astronomy">Astronomy</a></b>: Hermione was known to have gained an 'Outstanding' O.W.L. in this subject, but she decided not to continue with it at N.E.W.T.-level.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_36-25" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-36"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>36<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> She often helped Harry and Ron do their homework as they often didn't remember the required facts.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP_32-14" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP-32"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>32<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Spell_creation" title="Spell creation">Spell creation</a></b> (possibly): Hermione was highly implied to have successfully created at least one spell, a <a href="/wiki/Dumbledore%27s_Army_parchment_jinx" title="Dumbledore's Army parchment jinx">jinx</a> that she placed upon the list of Dumbledore's Army members which, if activated, would cause the affected person's face to break out in boils that formed the word 'SNEAK' and which could not be reversed by any known counter-spell. She may also have invented the Four-Point Spell, a useful spell that would make the user's wand point north to indicate direction. If so, this further shows her remarkable and outstanding skill and magical talent, as spell creation is noted to be extremely dangerous and only to be attempted by the most skilled wizards.</li></ul>
<ul><li><b>Intellectual giftedness</b>: Hermione was noted to be a '<i>borderline genius</i>',<sup id="cite_ref-WBUR_68-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-WBUR-68"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>68<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> getting top scores in every class, and getting 'Outstanding' in all her <a href="/wiki/Ordinary_Wizarding_Level" title="Ordinary Wizarding Level">O.W.L.s</a> except <a href="/wiki/Defence_Against_the_Dark_Arts" title="Defence Against the Dark Arts">Defence Against the Dark Arts</a>. She mentioned in her fifth year that the <a href="/wiki/Sorting_Hat" title="Sorting Hat">Sorting Hat</a> considered placing her in <a href="/wiki/Ravenclaw" title="Ravenclaw">Ravenclaw</a>, but in the end decided on Sorting her into <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor" title="Gryffindor">Gryffindor</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_36-26" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-36"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>36<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Hermione had a mastery of logic that most wizards lacked, as she stated that '<i>a lot of the greatest wizards haven't got an ounce of logic</i>'. In 1992, she was able to use logic to get Harry past a protective measure that was taken to protect the <a href="/wiki/Philosopher%27s_Stone" title="Philosopher's Stone">Philosopher's Stone</a> by Severus Snape. Hermione often provided the trio with vital information when carrying out research into the various mysteries they faced. For example, she was the one to figure out through research that the monster in the Chamber of Secrets was a Basilisk and in her third year that Professor Lupin was a werewolf. However, she tended to rely more heavily on facts and information that could be proven by background analysis rather than making intuitive leaps, so Harry was generally the one to put the pieces together which explain recent events to create the final picture and willing to make assumptions where Hermione disproved ideas if there was no clear evidence for them.</li>
<li><b>Leadership skills</b>: While Harry did the majority of leading among the trio, it was usually Hermione who kept him on track when he, Ron and herself had a task to do, and she sometimes did the same only with Ron. She also helped form and co-lead Dumbledore's Army alongside Harry. Her leadership skills were again demonstrated when she joined the Ministry, helping improve the rights of House Elves and other underprivileged magical creatures in the Department for the Regulation and Control of Magical Creatures, and then getting promoted to Deputy Head of the Department of Magical Law Enforcement, in which she helped eradicate the old laws which only favoured pure bloods. Despite not desiring high positions and only leading when she was forced to do so and when the time was right, she was eventually promoted to the post of Minister for Magic before 2019.</li></ul>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Possessions">Possessions</span></h2>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-right show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 150px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c6/HermioneGrangerWandNN8411.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20140602200406" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="HermioneGrangerWandNN8411" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="150" height="150" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="HermioneGrangerWandNN8411.jpg" data-image-key="HermioneGrangerWandNN8411.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c6/HermioneGrangerWandNN8411.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/150?cb=20140602200406" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c6/HermioneGrangerWandNN8411.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20140602200406" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="HermioneGrangerWandNN8411" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c6/HermioneGrangerWandNN8411.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/150?cb=20140602200406" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="150" height="150" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="HermioneGrangerWandNN8411.jpg" data-image-key="HermioneGrangerWandNN8411.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/c6/HermioneGrangerWandNN8411.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/150?cb=20140602200406" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:HermioneGrangerWandNN8411.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Hermione's first wand</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<ul><li><b><a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger%27s_wand" title="Hermione Granger's wand">First wand</a></b>: Hermione purchased a 10¾" <a href="/wiki/Vine" title="Vine">vine</a> wood <a href="/wiki/Wand" title="Wand">wand</a> with a <a href="/wiki/Dragon_heartstring" title="Dragon heartstring">dragon heartstring</a> <a href="/wiki/Wand_core" title="Wand core">core</a> in <a href="/wiki/1991" title="1991">1991</a>. There was a pattern of vines the whole way up the wand's handle. She used it until the spring of <a href="/wiki/1998" title="1998">1998</a>, when she, <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter" title="Harry Potter">Harry Potter</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron Weasley</a> were captured by <a href="/wiki/Snatchers" title="Snatchers">Snatchers</a>, who confiscated their wands. She subsequently used <a href="/wiki/Bellatrix_Lestrange" title="Bellatrix Lestrange">Bellatrix Lestrange</a>'s <a href="/wiki/Bellatrix_Lestrange%27s_first_wand" title="Bellatrix Lestrange's first wand">wand</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_10-25" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-10"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>10<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Time-Turner" title="Time-Turner">Time-Turner</a></b>: In <a href="/wiki/1993" title="1993">1993</a>, just before her <a href="/wiki/Third_year" title="Third year">third year</a> at Hogwarts, Hermione obtained a <a href="/wiki/Time-Turner" title="Time-Turner">Time-Turner</a> from the <a href="/wiki/British_Ministry_of_Magic" title="British Ministry of Magic">Ministry of Magic</a> in order to facilitate her attending more classes. She also used it at the end of the school year to save <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black" title="Sirius Black">Sirius Black</a> and <a href="/wiki/Buckbeak" title="Buckbeak">Buckbeak</a>, along with <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter" title="Harry Potter">Harry Potter</a>. Afterwards, Hermione returned the Time-Turner, returning to a normal class schedule.<sup id="cite_ref-POA_34-13" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-POA-34"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>34<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Revealer" title="Revealer">Revealer</a></b>: Hermione owned a <a href="/wiki/Revealer" title="Revealer">Revealer</a>, which rendered invisible ink visible. She tried to use it on Tom Riddle's diary but no ink showed up.<sup id="cite_ref-COS13_69-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-COS13-69"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>69<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> It is unknown if she still had it in her possession after 1992.</li>
<li><b>Spellbooks</b>: Hermione came to own various spellbooks for various <a href="/wiki/Spell" title="Spell">spells</a> and <a href="/wiki/Charm" title="Charm">charms</a> that she learned and studied throughout her Hogwarts education. These included the <a href="/wiki/Expelliarmus_spellbook" title="Expelliarmus spellbook">Expelliarmus spellbook</a>, <a href="/wiki/Glacius_spellbook" title="Glacius spellbook">Glacius spellbook</a>, <a href="/wiki/Reparo_spellbook" title="Reparo spellbook">Reparo spellbook</a>, <a href="/wiki/Draconifors_spellbook" title="Draconifors spellbook">Draconifors spellbook</a>, <a href="/wiki/Snufflifors_spellbook" title="Snufflifors spellbook">Snufflifors spellbook</a>, <a href="/wiki/Aqua_Eructo_spellbook" title="Aqua Eructo spellbook">Aqua Eructo spellbook</a> and <a href="/wiki/Herbivicus_spellbook" title="Herbivicus spellbook">Herbivicus spellbook</a>.</li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Dark_Arts" title="Dark Arts">Dark Arts</a> textbooks</b>: Whilst not a Dark witch, Hermione had an extensive knowledge of dark magic and owned various books on the subject, including <i><a href="/wiki/Magick_Moste_Evile" title="Magick Moste Evile">Magick Moste Evile</a></i>, <i><a href="/wiki/The_Nightshade_Guide_to_Necromancy" title="The Nightshade Guide to Necromancy">The Nightshade Guide to Necromancy</a></i>, <i><a href="/wiki/The_Rise_and_Fall_of_the_Dark_Arts" title="The Rise and Fall of the Dark Arts">The Rise and Fall of the Dark Arts</a></i>, <i><a href="/wiki/The_Imperius_Curse_and_How_to_Abuse_It" title="The Imperius Curse and How to Abuse It">The Imperius Curse and How to Abuse It</a></i> and <i><a href="/wiki/Sonnets_of_a_Sorcerer" title="Sonnets of a Sorcerer">Sonnets of a Sorcerer</a></i>, which could all be found on her bookshelf in her office in the Ministry. Additionally, during the Horcrux Hunt, Hermione kept a copy of <i>Secrets of the Darkest Art</i>, in which she learned of the dark magic that can be used to split one's soul and how the effects of having a split soul can affect the human being as a result of using such incredible and highly dark magic.</li>
<li><i><b><a href="/wiki/Magical_Theory_(book)" title="Magical Theory (book)">Magical Theory</a></b></i>: Hermione owned a copy of this Hogwarts textbook on the theory of <a href="/wiki/Magic" title="Magic">magic</a>, which she usually kept stored in her school trunk. She would have used this extensively throughout her academic years, particularly in her <a href="/wiki/First_year" title="First year">first year</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-PS_3-22" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PS-3"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>3<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Crookshanks" title="Crookshanks">Crookshanks</a></b>: Hermione obtained a ginger part-<a href="/wiki/Kneazle" title="Kneazle">Kneazle</a> cat <a href="/wiki/Crookshanks" title="Crookshanks">Crookshanks</a>, in <a href="/wiki/1993" title="1993">1993</a>. Crookshanks was highly intelligent, but was not fond of many people besides Hermione.<sup id="cite_ref-POA_34-14" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-POA-34"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>34<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> It is unknown what happened to Crookshanks after Hermione left him at <a href="/wiki/The_Burrow" title="The Burrow">The Burrow</a> in the summer of <a href="/wiki/1997" title="1997">1997</a> in order to locate and destroy <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Lord Voldemort</a>'s <a href="/wiki/Horcrux" title="Horcrux">Horcruxes</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_10-26" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-10"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>10<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> It is very likely the two were reunited, seeing their strong affection for one another.</li>
<li><i><b><a href="/wiki/Magical_Hieroglyphs_and_Logograms" title="Magical Hieroglyphs and Logograms">Magical Hieroglyphs and Logograms</a></b></i>: This book was about magical theory. Hermione used this reference book over breakfast one morning, in conjunction with a pile of other books, to work on her <a href="/wiki/Study_of_Ancient_Runes" title="Study of Ancient Runes">Ancient Runes</a> <a href="/wiki/Homework" title="Homework">homework</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-POA_34-15" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-POA-34"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>34<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><i><b><a href="/wiki/Advanced_Rune_Translation" title="Advanced Rune Translation">Advanced Rune Translation</a></b></i>: Hermione owned a copy of this book, probably because it may have been required for her lessons in 6th year <a href="/wiki/Study_of_Ancient_Runes" title="Study of Ancient Runes">Ancient Runes</a> which she started in her third year with the aid of a time turner.<sup id="cite_ref-POA_34-16" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-POA-34"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>34<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> She was seen to be reading this book before the start of her sixth year, after her trip to <a href="/wiki/Diagon_Alley" title="Diagon Alley">Diagon Alley</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_36-27" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-36"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>36<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><i><b><a href="/wiki/Ancient_Runes_Made_Easy" title="Ancient Runes Made Easy">Ancient Runes Made Easy</a></b></i>: The book was on a beginners' level for <a href="/wiki/Study_of_Ancient_Runes" title="Study of Ancient Runes">Ancient Runes</a> Hermione was seen reading it in her <a href="/wiki/Second_year" title="Second year">second year</a> when she was thinking about taking Ancient Runes for a subject in the following next year.<sup id="cite_ref-CS_4-17" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-CS-4"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>4<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> She probably used the book in her <a href="/wiki/Third_year" title="Third year">third year</a> when she took the subject.</li>
<li><i><b><a href="/wiki/Spellman%27s_Syllabary" title="Spellman's Syllabary">Spellman's Syllabary</a></b></i>: Hermione owned a copy of this <a href="/wiki/Study_of_Ancient_Runes" title="Study of Ancient Runes">Study of Ancient Runes</a> textbook which she would have used for her formal academic studies in the subject from her <a href="/wiki/Third_year" title="Third year">third year</a> onwards at Hogwarts.</li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Rune_Dictionary" title="Rune Dictionary">Rune Dictionary</a></b>: Hermione owned a Rune dictionary, which she consulted to help her understand and translate various complex ancient <a href="/wiki/Rune" title="Rune">runes</a> in her academic studies.</li></ul>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-right show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 150px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1f/Crookshanks3.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20070114210529" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Crookshanks3" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="150" height="175" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Crookshanks3.jpg" data-image-key="Crookshanks3.jpg" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1f/Crookshanks3.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/150?cb=20070114210529" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1f/Crookshanks3.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20070114210529" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Crookshanks3" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1f/Crookshanks3.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/150?cb=20070114210529" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="150" height="175" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Crookshanks3.jpg" data-image-key="Crookshanks3.jpg" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1f/Crookshanks3.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/150?cb=20070114210529" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Crookshanks3.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Crookshanks</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<ul><li><i><b><a href="/wiki/Hogwarts:_A_History" title="Hogwarts: A History">Hogwarts: A History</a></b></i>: Hermione often referred to this book on many things concerning Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. It was her favourite book and she would often read it in her free time. Three of the main topics brought up in it were Apparition within the castle,<sup id="cite_ref-POA_34-17" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-POA-34"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>34<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Muggle electronics and the ceiling in the <a href="/wiki/Great_Hall" title="Great Hall">Great Hall</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-PS_3-23" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PS-3"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>3<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li></ul>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-right show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 150px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/6b/Tales_of_Beedle_the_Bard.png/revision/latest?cb=20161126064839" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Tales of Beedle the Bard" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="150" height="178" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Tales of Beedle the Bard.png" data-image-key="Tales_of_Beedle_the_Bard.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/6b/Tales_of_Beedle_the_Bard.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/150?cb=20161126064839" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/6b/Tales_of_Beedle_the_Bard.png/revision/latest?cb=20161126064839" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Tales of Beedle the Bard" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/6b/Tales_of_Beedle_the_Bard.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/150?cb=20161126064839" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="150" height="178" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Tales of Beedle the Bard.png" data-image-key="Tales_of_Beedle_the_Bard.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/6b/Tales_of_Beedle_the_Bard.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/150?cb=20161126064839" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Tales_of_Beedle_the_Bard.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><i><a href="/wiki/The_Tales_of_Beedle_the_Bard" title="The Tales of Beedle the Bard">The Tales of Beedle the Bard</a></i></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<ul><li><i><b><a href="/wiki/The_Tales_of_Beedle_the_Bard" title="The Tales of Beedle the Bard">The Tales of Beedle the Bard</a></b></i>: <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Albus Dumbledore</a> <a href="/wiki/The_Last_Will_and_Testament_of_Albus_Percival_Wulfric_Brian_Dumbledore" title="The Last Will and Testament of Albus Percival Wulfric Brian Dumbledore">bequeathed</a> the original publication of <i><a href="/wiki/The_Tales_of_Beedle_the_Bard" title="The Tales of Beedle the Bard">The Tales of Beedle the Bard</a></i>, written in runes, to Hermione. It contained a clue about the <a href="/wiki/Deathly_Hallows" title="Deathly Hallows">Deathly Hallows</a> which led Hermione, Harry, and Ron to <a href="/wiki/Xenophilius_Lovegood" title="Xenophilius Lovegood">Xenophilius Lovegood</a>, who told them about the legendary items.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_10-27" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-10"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>10<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Later in life, Hermione translated the book into English and published her translation.</li>
<li><i><b><a href="/wiki/An_Appraisal_of_Magical_Education_in_Europe" title="An Appraisal of Magical Education in Europe">An Appraisal of Magical Education in Europe</a></b></i>: This book was about <a href="/wiki/Wizarding_school" title="Wizarding school">wizarding schools</a> in <a href="/wiki/Europe" title="Europe">Europe</a>. Prior to <a href="/wiki/1994" title="1994">1994</a>, Hermione had read it and learned of many things, including the <a href="/wiki/Durmstrang_Institute" title="Durmstrang Institute">Durmstrang Institute</a>'s reputation for having an emphasis on <a href="/wiki/Dark_Arts" title="Dark Arts">Dark Magic</a>. It is also mentioned to have information about Beauxbatons Academy of Magic.<sup id="cite_ref-GOF_35-7" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-GOF-35"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>35<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Later, in <a href="/wiki/1997" title="1997">1997</a>, Hermione considered taking this book with her as she was sorting supplies for their mission to find <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Voldemort</a>'s <a href="/wiki/Horcrux" title="Horcrux">Horcruxes</a>. It is not specified if it was one of the books she decided to bring with her when she left with <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter" title="Harry Potter">Harry</a> and <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_10-28" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-10"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>10<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> It is, however, unlikely as it was of no real use to them on their mission.<figure class="thumb mw-halign-right show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 150px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/64/Hogwarts_a_History.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20111027025405" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Hogwarts a History" History</i> (Hermione's favourite book)</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure></li>
<li><i><b><a href="/wiki/Great_Wizarding_Events_of_the_Twentieth_Century" title="Great Wizarding Events of the Twentieth Century">Great Wizarding Events of the Twentieth Century</a></b></i>: This books was about prominent events in the <a href="/wiki/Wizarding_world" title="Wizarding world">wizarding world</a> during the twentieth century. <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter" title="Harry Potter">Harry Potter</a> was mentioned in this book, which Hermione read before meeting him in person in <a href="/wiki/1991" title="1991">1991</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-PS_3-24" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PS-3"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>3<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><i><b><a href="/wiki/Quidditch_Through_the_Ages" title="Quidditch Through the Ages">Quidditch Through the Ages</a></b></i>: Although she was not very interested in it, Hermione had read this book in her first year, which gave her some theoretical knowledge of <a href="/wiki/Quidditch" title="Quidditch">Quidditch</a> and Quidditch balls. She knew about the Snitches' flesh memories, something of which Quidditch players Harry Potter and Ronald Weasley did not.<sup id="cite_ref-PS_3-25" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PS-3"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>3<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><i><b><a href="/wiki/The_Standard_Book_of_Spells,_Grade_4" title="The Standard Book of Spells, Grade 4">The Standard Book of Spells, Grade 4</a></b></i>: Hermione owned a copy of this popular Hogwarts textbook, which gave her the knowledge to study and learn various spells and charms for her <a href="/wiki/Fourth_year" title="Fourth year">fourth year</a> of magical education at Hogwarts.<sup id="cite_ref-GOF_35-8" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-GOF-35"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>35<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Gilderoy_Lockhart%27s_card_to_Hermione_Granger" title="Gilderoy Lockhart's card to Hermione Granger">Gilderoy Lockhart's card to Hermione Granger</a></b>: This letter was written by <a href="/wiki/Gilderoy_Lockhart" title="Gilderoy Lockhart">Gilderoy Lockhart</a> to Hermione in <a href="/wiki/1993" title="1993">1993</a>, expressing his get-well wishes. Hermione hid it under her pillow in the <a href="/wiki/Hospital_Wing" title="Hospital Wing">Hospital Wing</a> until her friends <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter" title="Harry Potter">Harry Potter</a> and <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron Weasley</a> discovered it.<sup id="cite_ref-CS_4-18" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-CS-4"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>4<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li></ul>

<ul><li><b><a href="/wiki/Spellotape" title="Spellotape">Spellotape</a></b>: Hermione Granger owned this popular brand of wizarding adhesive tape, which she once used to restrain a rogue biting copy of <i><a href="/wiki/The_Monster_Book_of_Monsters" title="The Monster Book of Monsters">The Monster Book of Monsters</a></i> in <a href="/wiki/1993" title="1993">1993</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-POA_34-18" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-POA-34"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>34<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger%27s_dress_robes" title="Hermione Granger's dress robes">Dress robes</a></b>: Hermione wore a set of dress robes to the <a href="/wiki/Yule_Ball" title="Yule Ball">Yule Ball</a> in <a href="/wiki/1994" title="1994">1994</a>. They were made of a '<i>floaty, periwinkle-blue material</i>' and were considered to be quite attractive. In <a href="/wiki/1997" title="1997">1997</a>, Hermione, once again, wore dress robes to the Wedding of <a href="/wiki/William_Weasley" title="William Weasley">William Weasley</a> and <a href="/wiki/Fleur_Delacour" title="Fleur Delacour">Fleur Delacour</a>. They were lilac in colour and had matching shoes.<sup id="cite_ref-GOF_35-9" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-GOF-35"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>35<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Dumbledore%27s_Army_coin" title="Dumbledore's Army coin">Dumbledore's Army coin</a></b>: The Dumbledore's Army coin was a fake <a href="/wiki/Galleon" title="Galleon">Galleon</a> created by Hermione in <a href="/wiki/1995" title="1995">1995</a> to inform members of <a href="/wiki/Dumbledore%27s_Army" title="Dumbledore's Army">Dumbledore's Army</a> when the next meeting would take place. She used it a great deal and ensured that her spellwork was good enough to disguise the information as typical text on a <a href="/wiki/Galleon" title="Galleon">Galleon</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP_32-15" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP-32"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>32<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li></ul>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-right show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 150px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/45/Earrings.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20120927193241" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Earrings" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="150" height="150" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Earrings.jpg" data-image-key="Earrings.jpg" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/45/Earrings.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/150?cb=20120927193241" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/45/Earrings.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20120927193241" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Earrings" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/45/Earrings.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/150?cb=20120927193241" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="150" height="150" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Earrings.jpg" data-image-key="Earrings.jpg" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/45/Earrings.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/150?cb=20120927193241" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Earrings.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Hermione's <a href="/wiki/Yule_Ball" title="Yule Ball">Yule Ball</a> earrings</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<ul><li><b><a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger%27s_Yule_Ball_earrings" title="Hermione Granger's Yule Ball earrings">Yule Ball earrings</a></b>: These were worn by Hermione to the Yule Ball in <a href="/wiki/1994" title="1994">1994</a>; her <a href="/wiki/Fourth_year" title="Fourth year">fourth year</a>, which she attended with <a href="/wiki/Viktor_Krum" title="Viktor Krum">Viktor Krum</a>, one of the four Champions in the <a href="/wiki/Triwizard_Tournament" title="Triwizard Tournament">Triwizard Tournament</a> at <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry" title="Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry">Hogwarts</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-GOFF_70-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-GOFF-70"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>70<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger%27s_watch" title="Hermione Granger's watch">A watch</a></b>: This watch was worn and used by Hermione in her youth at <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry" title="Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry">Hogwarts</a>. She was seen to be wearing it during her <a href="/wiki/Third_year" title="Third year">third</a> and <a href="/wiki/Fourth_year" title="Fourth year">fourth year</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-POA_34-19" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-POA-34"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>34<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-GOF_35-10" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-GOF-35"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>35<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Prefect_badge" title="Prefect badge">Prefect badge</a></b>: Having became a Hogwarts <a href="/wiki/Prefect" title="Prefect">Prefect</a> in her <a href="/wiki/Fifth_year" title="Fifth year">fifth year</a>, she owned a <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor" title="Gryffindor">Gryffindor</a> Prefect badge, which she would have worn during her formal Prefect duties.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP_32-16" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP-32"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>32<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Omnioculars" title="Omnioculars">Omnioculars</a></b>: Hermione along with Ron were gifted a pair of these <a href="/wiki/Magic" title="Magic">magical</a> <a href="/wiki/Binoculars" title="Binoculars">Binoculars</a> by Harry in <a href="/wiki/1994" title="1994">1994</a> for the <a href="/wiki/1994_Quidditch_World_Cup" title="1994 Quidditch World Cup">Quidditch World Cup</a> that year.<sup id="cite_ref-GOF_35-11" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-GOF-35"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>35<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger%27s_pencil_case" title="Hermione Granger's pencil case">Pencil case</a></b>: She had a large pencil case which allowed her to keep all her quill and other writing equipment together. She is first noted to have had it in her <a href="/wiki/Sixth_year" title="Sixth year">sixth year</a> when an argument with <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron Weasley</a> made her wipe her wet eyes on it.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP15_71-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP15-71"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>71<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> It is, however, highly possible that she owned this object since her <a href="/wiki/First_year" title="First year">first year</a> and had not replaced it since.</li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Apparition_(class)" title="Apparition (class)">Licence to Apparate</a></b>: Hermione obtained her Licence to Apparate on <a href="/wiki/21_April" title="21 April">21 April</a>, <a href="/wiki/1997" title="1997">1997</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP21_72-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP21-72"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>72<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> She passed her test flawlessly, according to Ron.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP22_73-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP22-73"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>73<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger%27s_necklace" title="Hermione Granger's necklace">Red-jewel necklace</a></b>: This necklace was worn by Hermione to the wedding of <a href="/wiki/William_Weasley" title="William Weasley">Bill Weasley</a> and <a href="/wiki/Fleur_Delacour" title="Fleur Delacour">Fleur Delacour</a> in <a href="/wiki/1997" title="1997">1997</a>. She wore it up until she ran away from the wedding after it was attacked by <a href="/wiki/Death_Eaters" title="Death Eaters">Death Eaters</a>. It was later destroyed by <a href="/wiki/Scabior" title="Scabior">Scabior</a> when she, <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter" title="Harry Potter">Harry</a> and <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron</a> were taken to <a href="/wiki/Malfoy_Manor" title="Malfoy Manor">Malfoy Manor</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_10-29" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-10"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>10<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger%27s_scarf" title="Hermione Granger's scarf">Scarf</a></b>: Hermione owned a dark purple/red scarf and wore it frequently in <a href="/wiki/1997" title="1997">1997</a> whilst on the run with <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter" title="Harry Potter">Harry Potter</a> and <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron Weasley</a> during the Second Wizarding War. She left it behind on their travels during her <a href="/wiki/Seventh_year" title="Seventh year">seventh year</a> and it was later picked up by Scabior.<sup id="cite_ref-DHF1_74-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DHF1-74"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>74<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li></ul>
<ul><li><i><b><a href="/wiki/The_Life_and_Lies_of_Albus_Dumbledore" title="The Life and Lies of Albus Dumbledore">The Life and Lies of Albus Dumbledore</a></b></i>: Hermione Granger had a copy of this book in her possession after her visit with <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter" title="Harry Potter">Harry</a> to <a href="/wiki/Godric%27s_Hollow" title="Godric's Hollow">Godric's Hollow</a> and their run in with <a href="/wiki/Nagini" title="Nagini">Nagini</a> disguised as <a href="/wiki/Bathilda_Bagshot" title="Bathilda Bagshot">Bathilda Bagshot</a>. She picked it up as the two left the house and she read it while running and camping during her <a href="/wiki/Seventh_year" title="Seventh year">seventh year</a> with <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter" title="Harry Potter">Harry</a> and <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron</a>, attempting to find clues which would help her and her friends locate and destroy <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Voldemort</a>'s <a href="/wiki/Horcrux" title="Horcrux">Horcruxes</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_10-30" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-10"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>10<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Given her animosity towards the author, Rita Skeeter, it is highly unlikely that she kept it following the Second Wizarding War.<figure class="thumb mw-halign-right show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 150px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/85/The_Life_and_Lies_of_Albus_Dumbledore_-_Mina_Lima_cover.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20200420191232" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="The Life and Lies of Albus Dumbledore - Mina Lima cover" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="150" height="222" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="The Life and Lies of Albus Dumbledore - Mina Lima cover.jpg" data-image-key="The_Life_and_Lies_of_Albus_Dumbledore_-_Mina_Lima_cover.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/85/The_Life_and_Lies_of_Albus_Dumbledore_-_Mina_Lima_cover.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/150?cb=20200420191232" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/85/The_Life_and_Lies_of_Albus_Dumbledore_-_Mina_Lima_cover.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20200420191232" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="The Life and Lies of Albus Dumbledore - Mina Lima cover" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/85/The_Life_and_Lies_of_Albus_Dumbledore_-_Mina_Lima_cover.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/150?cb=20200420191232" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="150" height="222" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="The Life and Lies of Albus Dumbledore - Mina Lima cover.jpg" data-image-key="The_Life_and_Lies_of_Albus_Dumbledore_-_Mina_Lima_cover.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/85/The_Life_and_Lies_of_Albus_Dumbledore_-_Mina_Lima_cover.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/150?cb=20200420191232" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:The_Life_and_Lies_of_Albus_Dumbledore_-_Mina_Lima_cover.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><i>The Life and Lies of <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Albus Dumbledore</a></i></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger%27s_beaded_handbag" title="Hermione Granger's beaded handbag">Charmed handbag</a></b>: Hermione had a small, beaded <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger%27s_beaded_handbag" title="Hermione Granger's beaded handbag">handbag</a> on which she placed an <a href="/wiki/Extension_Charm" title="Extension Charm">Undetectable Extension Charm</a> in the summer of <a href="/wiki/1997" title="1997">1997</a>. She used the handbag to carry supplies such as clothing, books, <a href="/wiki/Dittany" title="Dittany">Dittany</a>, and camping equipment on her, Harry, and Ron's quest to locate and destroy Voldemort's Horcruxes. The bag was small enough to fit in her sock, so as to not have it stolen during the <a href="/wiki/Skirmish_at_Malfoy_Manor" title="Skirmish at Malfoy Manor">Skirmish at Malfoy Manor</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_10-31" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-10"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>10<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li>
<li><b><a href="/wiki/Glamchops" title="Glamchops">Glamchops</a> <a href="/wiki/Glamchops_Lemongrass_Hand_Lotion" title="Glamchops Lemongrass Hand Lotion">Lemongrass Hand Lotion</a> and <a href="/wiki/Glamchops_Moisturiser" title="Glamchops Moisturiser">Moisturiser</a></b>: Hermione Granger owned some bottles of these popular Muggle cosmetic products, which could be found in her bedroom.<sup id="cite_ref-DHF1_74-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DHF1-74"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>74<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li></ul>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-right show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 150px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/9f/Bellatrix_Lestrange_first_wand.png/revision/latest?cb=20240824161308" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Bellatrix Lestrange first wand" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="150" height="155" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Bellatrix Lestrange first wand.png" data-image-key="Bellatrix_Lestrange_first_wand.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/9f/Bellatrix_Lestrange_first_wand.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/150?cb=20240824161308" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/9f/Bellatrix_Lestrange_first_wand.png/revision/latest?cb=20240824161308" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Bellatrix Lestrange first wand" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/9f/Bellatrix_Lestrange_first_wand.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/150?cb=20240824161308" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="150" height="155" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Bellatrix Lestrange first wand.png" data-image-key="Bellatrix_Lestrange_first_wand.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/9f/Bellatrix_Lestrange_first_wand.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/150?cb=20240824161308" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Bellatrix_Lestrange_first_wand.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Bellatrix Lestrange's first wand</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<ul><li><b><a href="/wiki/Bellatrix_Lestrange%27s_first_wand" title="Bellatrix Lestrange's first wand">Bellatrix Lestrange's wand</a></b>: In <a href="/wiki/1998" title="1998">1998</a>, after the <a href="/wiki/Skirmish_at_Malfoy_Manor" title="Skirmish at Malfoy Manor">skirmish at Malfoy Manor</a>, Hermione lost her own wand while Ron <a href="/wiki/Disarming_Charm" title="Disarming Charm">Disarmed</a> <a href="/wiki/Bellatrix_Lestrange" title="Bellatrix Lestrange">Bellatrix Lestrange</a>. Harry grabbed Bellatrix's <a href="/wiki/Bellatrix_Lestrange%27s_first_wand" title="Bellatrix Lestrange's first wand">wand</a> as they left and Hermione subsequently used it, though it didn't work well for her, as she did not win its allegiance. Hermione used this wand at least until the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Hogwarts" title="Battle of Hogwarts">Battle of Hogwarts</a>, when she fought Bellatrix with her own wand.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_10-32" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-10"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>10<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></li></ul>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Relationships">Relationships</span></h2>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Family">Family</span></h3>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Parents">Parents</span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix"><b>Harry Potter</b>: "<i>I thought you were skiing with your mum and dad.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Hermione</b>: "<i>Well, to tell you the truth, skiing's not really my thing. So I've come for Christmas... Anyway, Mum and Dad are a bit disappointed, but I've told them that everyone who's serious about the exams is staying at Hogwarts to study. They want me to do well, they'll understand.</i>"</dd>
<dd>— Hermione telling <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter" title="Harry Potter">Harry Potter</a> about changing her plans for the <a href="/wiki/1995" title="1995">1995</a> <a href="/wiki/Christmas_holidays" title="Christmas holidays">Christmas holidays</a><sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 149px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/52/Hermione%27s_mother_1.jpeg/revision/latest?cb=20220807133129" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Hermione's mother 1" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="149" height="206" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Hermione's mother 1.jpeg" data-image-key="Hermione%27s_mother_1.jpeg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/52/Hermione%27s_mother_1.jpeg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/149?cb=20220807133129" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/52/Hermione%27s_mother_1.jpeg/revision/latest?cb=20220807133129" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Hermione's mother 1" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/52/Hermione%27s_mother_1.jpeg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/149?cb=20220807133129" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="149" height="206" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Hermione's mother 1.jpeg" data-image-key="Hermione%27s_mother_1.jpeg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/52/Hermione%27s_mother_1.jpeg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/149?cb=20220807133129" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Hermione%27s_mother_1.jpeg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger%27s_mother" title="Hermione Granger's mother">Mrs Granger</a>, her mother</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Mr and Mrs Granger were <a href="/wiki/Non-magic_people" title="Non-magic people">Muggle</a> <a href="/wiki/Dentist" title="Dentist">dentists</a> who seemed proud of their <a href="/wiki/Wizardkind" title="Wizardkind">witch</a> daughter. They appeared to be accepting of the <a href="/wiki/Wizarding_world" title="Wizarding world">wizarding world</a>, as they went shopping with Hermione in <a href="/wiki/Diagon_Alley" title="Diagon Alley">Diagon Alley</a> and allowed her to spend several holidays with the <a href="/wiki/Weasley_family" title="Weasley family">Weasley family</a>,<sup id="cite_ref-CS_4-19" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-CS-4"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>4<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> but did not approve of their daughter using magic as a quick-fix, as indicated by their not allowing Hermione to magically fix her teeth.<sup id="cite_ref-GOF_35-12" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-GOF-35"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>35<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> They correspond by owl post with their daughter throughout the school year,<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP_32-17" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP-32"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>32<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> but other than one holiday in <a href="/wiki/France" title="France">France</a> with her parents, Hermione spent almost all of her time in the wizarding world. In <a href="/wiki/1995" title="1995">1995</a>, she planned to go <a href="/wiki/Skiing" title="Skiing">skiing</a> with them during the <a href="/wiki/Christmas_holidays" title="Christmas holidays">Christmas holidays</a>, but ended up going to <a href="/wiki/12_Grimmauld_Place" title="12 Grimmauld Place">12 Grimmauld Place</a> to try to cheer Harry up instead. Hermione told her parents that the reason for her cancelling was to study for exams, indicating that her parents expected her to do well in school and were probably not aware of the extent of their daughter's involvement in activities relating to the <a href="/wiki/Second_Wizarding_War" title="Second Wizarding War">Second Wizarding War</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP_32-18" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP-32"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>32<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 144px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/af/Hermione%27s_father.jpeg/revision/latest?cb=20220807133328" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Hermione's father" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="144" height="215" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Hermione's father.jpeg" data-image-key="Hermione%27s_father.jpeg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/af/Hermione%27s_father.jpeg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/144?cb=20220807133328" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/af/Hermione%27s_father.jpeg/revision/latest?cb=20220807133328" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Hermione's father" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/af/Hermione%27s_father.jpeg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/144?cb=20220807133328" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="144" height="215" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Hermione's father.jpeg" data-image-key="Hermione%27s_father.jpeg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/af/Hermione%27s_father.jpeg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/144?cb=20220807133328" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Hermione%27s_father.jpeg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger%27s_father" title="Hermione Granger's father">Mr Granger</a>, her father</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">"<i>Assuming I survive our hunt for the Horcruxes, I'll find Mum and Dad and lift the enchantment. If I don't... well, I think I've cast a good enough charm to keep them safe and happy. Wendell and Monica Wilkins don't know that they've got a daughter, you see.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Hermione on her parents' memory modification<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<p>To protect them during the height of the war, Hermione <a href="/wiki/False_memory_spell" title="False memory spell">modified her parents' memories</a> in <a href="/wiki/1997" title="1997">1997</a> to make them believe they were entirely different people, and they left the country.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_10-33" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-10"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>10<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> After the war, she found them in <a href="/wiki/Australia" title="Australia">Australia</a> and restored their memories.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Children">Children</span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows"><b>Ron Weasley </b>: "<i>If you're not in Gryffindor, we'll disinherit you. But no pressure!</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Hermione and Ginny</b>: "<i>He doesn't mean it...</i>"</dd>
<dd>— Hermione and Ginny reassuring Rose and Albus after Ron's joke<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 251px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/69/Hermione_and_Rose.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20111019230213" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Hermione and Rose" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="251" height="107" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Hermione and Rose.jpg" data-image-key="Hermione_and_Rose.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/69/Hermione_and_Rose.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/251?cb=20111019230213" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/69/Hermione_and_Rose.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20111019230213" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Hermione and Rose" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/69/Hermione_and_Rose.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/251?cb=20111019230213" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="251" height="107" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Hermione and Rose.jpg" data-image-key="Hermione_and_Rose.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/69/Hermione_and_Rose.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/251?cb=20111019230213" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Hermione_and_Rose.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Hermione hugging Rose before Rose departs for <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry" title="Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry">school</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>After the <a href="/wiki/Second_Wizarding_War" title="Second Wizarding War">Second Wizarding War</a>, Hermione had two children with <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron Weasley</a>: a daughter named <a href="/wiki/Rose_Granger-Weasley" title="Rose Granger-Weasley">Rose</a> and a son named <a href="/wiki/Hugo_Granger-Weasley" title="Hugo Granger-Weasley">Hugo</a>.
</p><p>Rose started her first year at <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry" title="Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry">Hogwarts</a> in <a href="/wiki/2017" title="2017">2017</a>, along with her cousin, <a href="/wiki/Albus_Potter" title="Albus Potter">Albus</a>. Ron stated that Rose had inherited her mother's brains. Hermione was probably very close to Rose because she was also described as smart, yet not a complete know-it-all.
</p><p>Hugo was born in <a href="/wiki/2006" title="2006">2006</a> or <a href="/wiki/2007" title="2007">2007</a>. He most likely inherited his father's <a href="/wiki/Quidditch" title="Quidditch">Quidditch</a> skills, as he was noted to fly a lot with his cousins <a href="/wiki/Albus_Potter" title="Albus Potter">Albus Potter</a> and <a href="/wiki/James_Potter_(II)" title="James Potter (II)">James Potter</a>. He also appeared to have a quiet demeanour.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Nieces_and_nephews">Nieces and nephews</span></h4>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 230px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/89/Harry%27s_kids.png/revision/latest?cb=20240818025534" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry's kids" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="230" height="162" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry's kids.png" data-image-key="Harry%27s_kids.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/89/Harry%27s_kids.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/230?cb=20240818025534" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/89/Harry%27s_kids.png/revision/latest?cb=20240818025534" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry's kids" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/89/Harry%27s_kids.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/230?cb=20240818025534" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="230" height="162" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry's kids.png" data-image-key="Harry%27s_kids.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/89/Harry%27s_kids.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/230?cb=20240818025534" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry%27s_kids.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The Potter children, some of Hermione's nieces and nephews</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>As four of <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron Weasley</a>'s five surviving siblings were married by 2017, Hermione had quite a few nieces and nephews through her husband: <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter" title="Harry Potter">Harry</a> and <a href="/wiki/Ginevra_Weasley" title="Ginevra Weasley">Ginny</a> had three children (<a href="/wiki/James_Potter_(II)" title="James Potter (II)">James</a>, <a href="/wiki/Albus_Potter" title="Albus Potter">Albus</a> and <a href="/wiki/Lily_Potter_(II)" title="Lily Potter (II)">Lily</a>), as did <a href="/wiki/William_Weasley" title="William Weasley">Bill</a> and <a href="/wiki/Fleur_Delacour" title="Fleur Delacour">Fleur</a> (<a href="/wiki/Victoire_Weasley" title="Victoire Weasley">Victoire</a>, <a href="/wiki/Dominique_Weasley" title="Dominique Weasley">Dominique</a> and <a href="/wiki/Louis_Weasley" title="Louis Weasley">Louis</a>), while <a href="/wiki/George_Weasley" title="George Weasley">George</a> and <a href="/wiki/Angelina_Johnson" title="Angelina Johnson">Angelina Johnson</a> had a son and a daughter (<a href="/wiki/Fred_Weasley_(II)" title="Fred Weasley (II)">Fred</a> and <a href="/wiki/Roxanne_Weasley" title="Roxanne Weasley">Roxanne</a>), and <a href="/wiki/Percy_Weasley" title="Percy Weasley">Percy Weasley</a> had two daughters (<a href="/wiki/Molly_Weasley_(II)" title="Molly Weasley (II)">Molly</a> and <a href="/wiki/Lucy_Weasley" title="Lucy Weasley">Lucy</a>) with his wife, <a href="/wiki/Audrey_Weasley" title="Audrey Weasley">Audrey</a>. <a href="/wiki/Victoire_Weasley" title="Victoire Weasley">Victoire Weasley</a>, one of Fleur and Bill's daughters, was seen kissing <a href="/wiki/Edward_Lupin" title="Edward Lupin">Teddy Lupin</a> at <a href="/wiki/King%27s_Cross_Station" title="King's Cross Station">King's Cross Station</a>, by <a href="/wiki/James_Potter_(II)" title="James Potter (II)">James Potter</a>, Hermione's nephew and godson. Hermione visited them all on many occasions. It can be assumed that she was closest with Harry's children.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Other_Weasley_family_members">Other Weasley family members</span></h4>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 235px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/50/Weasley_Wizarding_Vacation_in_Egypt.png/revision/latest?cb=20220726012818" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Weasley Wizarding Vacation in Egypt" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="235" height="156" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Weasley Wizarding Vacation in Egypt.png" data-image-key="Weasley_Wizarding_Vacation_in_Egypt.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/50/Weasley_Wizarding_Vacation_in_Egypt.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/235?cb=20220726012818" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/50/Weasley_Wizarding_Vacation_in_Egypt.png/revision/latest?cb=20220726012818" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Weasley Wizarding Vacation in Egypt" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/50/Weasley_Wizarding_Vacation_in_Egypt.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/235?cb=20220726012818" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="235" height="156" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Weasley Wizarding Vacation in Egypt.png" data-image-key="Weasley_Wizarding_Vacation_in_Egypt.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/50/Weasley_Wizarding_Vacation_in_Egypt.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/235?cb=20220726012818" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Weasley_Wizarding_Vacation_in_Egypt.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The <a href="/wiki/Weasley_family" title="Weasley family">Weasley family</a>, her future in-laws</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
