<p>Because of her friendships with <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron</a> and <a href="/wiki/Ginevra_Weasley" title="Ginevra Weasley">Ginny Weasley</a>, Hermione became friendly with the entire <a href="/wiki/Weasley_family" title="Weasley family">Weasley family</a>. She spent a portion of many of her summer holidays at their home of <a href="/wiki/The_Burrow" title="The Burrow">The Burrow</a>, and attended some family outings with them, such as shopping for school supplies in <a href="/wiki/Diagon_Alley" title="Diagon Alley">Diagon Alley</a> and attending the <a href="/wiki/1994" title="1994">1994</a> <a href="/wiki/Quidditch_World_Cup" title="Quidditch World Cup">Quidditch World Cup</a> with them. <a href="/wiki/Arthur_Weasley" title="Arthur Weasley">Arthur Weasley</a> was fascinated by the <a href="/wiki/Non-magic_people" title="Non-magic people">Muggle</a> world and thus Hermione's background, and even invited Hermione's <a href="/wiki/Granger_family" title="Granger family">parents</a> for a drink upon first meeting them. <a href="/wiki/Molly_Weasley" title="Molly Weasley">Molly Weasley</a> was fond of Hermione, though she treated her coldly for a brief time after <a href="/wiki/Rita_Skeeter" title="Rita Skeeter">Rita Skeeter</a> printed lies about Hermione toying with the hearts of <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter" title="Harry Potter">Harry Potter</a> and <a href="/wiki/Viktor_Krum" title="Viktor Krum">Viktor Krum</a>, much to Hermione's bewilderment. After Harry explained that the stories were false, Mrs Weasley once again warmed up to Hermione. Also, she and <a href="/wiki/Percy_Weasley" title="Percy Weasley">Percy Weasley</a> were considered to be on good terms until their fight over elf rights.
</p>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire"><b>Fred Weasley</b>: "<i>An Age Line! Well, that should be fooled by an Ageing Potion, shouldn't it? And once your name's in that goblet, you're laughing — it can't tell whether you're seventeen or not!</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Hermione Granger</b>: "<i>But I don't think anyone under seventeen will stand a chance, we just haven't learned enough ...</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Fred Weasley</b>: "<i>Speak for yourself.</i>"</dd>
<dd>— Hermione and Fred disagreeing over the <a href="/wiki/Goblet_of_Fire" title="Goblet of Fire">Goblet of Fire</a>'s <a href="/wiki/Age_Line" title="Age Line">Age Line</a><sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Goblet_of_Fire" title="Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 235px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/95/GF_Weasley_TDH_promo.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161119234440" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="GF Weasley TDH promo" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="235" height="212" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="GF Weasley TDH promo.jpg" data-image-key="GF_Weasley_TDH_promo.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/95/GF_Weasley_TDH_promo.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/235?cb=20161119234440" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/95/GF_Weasley_TDH_promo.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161119234440" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="GF Weasley TDH promo" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/95/GF_Weasley_TDH_promo.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/235?cb=20161119234440" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="235" height="212" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="GF Weasley TDH promo.jpg" data-image-key="GF_Weasley_TDH_promo.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/95/GF_Weasley_TDH_promo.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/235?cb=20161119234440" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:GF_Weasley_TDH_promo.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Fred_Weasley" title="Fred Weasley">Fred</a> and <a href="/wiki/George_Weasley" title="George Weasley">George Weasley</a>, her friends and future brothers-in-law</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Fred and George Weasley seemed to regard Hermione and Harry almost like other younger siblings, teasing them as well as being protective of them. When <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy" title="Draco Malfoy">Draco Malfoy</a> called Hermione a '<a href="/wiki/Mudblood" title="Mudblood">Mudblood</a>' in <a href="/wiki/1992" title="1992">1992</a>, the twins were outraged, and attempted to attack him.<sup id="cite_ref-CS_4-20" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-CS-4"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>4<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Although Hermione disapproved of some of their antics, trying to use her status as a <a href="/wiki/Prefect" title="Prefect">prefect</a> to keep them in line, she still got on well with them. Hermione once argued with them that the <a href="/wiki/Ageing_Potion" title="Ageing Potion">Ageing Potion</a> they planned on using to trick the age line protecting the <a href="/wiki/Goblet_of_Fire" title="Goblet of Fire">Goblet of Fire</a> wouldn't work because Dumbledore would have already thought of a foolish ageing potion. They didn't listen and tried to cross the line which resulted in them being thrown back and grow long, white beards.The only time she was notably angry with them was when they tested out their <a href="/wiki/Skiving_Snackbox" title="Skiving Snackbox">Skiving Snackboxes</a> on unsuspecting <a href="/wiki/First_year" title="First year">first year</a> students; though the twins initially scoffed at her concerns and her ability to make them stop, they backed down when she threatened to tell their <a href="/wiki/Molly_Weasley" title="Molly Weasley">mother</a>.
</p><p>However, Hermione still admired the cleverness and creativity of their spell work,<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP_32-19" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP-32"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>32<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> once remarking that they could do some '<i>extraordinary magic</i>,' which Fred was flattered enough by to offer Hermione material from their <a href="/wiki/Weasleys%27_Wizard_Wheezes" title="Weasleys' Wizard Wheezes">joke shop</a> free of charge.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_36-28" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-36"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>36<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Fred and George also tried to get Hermione to relax, joking around with her about things such as their late uncle <a href="/wiki/Bilius" title="Bilius">Bilius</a>'s penchant for making mischief at weddings.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_10-34" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-10"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>10<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Hermione was devastated when Fred was killed during the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Hogwarts" title="Battle of Hogwarts">Battle of Hogwarts</a>. Hermione was not as close to the other Weasley siblings, though she was invited to <a href="/wiki/William_Weasley" title="William Weasley">Bill</a>'s <a href="/wiki/Wedding_of_William_Weasley_and_Fleur_Delacour" title="Wedding of William Weasley and Fleur Delacour">wedding</a> to <a href="/wiki/Fleur_Delacour" title="Fleur Delacour">Fleur Delacour</a> in <a href="/wiki/1997" title="1997">1997</a>.
</p><p>With her marriage to Ron, Hermione became a part of the Weasley family herself.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Fleur_Delacour">Fleur Delacour</span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">"<i>She really thinks a lot of herself, that one, doesn't she?</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Hermione's scornful attitude towards Fleur<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Goblet_of_Fire" title="Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 165px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1e/Fleur_Delacour.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20220718183655" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Fleur Delacour" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="165" height="220" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Fleur Delacour.jpg" data-image-key="Fleur_Delacour.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1e/Fleur_Delacour.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/165?cb=20220718183655" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1e/Fleur_Delacour.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20220718183655" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Fleur Delacour" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1e/Fleur_Delacour.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/165?cb=20220718183655" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="165" height="220" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Fleur Delacour.jpg" data-image-key="Fleur_Delacour.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1e/Fleur_Delacour.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/165?cb=20220718183655" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Fleur_Delacour.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Fleur_Delacour" title="Fleur Delacour">Fleur Delacour</a>, her future sister-in-law</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>When Hermione first met Fleur Delacour, an incredibly beautiful, <a href="/wiki/France" title="France">French</a>, part-<a href="/wiki/Veela" title="Veela">Veela</a> <a href="/wiki/Wizardkind" title="Wizardkind">witch</a>, in <a href="/wiki/1994" title="1994">1994</a>, during the <a href="/wiki/Triwizard_Tournament" title="Triwizard Tournament">Triwizard Tournament</a>. Hermione disliked Fleur almost immediately, as she was given to fussily and loudly criticising nearly everything at <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry" title="Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry">Hogwarts</a>, from the weather, to the decoration and food. The fact that Ron had a little bit of a crush on Fleur didn't help, but he eventually got over it.
</p><p>Hermione, like Ginny and <a href="/wiki/Molly_Weasley" title="Molly Weasley">Mrs Weasley</a>, was infuriated by Fleur's arrogance and constant complaining when <a href="/wiki/William_Weasley" title="William Weasley">Bill Weasley</a> sent Fleur, his then fiancée, to <a href="/wiki/The_Burrow" title="The Burrow">The Burrow</a> to get to know his family. However, when Fleur responded to Bill becoming permanently disfigured by <a href="/wiki/Fenrir_Greyback" title="Fenrir Greyback">Fenrir Greyback</a> with indignant denial that Bill's appearance would in any way effect their marital plans, Hermione most likely set her feelings aside.
</p><p>Despite seeming rather inconsiderate and self-centred, Fleur proved to be courageous and ultimately caring, even selfless, in her own way. She put her life in danger by posing as one of Harry's decoys in the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_the_Seven_Potters" title="Battle of the Seven Potters">Battle of the Seven Potters</a>, and after the <a href="/wiki/Skirmish_at_Malfoy_Manor" title="Skirmish at Malfoy Manor">Battle of Malfoy Manor</a>, Hermione, Harry and Ron, along with <a href="/wiki/Luna_Lovegood" title="Luna Lovegood">Luna Lovegood</a>, <a href="/wiki/Dean_Thomas" title="Dean Thomas">Dean Thomas</a>, and an injured <a href="/wiki/Garrick_Ollivander" title="Garrick Ollivander">Garrick Ollivander</a> and <a href="/wiki/Griphook" title="Griphook">Griphook</a>, stayed with Bill and Fleur for a month at <a href="/wiki/Shell_Cottage" title="Shell Cottage">Shell Cottage</a>, where Fleur took care of them all like a mother. Later, Fleur became Hermione's sister-in-law through her marriage to <a href="/wiki/William_Weasley" title="William Weasley">Bill Weasley</a>, and Hermione's marriage to <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron Weasley</a>.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Romances">Romances</span></h3>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Ron_Weasley">Ron Weasley</span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: MuggleNet">"<i>Oh, maybe she and Ron will be alright with a bit of counselling, you know. I wonder what happens at wizard marriage counselling? They'll probably be fine. He needs to work on his self-esteem issues and she needs to work on being a little less critical.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— <a href="/wiki/J._K._Rowling" title="J. K. Rowling">J. K. Rowling</a> on Hermione and Ron's adult relationship<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/MuggleNet" title="MuggleNet">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div><figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 165px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/44/Ronald_Weasley_DHF1.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20101104210200" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Ronald Weasley DHF1" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="165" height="220" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Ronald Weasley DHF1.jpg" data-image-key="Ronald_Weasley_DHF1.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/44/Ronald_Weasley_DHF1.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/165?cb=20101104210200" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/44/Ronald_Weasley_DHF1.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20101104210200" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Ronald Weasley DHF1" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/44/Ronald_Weasley_DHF1.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/165?cb=20101104210200" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="165" height="220" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Ronald Weasley DHF1.jpg" data-image-key="Ronald_Weasley_DHF1.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/44/Ronald_Weasley_DHF1.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/165?cb=20101104210200" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Ronald_Weasley_DHF1.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron Weasley</a>, the love of her life and father to her children</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Ronald Weasley was, essentially, the love of Hermione's life. Although their relationship would have many ups and downs, Hermione and Ron Weasley were good friends for most of their years at <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry" title="Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry">Hogwarts</a>, and of course, were best friends with <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter" title="Harry Potter">Harry Potter</a>, who was usually a mediator in their disputes. They tended to argue frequently, though they usually got over their arguments, which tended to be minor or about trivial issues, although there were a few times when it seemed as if their friendship would be irreparable. As they grew older and matured, Ron and Hermione tended to fight less often and become more in touch with their feelings for each other. Hermione sometimes had the tendency of calling <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron</a> '<i>Ronald</i>'. Their first major falling-out was in their third year, when Ron accused Hermione's pet cat <a href="/wiki/Crookshanks" title="Crookshanks">Crookshanks</a> of eating his pet rat <a href="/wiki/Peter_Pettigrew" title="Peter Pettigrew">Scabbers</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-POA_34-20" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-POA-34"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>34<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>Hints of her feelings for Ron were shown as early as their first year, when she was badly hurt emotionally when he made fun of her for not having friends due to her bookish and bossy nature. According to Neville she spent the whole afternoon crying in the loo before the incident with the troll took place. In their third year Ron saw Sirius Black standing over him with a knife, Hermione was shocked and scared the most and even cried. They were both very awkward and embarrassed at times, being insecure with their own feelings for each other. Ron was used to always being in Harry's shadow and did not want the girl he loved to be also taken from him by his best friend. Hermione was greatly offended when Ron initially didn't ask her to the Yule Ball as his partner until he got rejected by Fleur Delacour. When it is revealed Viktor Krum was Hermione's date, a jealous Ron got into a heated row with Hermione, which she ended by making clear that she would go as Ron's date in future if only he asked her as his first choice. Ron and Hermione's relationship again suffered when Ron began dating <a href="/wiki/Lavender_Brown" title="Lavender Brown">Lavender Brown</a> in <a href="/wiki/1996" title="1996">1996</a>, though the two reconciled after Ron was accidentally poisoned, leaving Hermione shaken. Ron's relationship with Lavender ended soon after, and both he and Hermione were more content for it.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_36-29" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-36"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>36<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 175px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/38/Ron-y-Hermione-en-la-Madriguera.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160731041108" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Ron-y-Hermione-en-la-Madriguera" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="175" height="226" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Ron-y-Hermione-en-la-Madriguera.jpg" data-image-key="Ron-y-Hermione-en-la-Madriguera.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/38/Ron-y-Hermione-en-la-Madriguera.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/175?cb=20160731041108" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/38/Ron-y-Hermione-en-la-Madriguera.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160731041108" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Ron-y-Hermione-en-la-Madriguera" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/38/Ron-y-Hermione-en-la-Madriguera.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/175?cb=20160731041108" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="175" height="226" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Ron-y-Hermione-en-la-Madriguera.jpg" data-image-key="Ron-y-Hermione-en-la-Madriguera.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/38/Ron-y-Hermione-en-la-Madriguera.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/175?cb=20160731041108" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Ron-y-Hermione-en-la-Madriguera.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Hermione and Ron expressing their affection for each other</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix">"<i>Ron, you are the most insensitive wart I have ever had the misfortune to meet</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Hermione tells Ron off for his insensitivity with girls' feelings<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<p>Hints of romantic feelings between the two could be seen as early as their <a href="/wiki/1992" title="1992">second year</a>, as Ron was particularly protective of Hermione and disgusted by her crush on <a href="/wiki/Gilderoy_Lockhart" title="Gilderoy Lockhart">Gilderoy Lockhart</a>. Also During the second year when Malfoy insulted Hermione calling her a mudblood an enraged Ron attempted to punish him with a curse, but as his wand was broken, the curse backfired on him injuring him.<sup id="cite_ref-CS_4-21" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-CS-4"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>4<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> During the <a href="/wiki/Yule_Ball" title="Yule Ball">Yule Ball</a> in <a href="/wiki/1994" title="1994">1994</a>, Hermione was affronted by Ron's clumsy attempt to ask her to go with him, and Ron was jealous of her attendance with <a href="/wiki/Viktor_Krum" title="Viktor Krum">Viktor Krum</a>; this jealousy would persist for years. In turn, Hermione was jealous of Ron's crush on <a href="/wiki/Fleur_Delacour" title="Fleur Delacour">Fleur Delacour</a>, though expressed it in a subtler way.
</p><p>In her fourth year while Harry and Ron were not in speaking terms following Harry's name coming out of the goblet of fire, Hermione defended Ron to Harry reminding him that despite him not wanting it he always gets all the attention while Ron had to live up competing with his five older brothers and Ron is always made to feel second to him.
</p><p>In their fifth year, Hermione kissed Ron on the cheek before the <a href="/wiki/Inter-House_Quidditch_Cup" title="Inter-House Quidditch Cup">Quidditch Tournament</a>, to which he reacted by being 'puzzled' and touching the spot where she kissed him. During Gryffindor's Quidditch try-outs in their sixth year, Hermione also <a href="/wiki/Confundus_Charm" title="Confundus Charm">Confunded</a> Cormac McLaggen to increase Ron's chances of being made the team's Keeper. Also, Hermione became jealous (but she tried to conceal it) when Ron began dating <a href="/wiki/Lavender_Brown" title="Lavender Brown">Lavender Brown</a> and kissing her frequently.
</p>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-right show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 235px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/39/DH1_Ron_and_Hermione_picking_up_stones.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20110416015544" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="DH1 Ron and Hermione picking up stones" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="235" height="157" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="DH1 Ron and Hermione picking up stones.jpg" data-image-key="DH1_Ron_and_Hermione_picking_up_stones.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/39/DH1_Ron_and_Hermione_picking_up_stones.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/235?cb=20110416015544" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/39/DH1_Ron_and_Hermione_picking_up_stones.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20110416015544" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="DH1 Ron and Hermione picking up stones" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/39/DH1_Ron_and_Hermione_picking_up_stones.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/235?cb=20110416015544" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="235" height="157" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="DH1 Ron and Hermione picking up stones.jpg" data-image-key="DH1_Ron_and_Hermione_picking_up_stones.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/39/DH1_Ron_and_Hermione_picking_up_stones.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/235?cb=20110416015544" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:DH1_Ron_and_Hermione_picking_up_stones.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Ron and Hermione spending time together during the Horcrux hunt</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows"><b>Hermione</b>: "<i>I came running after you! I called you! I begged you to come back!</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Ron Weasley </b>: "<i>I know. Hermione, I'm sorry, I'm really—</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Hermione</b>: "<i>Oh, you're </i>sorry<i>! You came back after weeks — </i>weeks<i> — and you think it's all going to be all right if you just say sorry?... Weeks and weeks, we could have been </i>dead<i>…</i>"</dd>
<dd>— Hermione and Ron after the latter's return to her and Harry<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<p>By the summer of <a href="/wiki/1997" title="1997">1997</a>, the two were closer than ever and 'sort of' together, according to Harry. They danced together at <a href="/wiki/William_Weasley" title="William Weasley">Bill</a> and Fleur's <a href="/wiki/Wedding_of_William_Weasley_and_Fleur_Delacour" title="Wedding of William Weasley and Fleur Delacour">wedding</a>, and were generally kinder to one another. During the hunt for the <a href="/wiki/Horcrux" title="Horcrux">Horcruxes</a>, Ron comforted Hermione several times by putting his arm around her, and Harry believed that they might have fallen asleep holding hands. When Harry was briefly shouting at Hermione who was confronting him about his fallout with Remus Lupin, Ron defended Hermione from Harry by angrily saying ''Don't you start on her!' Hermione was extremely upset when Ron temporarily left her and Harry, crying often, and she was absolutely furious with him when he returned. It was also revealed, through a vision caused by the <a href="/wiki/Slytherin%27s_Locket" title="Slytherin's Locket">locket Horcrux</a>, that one of Ron's deepest fears was that Hermione preferred Harry to him.
</p>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 240px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/32/Hermione_and_Ron_kissing_in_the_Chamber_of_Secrets.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140611234353" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Hermione and Ron kissing in the Chamber of Secrets" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="240" height="147" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Hermione and Ron kissing in the Chamber of Secrets.gif" data-image-key="Hermione_and_Ron_kissing_in_the_Chamber_of_Secrets.gif" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/32/Hermione_and_Ron_kissing_in_the_Chamber_of_Secrets.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20140611234353" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/32/Hermione_and_Ron_kissing_in_the_Chamber_of_Secrets.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140611234353" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Hermione and Ron kissing in the Chamber of Secrets" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/32/Hermione_and_Ron_kissing_in_the_Chamber_of_Secrets.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20140611234353" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="240" height="147" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Hermione and Ron kissing in the Chamber of Secrets.gif" data-image-key="Hermione_and_Ron_kissing_in_the_Chamber_of_Secrets.gif" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/32/Hermione_and_Ron_kissing_in_the_Chamber_of_Secrets.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20140611234353" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Hermione_and_Ron_kissing_in_the_Chamber_of_Secrets.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Ron and Hermione's first kiss during the Battle of Hogwarts</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>The two eventually made up, and Hermione initiated a kiss during the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Hogwarts" title="Battle of Hogwarts">Battle of Hogwarts</a>, when Ron suggested saving the <a href="/wiki/House-elf" title="House-elf">house-elves</a> and not ordering them to fight for wizards. Hermione, who had been a promoter of house-elf rights since her fourth year and even started her own society to help house-elves (the <a href="/wiki/Society_for_the_Promotion_of_Elfish_Welfare" title="Society for the Promotion of Elfish Welfare">Society for the Promotion of Elfish Welfare</a>) was so delighted at Ron's unexpected display of sensitivity that she kissed him on the lips, something that was met with surprise, eagerness and enthusiasm, but caused the pair to become embarrassed after Harry asked them to '<i>hold it in</i>'.
</p><p>Some people had expected Ron and Hermione to become more than friends much sooner and Harry Potter had even thought that they would start dating in their sixth year. In the fifth year while Hermione and Harry were arguing about Harry's decision to talk to Sirius, Hermione asked Ron's advice in a manner that 'reminded irresistibly of Mrs Weasley appealing to her husband during Harry's first dinner in Grimmauld Place.' In 1997, when the Trio was captured by <a href="/wiki/Snatchers" title="Snatchers">Snatchers</a> and brought to <a href="/wiki/Malfoy_Manor" title="Malfoy Manor">Malfoy Manor</a>, <a href="/wiki/Fenrir_Greyback" title="Fenrir Greyback">Fenrir Greyback</a> mistakenly called Ron Hermione's boyfriend when she tried to protect him. Also, Ron screamed and yelled and was in terrible distress when he heard Hermione being tortured by <a href="/wiki/Bellatrix_Lestrange" title="Bellatrix Lestrange">Bellatrix Lestrange</a> in Malfoy Manor. The pair eventually married and had two children, <a href="/wiki/Rose_Granger-Weasley" title="Rose Granger-Weasley">Rose</a> and <a href="/wiki/Hugo_Granger-Weasley" title="Hugo Granger-Weasley">Hugo Weasley</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_10-35" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-10"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>10<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>They were rather young when they were married, and their relationship evolved over time. By the time that Hermione was elected Minister For Magic, Ron had become more the stay-at-home-dad due to the convenience it placed on their respective careers, as Ron's entrepreneurial exploits could be more easily conducted than Hermione's careers in law enforcement and eventually politics. Their combative relationship eventually subsided for a more affectionate one, as Ron was seen to kiss Hermione in public extremely often as noted by their nephew, Albus Potter. Hermione was initially wary when Ron spoke of how early they had married and was jokingly suspicious that he wanted a break from their marriage, but was deeply moved when Ron told her that he wanted to renew their vows and marry her all over again after reading about how Muggles occasionally did such a thing. Hermione was so touched by her husband's suggestion that they began to kiss passionately over her mountain of paperwork in her office. This shows how Ron had matured into a startling romantic over the years and how it helped to temper their initially rocky relationship that begun 31 years prior.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Viktor_Krum_2">Viktor Krum</span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire"><b>Hermione</b>: "<i>How did <a href="/wiki/Rita_Skeeter" title="Rita Skeeter">she</a> know Viktor asked me to visit him over the summer?... Madam Pomfrey gave us both blankets and then he sort of pulled me away from the judges so they wouldn't hear, and he said, if I wasn't doing anything over the summer, would I like to —</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Ron Weasley </b>: "<i>And what did you say?</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Hermione</b>: "<i>And he did say he'd never felt the same way about anyone else...</i>"</dd>
<dd>— Hermione about Viktor Krum's invitation to spend the summer with him.<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Goblet_of_Fire" title="Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 165px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/aa/Goffilm39.1.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141103135847" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Goffilm39.1" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="165" height="232" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Goffilm39.1.jpg" data-image-key="Goffilm39.1.jpg" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/aa/Goffilm39.1.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/165?cb=20141103135847" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/aa/Goffilm39.1.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20141103135847" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Goffilm39.1" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/aa/Goffilm39.1.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/165?cb=20141103135847" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="165" height="232" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Goffilm39.1.jpg" data-image-key="Goffilm39.1.jpg" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/aa/Goffilm39.1.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/165?cb=20141103135847" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Goffilm39.1.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Viktor_Krum" title="Viktor Krum">Viktor Krum</a>, her friend and Yule Ball date</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Viktor Krum, a renowned professional <a href="/wiki/Quidditch" title="Quidditch">Quidditch</a> player and student of <a href="/wiki/Durmstrang_Institute" title="Durmstrang Institute">Durmstrang</a>, came to <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry" title="Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry">Hogwarts</a> in <a href="/wiki/1994" title="1994">1994</a> for the <a href="/wiki/Triwizard_Tournament" title="Triwizard Tournament">Triwizard Tournament</a>, in which he was a Champion. He took to following Hermione into the library, watching her and trying to '<i>pluck up the courage</i>' to speak to her. Eventually, he asked her to be his date to the <a href="/wiki/Yule_Ball" title="Yule Ball">Yule Ball</a>, and Hermione accepted. Their arrival together caused something of a stir, given Viktor's fame and Hermione's exceptional, and rather unexpected, beauty.
</p><p>Hermione was Viktor's 'hostage' during the Second Task of the Tournament. After he pulled her from the lake, Viktor told Hermione that he had never felt about someone the way he felt about her, and invited her to visit him in <a href="/wiki/Bulgaria" title="Bulgaria">Bulgaria</a> over the summer.<sup id="cite_ref-GOF_35-13" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-GOF-35"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>35<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> At some point, it is alleged by Ginny Weasley during a confrontation with her brother Ron, that he and Hermione shared a kiss during that period.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_36-30" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-36"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>36<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Whether or not Ginny was just trying to get under Ron's skin or if this actually happened is unknown. What is known is that their relationship never became serious enough for her to visit him in Bulgaria, they kept in contact through letters over the years.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP_32-20" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP-32"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>32<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> They met again at the <a href="/wiki/Wedding_of_William_Weasley_and_Fleur_Delacour" title="Wedding of William Weasley and Fleur Delacour">wedding</a> of <a href="/wiki/William_Weasley" title="William Weasley">Bill Weasley</a> and <a href="/wiki/Fleur_Delacour" title="Fleur Delacour">Fleur Delacour</a> in <a href="/wiki/1997" title="1997">1997</a>, where Viktor complimented Hermione and was disappointed to learn that she had 'sort of' begun a romance with <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron Weasley</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_10-36" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-10"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>10<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Friends">Friends</span></h3>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Harry_Potter">Harry Potter</span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">"<i>[Harry] put his arm around Hermione's shoulders, and she put hers around his waist, and they turned in silence and walked away through the snow, past Dumbledore's mother and sister, back toward the dark church and the out-of-sight kissing gate.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Harry and Hermione share a moment at his parents' grave<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 168px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/ce/Harry_Potter_DHF1.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20140603201724" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry Potter DHF1" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="168" height="224" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry Potter DHF1.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_Potter_DHF1.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/ce/Harry_Potter_DHF1.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/168?cb=20140603201724" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/ce/Harry_Potter_DHF1.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20140603201724" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry Potter DHF1" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/ce/Harry_Potter_DHF1.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/168?cb=20140603201724" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="168" height="224" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry Potter DHF1.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_Potter_DHF1.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/ce/Harry_Potter_DHF1.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/168?cb=20140603201724" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_Potter_DHF1.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter" title="Harry Potter">Harry Potter</a>, her best friend and future co-brother-in-law</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Hermione became friends with Harry Potter after they as well as <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron Weasley</a> took down a <a href="/wiki/Mountain_Troll" class="mw-redirect" title="Mountain Troll">Mountain Troll</a> together in their first year.<sup id="cite_ref-PS_3-26" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PS-3"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>3<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> They tended to get along very well on a day-to-day basis, though Harry occasionally became annoyed by Hermione's nagging, while she occasionally became annoyed by his lack of discipline and conviction in his schoolwork. Their only notable row was over Hermione getting Harry's <a href="/wiki/Firebolt" title="Firebolt">Firebolt</a> confiscated in their third year, which she felt it might be a trap. Harry and Ron reconciled with Hermione after <a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid" title="Rubeus Hagrid">Hagrid</a> scolded them for their treatment of her. Harry and Hermione were quite similar in their dour, brooding tendencies in times of trouble, and often needed Ron's humour and levity to counterbalance their intense personalities.
</p><p>Harry, Hermione, and Ron spent nearly all their time together during their years at Hogwarts, and shortly afterwards, Hermione led Harry through <a href="/wiki/Time-Turner" title="Time-Turner">time-travel</a>, and together they rescued <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black" title="Sirius Black">Sirius Black</a> and <a href="/wiki/Buckbeak" title="Buckbeak">Buckbeak</a>; Hermione breaking the rules of using her Time-Turner, something she admitted was incredibly dangerous, demonstrated the strength of her friendship with Harry.<sup id="cite_ref-POA_34-21" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-POA-34"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>34<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> The <a href="/wiki/1994" title="1994">following year</a>, Hermione was the only student who believed Harry when he told her he had not put his name in the <a href="/wiki/Goblet_of_Fire" title="Goblet of Fire">Goblet of Fire</a>, and spent much of the <a href="/wiki/Triwizard_Tournament" title="Triwizard Tournament">Triwizard Tournament</a> teaching Harry useful spells and trying to reconcile him and Ron.<sup id="cite_ref-GOF_35-14" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-GOF-35"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>35<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone"><b>Hermione Granger</b>: "<i>Harry — you're a great wizard, you know.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Harry Potter</b>: "<i>I'm not as good as you.</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Hermione Granger</b>: "<i>Me! Books! And cleverness! There are more important things — friendship and bravery and — oh Harry — be careful!</i>"</dd>
<dd>— Hermione's bond with Harry<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Philosopher%27s_Stone" title="Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<p>While Harry and Hermione typically argued less than Ron and Hermione, they had the most philosophical and moral disagreements with one another. Ron typically deferred to Harry's opinions on important decisions, and tends to hold back when Hermione confronts Harry about them, letting them battle it out. For example, Harry and Hermione fought about how best to deal with <a href="/wiki/Dolores_Umbridge" title="Dolores Umbridge">Dolores Umbridge</a> when she infiltrated Hogwarts, whether or not Sirius's judgement could be trusted, whether or not Harry should have tried to use <a href="/wiki/Occlumency" title="Occlumency">Occlumency</a> to block out his mental link with Voldemort, whether Dumbledore's past made him an unworthy leader, and whether they should have pursued the Hallows or the Horcruxes. Hermione expressed immense displeasure to Harry during the sixth year after he started obtaining better results than her at Potion by the help of the 'Half Blood Prince's potions book'. Harry tended to be dismissive of Hermione's opinions, and could even grow angry when she tried to argue her point, but many times realised later that she was right. For example, Harry was often dismissive of Hermione's insistence that all <a href="/wiki/House-elf" title="House-elf">house-elves</a> deserve respect and kindness, and was neglectful towards <a href="/wiki/Kreacher" title="Kreacher">Kreacher</a> because of his bigotry until he finally realised the horrifying nature of his enslavement.
</p>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 240px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/96/POA_Hermione_shielding_Harry_Shrieking_Shack.gif/revision/latest?cb=20150722165057" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="POA Hermione shielding Harry Shrieking Shack" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="240" height="135" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="POA Hermione shielding Harry Shrieking Shack.gif" data-image-key="POA_Hermione_shielding_Harry_Shrieking_Shack.gif" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/96/POA_Hermione_shielding_Harry_Shrieking_Shack.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20150722165057" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/96/POA_Hermione_shielding_Harry_Shrieking_Shack.gif/revision/latest?cb=20150722165057" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="POA Hermione shielding Harry Shrieking Shack" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/96/POA_Hermione_shielding_Harry_Shrieking_Shack.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20150722165057" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="240" height="135" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="POA Hermione shielding Harry Shrieking Shack.gif" data-image-key="POA_Hermione_shielding_Harry_Shrieking_Shack.gif" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/96/POA_Hermione_shielding_Harry_Shrieking_Shack.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/240?cb=20150722165057" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:POA_Hermione_shielding_Harry_Shrieking_Shack.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Hermione protecting Harry, demonstrating her willingness to put his best interests first</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>While Harry tended to have more fun with Ron, Hermione was consistently his place of refuge when others abandoned him, from Ron's jealous withdrawal during the Triwizard Tournament, to Harry's discovery of Dumbledore's past during the war. Despite their differences, Harry and Hermione tended to support one another at the expense of others when necessary. Hermione repeatedly chose to help and support Harry in his fight against Voldemort, regardless of personal cost. Examples include breaking the laws regarding time travel in order to help him save Sirius, teaching him defensive magic in preparation for the <a href="/wiki/Triwizard_Tournament" title="Triwizard Tournament">Triwizard Tournament</a>, blackmailing <a href="/wiki/Rita_Skeeter" title="Rita Skeeter">Rita Skeeter</a> in order to give him a way to tell the public about Voldemort's return, protecting him from torture by Dolores Umbridge, and Obliviating her parents in order to go on the run with him. She notably chose to support him even when Ron did not. Smaller acts of friendship included helping him with homework and cheering him on at Quidditch games.
</p><p>Harry was similarly protective and supportive of Hermione. Much like Hermione, Harry was often a place of refuge for Hermione when others leave her. Harry often comforted Hermione and showed her kindness and care when she was upset. On the occasion that Buckbeak the Hippogriff was executed, Harry consoled her as she cries.
</p><p>He was also quick to defend Hermione from Cho Chang, Draco Malfoy, and others who insulted her for her looks or parentage, which showed his pride in her intellect on numerous occasions. He consistently praised her intelligence and magical skills to teachers, asked her for help in dangerous situations, and defended her against bullies. On one occasion, he even choose to side with her over Ron when he was dating Lavender. But he expressed outrage when Hermione went to Slughorn's party with Cormac McLaggen.
</p><p>Harry also defended Hermione physically on instinct. This showed his willingness to put her before himself as well as his unconditional brotherly love for her. For example, when Lupin turned into a werewolf and attacked Hermione and Harry in <a href="/wiki/1994" title="1994">1994</a>, Harry shielded her from the danger.
</p><p>Many people, including <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron</a>, <a href="/wiki/Cho_Chang" title="Cho Chang">Cho Chang</a>, <a href="/wiki/Viktor_Krum" title="Viktor Krum">Viktor Krum</a>, <a href="/wiki/Molly_Weasley" title="Molly Weasley">Mrs Weasley</a>, have occasionally mistaken Harry and Hermione's relationship to be a romantic one, given their closeness and expressions of physical affection, such as kisses on the cheek, staying by one another's bedsides when hurt or injured, embracing each other, and holding hands.<sup id="cite_ref-GOF_35-15" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-GOF-35"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>35<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-75" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-75"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>75<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Harry eventually explained to Ron that he and Hermione were like brother and sister.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_10-37" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-10"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>10<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> They shared similar upbringings as being only children raised in the <a href="/wiki/Non-magic_people" title="Non-magic people">Muggle</a> world, and showed each other unconditional love despite their many differences and disagreements. During their time alone during the war, Ron and Harry maintained a distance, with Hermione mostly crying for Ron and Harry observing Ginny's dot at the Marauder's map. They did exchange a comforting moment during their brief embrace after Harry visited his parent's grave.<sup id="cite_ref-HAH_76-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HAH-76"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>76<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>Hermione and Harry remained best friends into adulthood, and eventually became co-siblings in-law when Hermione married <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron Weasley</a> and Harry married <a href="/wiki/Ginevra_Weasley" title="Ginevra Weasley">Ginny Weasley</a>. Hermione was also the aunt and godmother of Harry's three children: <a href="/wiki/James_Potter_(II)" title="James Potter (II)">James Sirius</a>, <a href="/wiki/Albus_Potter" title="Albus Potter">Albus Severus</a> and <a href="/wiki/Lily_Potter_(II)" title="Lily Potter (II)">Lily Luna</a>. They were also coworkers for many years as employees of the Ministry of Magic in law enforcement.
</p><p>It is interesting to note that Albus Dumbledore's final plan to defeat Lord Voldemort, in which Harry would learn the story of the Deathly Hallows in time to use them against Voldemort, revolved not only around Harry himself, but Hermione as well. Dumbledore knew that Harry was too passionate and angry to be able to keep from attempting to become Master of Death, and so entrusted <i><a href="/wiki/The_Tales_of_Beedle_the_Bard" title="The Tales of Beedle the Bard">The Tales of Beedle the Bard</a></i> to Hermione, so that she would learn of the Hallows' symbol first and would be able to caution and guide Harry down the path of reason.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Ginny_Weasley">Ginny Weasley</span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince"><b>Ginny Weasley </b>: "<i>Hermione told me to get on with life, maybe go out with some other people, relax a bit around you, because I never used to be able to talk if you were in the room, remember? And she thought you might take a bit more notice if I was a bit more — myself.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Harry Potter</b>: "<i>Smart girl, that Hermione.</i>"</dd>
<dd>— Ginny regarding how she confides in Hermione<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-Blood_Prince" title="Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 160px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/82/Ginny_Weasley.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20101127043147" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Ginny Weasley" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="160" height="211" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Ginny Weasley.jpg" data-image-key="Ginny_Weasley.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/82/Ginny_Weasley.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/160?cb=20101127043147" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/82/Ginny_Weasley.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20101127043147" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Ginny Weasley" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/82/Ginny_Weasley.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/160?cb=20101127043147" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="160" height="211" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Ginny Weasley.jpg" data-image-key="Ginny_Weasley.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/82/Ginny_Weasley.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/160?cb=20101127043147" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Ginny_Weasley.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Ginevra_Weasley" title="Ginevra Weasley">Ginny Weasley</a>, her good friend and future sister-in-law</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Ginny Weasley was Hermione's best female friend and Ginny's confidante. The two grew close when Hermione stayed in Ginny's room at <a href="/wiki/The_Burrow" title="The Burrow">The Burrow</a> during her many summertime visits. Ginny was the only one Hermione told about being asked to the <a href="/wiki/Yule_Ball" title="Yule Ball">Yule Ball</a> by <a href="/wiki/Viktor_Krum" title="Viktor Krum">Viktor Krum</a>,<sup id="cite_ref-GOF_35-16" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-GOF-35"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>35<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> while Hermione was the only one who knew that Ginny had been learning to fly in secret for years.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP_32-21" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP-32"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>32<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> She also gave Ginny advice about dealing with her feelings for Harry — advice that eventually led to the two dating,<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_36-31" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-36"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>36<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> and eventually marrying.
</p><p>Hermione comforted Ginny after an encounter with <a href="/wiki/Dementor" title="Dementor">Dementors</a> upset her in <a href="/wiki/1993" title="1993">1993</a>,<sup id="cite_ref-POA_34-22" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-POA-34"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>34<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> and after the death of her brother <a href="/wiki/Fred_Weasley" title="Fred Weasley">Fred</a> in <a href="/wiki/1998" title="1998">1998</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_10-38" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-10"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>10<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> However, Hermione would not have been afraid to stand up to Ginny when she felt that Ginny was wrong. The two remained very close after <a href="/wiki/Second_Wizarding_War" title="Second Wizarding War">the war</a> and eventually became sisters-in-law when Hermione married Ron, making her an aunt to Ginny's three children, <a href="/wiki/James_Potter_(II)" title="James Potter (II)">James</a>, <a href="/wiki/Albus_Potter" title="Albus Potter">Albus</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Lily_Potter_(II)" title="Lily Potter (II)">Lily</a>, as well as being chosen to be godmother to Ginny's eldest son James, and making Ginny Rose and Hugo's aunt and almost certainly Rose's godmother.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Neville_Longbottom">Neville Longbottom</span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows"><b>Phineas Nigellus</b>: "<i>Exactly what claim did the Weasley girl have upon it? She deserved her punishment, as did the idiot Longbottom and the Lovegood oddity!</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Hermione</b>: "<i>Neville is not an idiot and Luna is not an oddity!</i>"</dd>
<dd>— The portrait of <a href="/wiki/Phineas_Nigellus_Black" title="Phineas Nigellus Black">Phineas Nigellus Black</a> discussing the attempted theft of <a href="/wiki/Sword_of_Gryffindor" title="Sword of Gryffindor">Gryffindor's Sword</a><sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 154px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b6/Neville_Longbottom.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20140610141612" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Neville Longbottom" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="154" height="240" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Neville Longbottom.jpg" data-image-key="Neville_Longbottom.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b6/Neville_Longbottom.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/154?cb=20140610141612" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b6/Neville_Longbottom.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20140610141612" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Neville Longbottom" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b6/Neville_Longbottom.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/154?cb=20140610141612" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="154" height="240" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Neville Longbottom.jpg" data-image-key="Neville_Longbottom.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b6/Neville_Longbottom.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/154?cb=20140610141612" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Neville_Longbottom.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Neville_Longbottom" title="Neville Longbottom">Neville Longbottom</a>, her friend</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Hermione was good friends with Neville Longbottom. They met on the <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_Express" title="Hogwarts Express">train</a> to Hogwarts during their first year and she helped him search for his toad <a href="/wiki/Trevor" title="Trevor">Trevor</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-PS_3-27" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PS-3"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>3<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Hermione helped Neville many times with their school work, particularly with <a href="/wiki/Potions_(class)" title="Potions (class)">Potions</a>, as <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Professor Snape</a> noted that she was often '<i>hissing instructions in his ear</i>.'<sup id="cite_ref-POA_34-23" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-POA-34"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>34<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> In their <a href="/wiki/1994" title="1994">fourth year</a>, Hermione noticed Neville's horrified reaction to witnessing the <a href="/wiki/Cruciatus_Curse" title="Cruciatus Curse">Cruciatus Curse</a> be performed on a <a href="/wiki/Spider" title="Spider">spider</a> by Professor <a href="/wiki/Alastor_Moody" title="Alastor Moody">Alastor Moody</a> (actually <a href="/wiki/Bartemius_Crouch_Junior" title="Bartemius Crouch Junior">Barty Crouch Jnr</a>), and shrieked for the teacher to stop. That same year, Neville asked Hermione to attend the <a href="/wiki/Yule_Ball" title="Yule Ball">Yule Ball</a> with him, as she had '<i>always been really nice</i>' to him, though she had already agreed to accompany <a href="/wiki/Viktor_Krum" title="Viktor Krum">Viktor Krum</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-GOF_35-17" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-GOF-35"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>35<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>Hermione often fiercely defended Neville when others insulted him, and her friendship and support, as well as that of other <a href="/wiki/Dumbledore%27s_Army" title="Dumbledore's Army">D.A.</a> members, likely contributed to Neville gradually gaining self-confidence and courage.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_10-39" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-10"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>10<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Neville was obviously very fond of Hermione, and appreciative of her kindness and all the help she had given him. It was hinted that he spoke of her frequently to his grandmother, <a href="/wiki/Augusta_Longbottom" title="Augusta Longbottom">Augusta Longbottom</a>, who seemed to already know a good deal about Hermione when they first met at Saint Mungo's in <a href="/wiki/1995" title="1995">1995</a>. Following the war, they kept in touch.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Luna_Lovegood">Luna Lovegood</span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows"><b>Hermione</b>: "<i>What about Luna?</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Ron Weasley </b>: "<i>Well, if they're telling the truth and she's still alive —</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Hermione</b>: "<i>Don't say that, don't say it! She must be alive, she must!</i>"</dd>
<dd>— Hermione, Ron, and Harry after their escape from the <a href="/wiki/Lovegood_House" title="Lovegood House">Lovegood House</a><sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 165px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/ed/Luna_Lovegood.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160902165706" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Luna Lovegood" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="165" height="245" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Luna Lovegood.jpg" data-image-key="Luna_Lovegood.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/ed/Luna_Lovegood.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/165?cb=20160902165706" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/ed/Luna_Lovegood.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160902165706" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Luna Lovegood" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/ed/Luna_Lovegood.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/165?cb=20160902165706" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="165" height="245" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Luna Lovegood.jpg" data-image-key="Luna_Lovegood.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/ed/Luna_Lovegood.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/165?cb=20160902165706" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Luna_Lovegood.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Luna_Lovegood" title="Luna Lovegood">Luna Lovegood</a>, a good friend</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Although Hermione rarely saw eye-to-eye with Luna Lovegood due to their very different world views and beliefs, the two became very good friends through <a href="/wiki/Dumbledore%27s_Army" title="Dumbledore's Army">Dumbledore's Army</a>. Hermione first met Luna on the <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_Express" title="Hogwarts Express">Hogwarts Express</a> in <a href="/wiki/1995" title="1995">1995</a>; she insulted <i><a href="/wiki/The_Quibbler" title="The Quibbler">The Quibbler</a></i>, but backtracked when Luna told her that her <a href="/wiki/Xenophilius_Lovegood" title="Xenophilius Lovegood">father</a> was the editor. Hermione was frustrated with Luna's belief in all manner of things without proof or logical grounds, but eventually simply accepted their differences, telling Luna that her planned trip to Sweden in search of a <a href="/wiki/Crumple-Horned_Snorkack" title="Crumple-Horned Snorkack">Crumple-Horned Snorkack</a> sounded '<i>lovely</i>'.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP_32-22" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP-32"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>32<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>The following year, Luna comforted Hermione when she was upset over her fight with <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_36-32" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-36"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>36<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Hermione was one of the five portraits Luna painted — along with Harry, Ron, Ginny, and Neville — and hung from her bedroom ceiling, the word '<i>friends</i>' linking them in gold writing. When <a href="/wiki/Xenophilius_Lovegood" title="Xenophilius Lovegood">Xenophilius Lovegood</a> attempted to turn Harry, Ron, and Hermione over to <a href="/wiki/Death_Eaters" title="Death Eaters">Death Eaters</a> in exchange for his daughter's safety, Hermione <a href="/wiki/Ambush_at_the_Lovegood_House" title="Ambush at the Lovegood House">engineered their escape</a> so that the Death Eaters saw Harry briefly, thus ensuring that both Luna and her father were not harmed. Despite disagreeing with Luna on many things herself, Hermione defended her when others insulted her; for example, she tried to kick Ron for teasing Luna about <a href="/wiki/Gurdyroot" title="Gurdyroot">Gurdyroots</a> at the <a href="/wiki/Wedding_of_William_Weasley_and_Fleur_Delacour" title="Wedding of William Weasley and Fleur Delacour">wedding</a> of <a href="/wiki/William_Weasley" title="William Weasley">Bill Weasley</a> and <a href="/wiki/Fleur_Delacour" title="Fleur Delacour">Fleur Delacour</a>, and snapped at the portrait of <a href="/wiki/Phineas_Nigellus_Black" title="Phineas Nigellus Black">Phineas Nigellus Black</a> for calling Luna an oddity. The two girls remained close friends in adulthood and saw each other regularly. Luna may be one of the best female friends of Hermione (along with Ginny), as she was only seen with these girls during her school-time at Hogwarts.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_10-40" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-10"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>10<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Sirius_Black">Sirius Black</span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix"><b>Hermione</b>: "<i>But Harry, you've just said it. <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Dumbledore</a> wanted you to learn to shut these things out of your mind, if you'd done <a href="/wiki/Occlumency" title="Occlumency">Occlumency</a> properly you'd never seen this —</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Harry Potter</b>: "<i>IF YOU THINK I'M JUST GOING TO ACT LIKE I HAVEN'T SEEN —</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Hermione</b>: "<i>Sirius told you there was nothing more important than you learning to close your mind</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Harry Potter</b>: "<i>WELL, I EXPECT HE'D SAY SOMETHING DIFFERENT IF HE KNEW WHAT I'D JUST —</i>"</dd>
<dd>— <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter" title="Harry Potter">Harry Potter</a> and Hermione on Sirius Black being supposedly tortured<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 165px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/bc/OOTP_promo_front_closeup_Sirius_Black.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20150918055024" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="OOTP promo front closeup Sirius Black" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="165" height="247" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="OOTP promo front closeup Sirius Black.jpg" data-image-key="OOTP_promo_front_closeup_Sirius_Black.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/bc/OOTP_promo_front_closeup_Sirius_Black.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/165?cb=20150918055024" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/bc/OOTP_promo_front_closeup_Sirius_Black.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20150918055024" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="OOTP promo front closeup Sirius Black" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/bc/OOTP_promo_front_closeup_Sirius_Black.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/165?cb=20150918055024" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="165" height="247" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="OOTP promo front closeup Sirius Black.jpg" data-image-key="OOTP_promo_front_closeup_Sirius_Black.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/bc/OOTP_promo_front_closeup_Sirius_Black.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/165?cb=20150918055024" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:OOTP_promo_front_closeup_Sirius_Black.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black" title="Sirius Black">Sirius Black</a>, her friend</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Hermione first learned about Sirius Black in <a href="/wiki/1993" title="1993">1993</a>, when he escaped <a href="/wiki/Azkaban" title="Azkaban">Azkaban</a>. The wizarding world at large knew of him as the wizard who murdered twelve Muggles and a wizard (<a href="/wiki/Peter_Pettigrew" title="Peter Pettigrew">Peter Pettigrew</a>) with a single curse. Very few knew of his affiliation with the Potters and those who did also believed that Sirius had betrayed <a href="/wiki/James_Potter_(I)" title="James Potter (I)">James</a> and <a href="/wiki/Lily_Potter_(I)" title="Lily Potter (I)">Lily Potter</a> to Voldemort by revealing their location at <a href="/wiki/Godric%27s_Hollow" title="Godric's Hollow">Godric's Hollow</a>. During the events at Hogwarts in <a href="/wiki/1993" title="1993">1993</a>, Hermione along with Harry, Ron and Lupin discovered that, contrary to their previous beliefs, Sirius Black had never committed the murders for which he had been incarcerated, nor had he betrayed his closest friends. 
</p><p>The trio managed to save Sirius and Lupin from being subjected to the <a href="/wiki/Dementor%27s_Kiss" title="Dementor's Kiss">Dementor's Kiss</a> at the hands of <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Severus Snape</a> by firing three simultaneous <a href="/wiki/Disarming_Charm" title="Disarming Charm">Disarming Charms</a> at him. Snape was blasted off his feet and knocked unconscious, allowing Harry, Ron and Hermione to continue their interrogation of Sirius who later revealed that Pettigrew had disguised himself in his rat <a href="/wiki/Animagus" title="Animagus">Animagus</a> form for twelve years in order to escape justice and the wrath of Voldemort's remaining Death Eaters. However, upon exiting the <a href="/wiki/Whomping_Willow" title="Whomping Willow">Whomping Willow</a>'s secret passageway together, Pettigrew shrewdly used Lupin's werewolf transformation as a distraction and escaped. Sirius was soon apprehended and locked in <a href="/wiki/Filius_Flitwick" title="Filius Flitwick">Filius Flitwick</a>'s office to await the Dementor's Kiss. Harry and Hermione would later use the latter's <a href="/wiki/Time-Turner" title="Time-Turner">Time-Turner</a> to <a href="/wiki/Rescue_of_Sirius_Black_and_Buckbeak" title="Rescue of Sirius Black and Buckbeak">rescue</a> Sirius, who became deeply grateful to both of them.
</p><p>In <a href="/wiki/1994" title="1994">1994</a>, Hermione, Harry, and Ron visited Sirius at the cave off <a href="/wiki/Hogsmeade" title="Hogsmeade">Hogsmeade</a> village he was hiding in, bringing him food. Here they discussed the many mysteries that had occurred during that year, the trio learning valuable pieces of information regarding the imprisonment of <a href="/wiki/Bartemius_Crouch_Junior" title="Bartemius Crouch Junior">Barty Crouch Jnr</a> After the events of the Third Task, Sirius (while in his Animagus form) joined Hermione, Ron and <a href="/wiki/Molly_Weasley" title="Molly Weasley">Molly Weasley</a> at Harry's bedside, each indicating their affections for the latter.
</p><p>Hermione and Sirius would not meet again until the summer of <a href="/wiki/1995" title="1995">1995</a>, at the Headquarters of the second <a href="/wiki/Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Order of the Phoenix">Order of the Phoenix</a>. Sirius was obliged to remain in <a href="/wiki/12_Grimmauld_Place" title="12 Grimmauld Place">12 Grimmauld Place</a> for his own safety (his innocence not yet recognised by the Ministry). Sirius was rather disappointed when Harry was allowed to return to Hogwarts, Hermione pointing out that he had probably been secretly wishing that Harry had been expelled from school so that they could both stay at Grimmauld Place and be '<i>outcasts together</i>'. Hermione expressed an even deeper understanding of Sirius's emotions when she stated her opinion to Harry that Sirius was attempting to relive his happier school days through his godson. Harry ignored this and became slightly agitated at the suggestion that Sirius might be guilty of such a crude, selfish mentality. However, she severely disapproved of his indifferent and occasionally cruel treatment of his <a href="/wiki/House-elf" title="House-elf">house-elf</a>, <a href="/wiki/Kreacher" title="Kreacher">Kreacher</a>, despite the fact that Kreacher initially appeared to be disgusted by her and addressed her as 'the <a href="/wiki/Mudblood" title="Mudblood">Mudblood</a>' (which Hermione often attributed to Kreacher being senile due to his old age.) 
</p><p>She also thought that Sirius was attempting to live vicariously through her, Harry and Ron when he encouraged them to form Dumbledore's Army, but the two boys became angry and snapped at her when she expressed this belief. Sirius was eventually killed by <a href="/wiki/Bellatrix_Lestrange" title="Bellatrix Lestrange">Bellatrix Lestrange</a> in the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_the_Department_of_Mysteries" title="Battle of the Department of Mysteries">Battle of the Department of Mysteries</a>, much to the dismay of his friends and loved ones. Hermione was devastated by his death, and often tried to provide comfort to Harry, who had been even more deeply affected by the tragedy. At the end of the <a href="/wiki/Second_Wizarding_War" title="Second Wizarding War">Second Wizarding War</a>, Hermione became godmother to Harry's eldest son, <a href="/wiki/James_Potter_(II)" title="James Potter (II)">James Sirius</a>, whose first and middle name was derived from James Potter and Sirius Black respectively.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Crookshanks">Crookshanks</span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban"><b>Ron Weasley </b>: "<i>Hermione, that thing nearly scalped me!</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Hermione</b>: "<i>He didn't mean to, did you, Crookshanks?... Poor Crookshanks, that witch said he'd been in there for ages; no one wanted him.</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Ron Weasley </b>: "<i>I wonder why.</i>"</dd>
<dd>— Hermione and Ron when she bought Crookshanks<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Prisoner_of_Azkaban" title="Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div><figure class="thumb mw-halign-right show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 180px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d2/Hermione_poa.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20190128082208" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Hermione poa" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="180" height="246" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Hermione poa.jpg" data-image-key="Hermione_poa.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d2/Hermione_poa.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/180?cb=20190128082208" /></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d2/Hermione_poa.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20190128082208" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Hermione poa" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d2/Hermione_poa.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/180?cb=20190128082208" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="180" height="246" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Hermione poa.jpg" data-image-key="Hermione_poa.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d2/Hermione_poa.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/180?cb=20190128082208" /></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Hermione_poa.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Hermione with Crookshanks</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p><a href="/wiki/Crookshanks" title="Crookshanks">Crookshanks</a> was Hermione's large, bandy-legged, half-<a href="/wiki/Kneazle" title="Kneazle">Kneazle</a>, ginger-coloured pet cat since she bought him from the <a href="/wiki/Magical_Menagerie" title="Magical Menagerie">Magical Menagerie</a> in <a href="/wiki/Diagon_Alley" title="Diagon Alley">Diagon Alley</a>, in <a href="/wiki/1993" title="1993">1993</a>. She seemed to think he was gorgeous, although no one else had wanted to buy him when he was still being sold at the Menagerie. She was proud of his cleverness. The latter proved to be quite true during the <a href="/wiki/1993%E2%80%931994_school_year" title="1993–1994 school year">1993–1994 school year</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-POA_34-24" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-POA-34"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>34<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>Crookshanks recognised that Hermione had left him at <a href="/wiki/The_Burrow" title="The Burrow">The Burrow</a> before Bill and Fleur's <a href="/wiki/Wedding_of_William_Weasley_and_Fleur_Delacour" title="Wedding of William Weasley and Fleur Delacour">wedding</a> in <a href="/wiki/1997" title="1997">1997</a>,<sup id="cite_ref-DH_10-41" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-10"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>10<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> most likely had been left in care of Mrs Weasley or Ginny, but it is possible that they were reunited after the Second War given the deep care and affection they had for each other.
</p>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Hogwarts_Students">Hogwarts Students</span></h3>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Roommates">Roommates</span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince"><b>Ron Weasley </b>: "<i>I love you, Hermione.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Hermione</b>: "<i>Don't let Lavender hear you saying that.</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Ron Weasley </b>: "<i>I won't. Or maybe I will... then she'll ditch me...</i>"</dd>
<dd>— Hermione and <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley" title="Ronald Weasley">Ron Weasley</a> talking<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-Blood_Prince" title="Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
